title: PDP will be instrumental in forming non-BJP coalition govt: Iltija Mufti
creator: PTI
content: Srinagar, Sep 14: The People’s Democratic Party (PDP) is at its lowest right now but it will play an instrumental role in forming a non-BJP coalition government after the assembly polls in Jammu and Kashmir, party leader Iltija Mufti has said. Iltija, the third generation politician from the Mufti family and daughter of PDP president Mehbooba Mufti, is in the midst of her debut election. She is contesting from south Kashmir’s Bijbehera assembly segment, considered the family’s bastion. In a freewheeling chat with PTI Videos, Iltija Mufti said she is making her electoral debut at a difficult time. “At a time when it is turbulent, not just for Jammu and Kashmir, but particularly for the party. We are probably at our lowest point right now. To be honest, for me, it is about saving a lot of things,” she said. Asserting that her family legacy would survive no matter what role she plays, Iltija Mufti expressed hope of alleviating the sufferings of the people of J&K. “The media is making it seem like my mother is Queen Elizabeth and I am Queen Victoria, with her putting a crown on my head. It is not like that. I have to struggle quite a bit, as you can see the seat is challenging,” she said. On a question about her claims that the PDP will play the role of a kingmaker post-polls, Iltija Mufit said she believed J&K would get a coalition government after the polls and her party would play an instrumental role in its formation. “Well, if I was not confident, I would not repeat that at...

title: Inseguridad, el peor legado que dejará AMLO: oposición
creator: NOTICIAS DE HOY
content: CDMX.- Con el narcotráfico asolando estados como Michoacán, Sinaloa, Durango, Chiapas y hasta Tabasco, a pesar de la presencia de militares, y con más de 193 mil homicidios en el sexenio, 59 por ciento más que en el de Felipe Calderón, la violencia es el peor legado del Gobierno de Andrés Manuel López Obrador acusaron los senadores Marko Cortés, del PAN, y Clemente Castañeda, de Movimiento Ciudadano. “ La violencia y las desapariciones aumentaron con la política de ‘abrazos’ a los cárteles del narcotráfico. Sin lugar a dudas, la violencia y la inseguridad son el peor legado de López Obrador ”, afirmó Cortés. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Sinaloa, Nuevo León, Chiapas y Michoacán... Estos son los estados y municipios donde se cancelaron las Fiestas Patrias por violencia Cortés, dirigente del PAN, acusó que López Obrador se negó durante su Gobierno a garantizar la seguridad de los mexicanos. “ En seis años, los cárteles del narcotráfico tomaron una dinámica de empoderamiento, con más territorio bajo su dominio y más actividades bajo su control, como imponer derecho de piso a los productores de limón y aguacate, entre otros ”, agregó. Según un informe del Programa de Seguridad Ciudadana de la Universidad Iberoamericana, el 2023 cerró con más de 261 mil militares desplegados en todo el País, mientras que el total de policías era de 251 mil, pero a pesar de eso esta semana se ha registrado una escalada de violencia en distintos estados , al grado de que el...

title: Bir çevirmenin edebi üslubu makineye öğretilebilir mi?
content: Önce “yapay zekâ” diye bir şey olmadığını, daha, hâlâ olmadığını belirtmek lazım. Bugün moda olan bu fikir ta ilk çağlardan beri var, sadece adı değişiyor - kader dediğimiz şeyi denetlenebilir hâle getirmeye çalışırken en son bulduğumuz isim yapay zekâ. Bu arada - aslında yapay anlık, ya da suni zekâ demek daha tutarlı olurdu dil açısından, ama böyle yerleşti. Çeviriye gelirsek, aslında çevirinin kendisi yapay bir şey, doğada olmayan, sadece insana has bir şey- diğer canlıların dil iletişimleri var kuşkusuz, ama türler arasında özel bir uzmanlaşmadan haberdar değiliz, yunuslarla ahtapotlar arasında çeviri etkileşimi bilmiyoruz. Doğada canlılar sadece konuşuyor, ya da diğerinin arazisine, üretimine el koyuyor, bu da konuşmayı gerektirmiyor, yok etmeyi gerektiriyor. İnsan, asalak türleri bir yana bırakırsak, bu son eylemleri yaparken de konuşan, ikna eden tek canlı. Çeviriye dönersek, insanlar bellek biriktirmeye, başkalarının bildiklerini, söylediklerini sözlü-yazılı-kayıtlı olarak birbirlerine aktarmaya başladıktan sonra hep yapay zekâ kullanmış sayılır: Kitaplar, sözlükler, tezaruslar, ansiklopediler kullanırken yapay zekâ kullanıyorlar, başkalarının zekâsını, aklını yapay yollarla kullanıyorlar. Bugün tek başına yapay zekâ dediğimiz şey de insanın bilgisayarın belleğini kullanmasından ibaret; bizim bilgisayar dediğimiz computer, hesaplayıcının özelliği sonsuz sayıda transistör sayesinde çok hızlı ve...

title: Rutierul norvegian Felix Oern-Kristoff a câştigat proba de fond a juniorilor, sâmbătă, la Campionatele Europene de ciclism
content: Rutierul norvegian Felix Oern-Kristoff a câştigat proba de fond a juniorilor, sâmbătă, la Campionatele Europene de ciclism pe şosea de la Limburg (Belgia), informează AGERPRES. Scandinavul a fost cronometrat cu timpul de 02 h 40 min 40 sec pe 129,7 km, fiind urmat, în acelaşi timp, de spaniolul Hector Alvarez Martinez şi de francezul Paul Seixas etc. Românul Cătălin-Luca Câmpean s-a clasat pe locul 29, în 02 h 41 min 32 sec. Horea-Ştefan Precup a terminat pe 68 (02:45:52), iar Ovidiu-Gabriel Dorcu, Tudor-Cristian-Andrei Neagu, Edmond Novak şi Matteo Riccardo Tudurachi nu au reuşit să încheie cursa.

title: Ceva foarte neobișnuit a fost observat în galaxia noastră
세계 호령하던 유럽 자동차 업계 위기...전기차 공세에 '쇠락'
creator: 윤석이
content: 세계 호령하던 유럽 자동차 업계 위기...전기차 공세에 '쇠락' [앵커] 유럽 자동차 업계는 최고의 성능을 내세우며 글로벌 자동차 시장을 리드해 왔는데요. 전기차 경쟁에서 뒤처지면서 쇠락의 길을 걷고 있습니다. 독일 폭스바겐 그룹이 87년 역사상 처음으로 자국 내 공장 폐쇄 등 구조조정에 나섰는데요. 내연기관 자동차에 집착하며 시장 변화에 대처하지 못했기 때문이란 분석입니다. 윤석이 기자입니다. [기자] 독일 자동차 제조왕국의 뿌리인 폭스바겐 그룹이 87년 역사상 처음으로 자국 공장 폐쇄를 검토하고 나섰습니다. 올리버 블루메 폭스바겐 최고경영자는 지난 2일 "자동차 산업이 몹시 어렵고 심각한 상황에 있다"며 이 같은 계획을 밝혔습니다. 폭스바겐은 독일에 6곳의 공장을 두고 있는데, 이 가운데 최소 완성차 공장과 부품 공장을 한 곳씩 폐쇄할 것으로 알려졌습니다. "모두가 직장에 대해 걱정하고 있지만, 지금은 공식적인 것이 없기 때문에 더 이상 말할 수 없습니다. 하지만 모두 걱정하고 있습니다. 그렇지 않다면 이상할 것입니다." 다른 자동차 업체도 상황이 어렵기는 마찬가지입니다. BMW는 지난 10일 올해 영업이익 전망치를 기존 8~10%에서 6~7%로 낮춘다고 밝혔고, 이날 BMW의 주가는 11%나 폭락했습니다. 미국 테슬라와 중국 전기자동차 업계가 적극적인 시장 공략에 나서고 있지만 유럽 자동차 업계는 내연기관 차량에 연연하며 대처가 늦었기 때문이란 분석입니다. "새로운 경쟁자가 있습니다. 특히 중국과...

title: Produce destaca logros alcanzados en reunión APEC Perú 2024 en Ucayali
content: 19:51 | Lima, set. 14. El viceministro de MYPE e Industria del Ministerio de la Producción (Produce), César Quispe Luján, destacó la aprobación por consenso de la Declaración Ministerial de Pucallpa, alcanzada en la 30.° Reunión Ministerial de Pequeñas y Medianas Empresas de APEC 2024, lo que representa un logró para el Perú. En su intervención en el Foro Perú PYMEs ExpoUcayali 2024, organizado por gremios empresariales, como parte de las últimas actividades de la Semana de la Pequeña y Mediana Empresa (PYME) APEC 2024, Quispe Luján subrayó la importancia de las Líneas Prioritarias impulsadas por Produce para fomentar la competitividad y productividad de las micro y pequeñas empresas (MYPE) en todo el país, incluidas las más de 38,000 MYPE formales de la región Ucayali. El viceministro destacó cuatro líneas estratégicas: Mujer Produce, MYPE Digital, MYPE Sostenible y MYPE Global. Mujer Produce es una de las principales líneas de acción, diseñada para potenciar las habilidades empresariales y productivas de las mujeres emprendedoras. “El compromiso del gobierno con las mujeres empresarias es total, ya que su empoderamiento no solo mejora la calidad de vida de sus familias, sino también impulsa el desarrollo económico del país”, señaló Quispe Luján. En cuanto a MYPE Digital, el viceministro explicó que esta iniciativa busca cerrar las brechas digitales, acompañando a las microempresas en la adopción de tecnologías que optimicen sus procesos...

title: Viral Pencurian Besi di Halte Transjakarta Pasar Cakung, Begini Respon Polisi
content: Sebuah video merekam rangka besi di halte Transjakarta , Kecamatan Cakung, Jakarta Timur viral di media sosial. Dalam video yang diambil seorang pengendara sepeda motor pada Kamis (12/9/2024) siang, tampak dua orang pria mencongkel pelat besi lantai Transjakarta . Kedua pelaku tampak leluasa beraksi lantaran Halte Transjakarta kini sudah tidak lagi digunakan melayani penumpang, atau dibiarkan terbengkalai begitu saja. Bahkan dalam video hampir seluruh pelat lantai besi Halte Transjakarta sudah raib, hanya tersisa bagian rangka saja diduga karena banyak yang sudah dicuri. Diinformasi kejadian Kapolsek Cakung mengatakan hingga kini pihaknya belum menerima laporan dari PT Transjakarta selaku pemilik aset halte. "Sampai sekarang belum ada laporan dari (pihak) Transjakarta," kata Panji saat dikonfirmasi di Cakung, Jakarta Timur, Minggu (15/9/2024). Lantaran belum ada laporan, untuk sekarang jajaran Polsek Cakung tak dapat memperkirakan kerugian materil akibat pelat besi lantai Halte Transjakarta . Namun Unit Reserse Kriminal (Reskrim) Polsek Cakung menyatakan tetap menyelidiki kasus besi tersebut berdasar rekaman video yang beredar di media sosial. "Tetap kami lakukan penyelidikan, dan anggota sudah cek TKP," ujar Panji.

title: How Influencer Marketing Is Revolutionizing the Advertising Industry
creator: Jack Hodgkin
content: Influencer marketing, once dismissed as a passing trend, has firmly established itself as a cornerstone of modern advertising. With the Cannes Lions advertising festival launching its first-ever Creator program this year, dedicated entirely to influencers and social media content creators, it’s clear that the creator economy is here to stay. Brands, agencies, and even traditional media are grappling with this new reality as influencers change not just how we advertise, but how we interact with brands altogether. says , CEO of influencer talent agency Viral Nation. A Two-Decade Evolution: From Viral Videos to Billion-Dollar Brands The rise of influencer marketing might seem like an overnight success, but the shift has been two decades in the making. At the start of the 2000s, faster internet connections and the advent of platforms like YouTube and Twitter allowed everyday users to reach mass audiences. While early influencers built loyal followings through blogs and viral videos, the creator economy exploded when TikTok made content creation more accessible than ever before. “Back in the early 2000s, becoming a content creator required expensive camera equipment and editing tools,” explains , CEO of global PR firm Edelman. TikTok’s short-form, vertical videos created a new format for quick, impactful content, and brands quickly took notice. Today, creators like Munya Chawawa, who gained fame for his satirical news parodies during the pandemic, are the new faces of...

title: Nilai KPK Lambat Tangani Gratifikasi Kaesang Pangarep, Ubedilah Badrun Contohkan Kasus Rafael Alun
content: Ubedilah Badrun meminta KPK segera memeriksa Kaesang Pangarep. Ahmad Riza Patria Ketua Tim Pemenangan Ridwan Kamil-Suswono di Pilkada Jakarta 2024. Sebelumnya, bersama Marshel Widianto maju Pilkada Tangsel. Penjelasan KPK soal pamer penemuan mobil Harun Masiku yang sebenarnya sudah mereka segel sejak 2020 Keriuhan soal akun fufufafa dinilai untuk merusak hubungan Prabowo-Gibran. Di sisi lain program food estate gagal Ekonom UPN Veteran Jakarta, Achmad Nur Hidayat, mengkritik Jokowi yang memilih berkantor di IKN saat infrastruktur belum siap. Yudi Purnomo Harahap mengomentari komposisi calon pimpinan (Capim) KPK yang didominasi oleh aparat penegak hukum. Menteri Agraria dan Tata Ruang (ATR) Agus Harimurti Yudhoyono berjanji menuntaskan program Pendaftaran Tanah Sistematis Lengkap (PTSL), reforma agraria, dan pemberantasan mafia tanah, di sisa akhir masa jabatan. Teguh menjadi calon Pj Gubernur Jakarta yang paling banyak mendapat dukungan dari DPRD. Pimpinan KPK menyatakan pada periode kedua, Presiden Jokowi tak pernah mengundang mereka untuk berdiskusi penanganan korupsi di RI. Pengamat menjelaskan sejumlah tantangan bagi Anies Baswedan dalam mendirikan partai politik.

title: AP Sports SummaryBrief at 8:51 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Dillon Gabriel leads No. 9 Oregon to 49-14 win over rival Oregon State CORVALLIS, Ore. (AP) — Dillon Gabriel threw for 291 yards and two touchdowns, and ran for 64 yards with another score, to lead No. 9 Oregon to a 49-14 victory over Oregon State on Saturday. Jordan James had 12 carries for 86 yards and two touchdowns, and the Ducks improved to 3-0 in their first Big Ten season after the demise of the Pac-12. It was the 128th meeting in the rivalry between the two former conference foes. Oregon State fell to 2-1 with the loss.

title: Lũ rút rất chậm, ngập lụt thêm nhiều ngày ở 8 tỉnh miền Bắc
content: Dù đã qua đỉnh lũ 2 - 3 ngày nhưng mực nước lũ trên 5 dòng sông gồm sông Cầu, sông Thương, sông Lục Nam, sông Hoàng Long và sông Thái Bình vẫn ở mức rất cao. Lúc 1h sáng nay, lũ trên sông Cầu tại Bắc Ninh vẫn cao 6,42m, trên mức báo động 3. Nước chỉ rút đi 17cm sau 6 tiếng, từ 19h tối qua. Sông Hoàng Long cũng đang trên báo động 3 khi mực nước lúc 1h sáng nay tại Ninh Bình là 4,05m, trên báo động 3, chỉ giảm đi 10cm sau 6 tiếng. Sông Thương ở Bắc Giang sáng nay còn dưới báo động 3 là 36cm, sông Thái Bình ở Hải Dương xuống dưới báo động 2 là 12cm, sông Lục Nam dưới báo động 2 là 21cm. Dự báo, ngày hôm nay, trên 5 dòng sông này, lũ vẫn tiếp tục rút rất chậm. Lũ trên sông Cầu tại Đáp Cầu, sông Thương tại Phủ Lạng Thương, sông Hoàng Long tại Bến Đế tiếp tục ở mức trên báo động 2 dưới báo động 3. Lũ trên sông Lục Nam và sông Thái Bình ở trên mức báo động 1. Trong đêm nay, lũ trên sông Cầu tại Đáp Cầu (Bắc Ninh) tiếp tục xuống nhưng vẫn trên mức báo động 2. Sông Thương tại Phủ Lạng Thương (Bắc Giang), sông Thái Bình tại Phả Lại (Hải Dương), sông Hoàng Long tại Bến Đế (Ninh Bình) tiếp tục xuống và ở mức trên báo động 1 – dưới báo động 2. title: Mengenal Para Istri Rasulullah
creator: Hasanul Rizqa
content: REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA -- Nabi Muhammad SAW memiliki beberapa kekhususan yang hanya berlaku pada diri beliau. Di antaranya adalah bahwa Allah membolehkan Rasulullah SAW untuk menikah dengan perempuan lebih dari empat--yakni batasan yang berlaku bagi Muslim biasa. Sejarah mencatat, ada 11 orang perempuan yang berstatus sebagai istri Nabi SAW. Alquran menyebut para istri Rasulullah sebagai "ibunda orang-orang beriman" atau ummahatul mu`minin (tunggal: ummul mu`minin ). Ini menandakan, Allah memuliakan mereka. Berikut ini adalah profil para istri Rasulullah SAW.

title: Con Sheinbaum se consolidará el segundo piso de la 4T: Javier May
content: El gobernador electo de Tabasco , Javier May Rodríguez , mencionó que con la presidenta electa, Claudia Sheinbaum Pardo , se consolidará el segundo piso de la Cuarta Transformación . Lo expresado por el oriundo de Comalcalco, fue ayer al término del recorrido de Teapa a Palenque del Tren Interoceánico. Además reconoció todo el esfuerzo, compromiso y amor por México del primer mandatario federal tabasqueño. Respecto al presidente Andrés Manuel López Obrador indicó que va a trascender en el tiempo y siempre estará en el corazón de las mexicanas y mexicanos. Te puede interesar: AMLO deja ver a nuevos funcionarios en administración de Sheinbaum Dijo que con la conclusión del período de López Obrador termina una etapa pero no es el fin porque se va a consolidar el segundo piso de la Cuarta Transformación con la doctora Claudia Sheinbaum. “Nos queda el legado que tenemos que cuidar y nos vamos a dedicar a dar resultados en el corto tiempo, próximamente vamos a empezar a anunciar lo que viene”, subrayó el Gobernador Electo de Tabasco. Lee más: AMLO tiene un problema cardíaco; reitera su retiro de la vida política Por su parte, el mandatario federal reafirmó su confianza en el gobernador electo durante el reinicio de operaciones del Tren Interoceánico en la estación de Teapa. title: У G7 засудили експорт іранської зброї до рф
content: • Міністри закордонних справ G7 рішуче засудили постачання Іраном балістичних ракет до рф. Вони закликали Іран припинити експорт військових технологій та пообіцяли вжити нових заходів проти нього. Міністри закордонних справ G7 засудили експорт іранської зброї до рф. Про це повідомляє МЗС Італії, передає . Міністри закордонних справ Канади, Франції, Німеччини, Італії, Японії, Сполученого Королівства та Сполучених Штатів Америки, а також Високий представник ЄС, заявили про рішуче засудження постачання Іраном балістичних ракет до терористичної країни. У спільній заяві представники G7 наголосили, що такі дії Ірану, незважаючи на численні міжнародні заклики припинити, тільки сприяють ескалації військового конфлікту в Україні. Міністри підкреслили, що агресія рф є грубим порушенням міжнародного права, зокрема Статуту ООН. Вони закликали Іран негайно припинити постачання військових технологій терористичній країні і пообіцяли вжити нові заходи для притягнення Ірану до відповідальності. Юлія Котвицька

title: Kabar Gembira, Perbaikan Titian Terpanjang di HSU Dimulai Pekan Depan
content: - Perbaikan di sudah masuk anggaran Pokok Pikiran (Pokir) DPRD (HSU) pada APBD 2024. Proses kontrak telah dilakukan dan dalam satu minggu ke depan kemungkinan perbaikan mulai dilaksanakan. Kepala Bidang Bina Marga Ibnu Maulana mengatakan usulan perbaikan melalui Musrenbang sebenarnya sudah masuk ke pemerintah daerah. Namun karena sudah ada anggaran melalui Pokir maka akan dimaksimalkan menggunakan anggaran tersebut. Anggaran yang disiapkan sekitar Rp 180 juta. “Satu minggu ke depan mungkin sudah mulai pengerjaan. Sebagian material sudah masuk. Untuk konstruksi perbaikan jalan masih menggunakan kayu. Jika menggunakan urukan beton membutuhkan anggaran yang sangat banyak,” ungkapnya. Ibnu mengatakan perbaikan kali ini dilakukan di ruas yang mengalami kerusakan parah. Pada tahun selanjutnya akan terus dianggarkan secara bertahap agar seluruh jalan bisa diperbaiki. Camat Danau Panggang Arya menambahkan perbaikan kali ini dilakukan pada titian yang berada di atas tamah. Sedangkan untuk titian yang tinggi dari tanah sudah dilakukan perbaikan melalui pemerintah desa secara bertahap selama tiga tahun terakhir. Pihaknya juga telah melihat langsung kondisi terakhir jalan yang memang banyak yang mengalami kerusakan, pengukuran juga telah dilakukan, material juga sudah datang. “Saat ini memang waktu yang tepat untuk pembangun yaitu pada saat musim kemarau,” ungkapnya. Untuk memperbaiki juga cukup sulit karena kendaraan roda empat tidak bisa masuk sehingga material diangkut menggunakan...

title: 2nd REC Open Talent Hunt for Youth and Elite Athletes Set to Take Place at SAI Paltan Bazaar Stadium from September 15-21
creator: Sentinel Digital Desk
content: GUWAHATI: The 2nd REC Open Talent Hunt competition for Youth and Elite men and women will be held at the SAI Paltan Bazaar stadium here from September 15 to 21. The tournament, serves as a platform for aspiring boxers to showcase their skills and open opportunities, will witness around 600 boxers competing in 12 weight categories each for elite men and women and 10 weight categories each for youth men and women. Based on the performance in the Talent Hunt, about 96 boxers each from Elite men and women. 80 boxers each from Youth men and women categories will be eligible to participate in the Combined National Level Talent Programme. The gold and silver medallists from each weight category of the Combined National Level Talent Hunt will be getting a direct entry into the National Camps starting this edition. “ and REC have been taking numerous initiatives to identify and nurture budding boxers as part of our commitment towards increasing the talent pool and the growth of Indian boxing. The REC Open Talent Hunt program is designed to sport in every corner of India and hence is open to budding boxers from across the country. It also provides a fantastic opportunity for boxers from the North East to make a mark in their own backyard and take a shot at taking their journey towards national and international glory,” said Hemanta Kumar Kalita, Secretary General of Boxing Federation of India. title: Hakeem Yaseen demands college for Khag
creator: GK NEWS SERVICE
content: Srinagar, Sep 14: Chairman People’s Democratic Front (PDF) and party candidate for assembly constituency Khansahib Hakeem Muhammad Yaseen today demanded a degree college and sub-district hospital (SDH) for Khag in Budgam. According to a press release, he vowed to accomplish the dream of a modern Drang- Khag – Tosamaidan – Gulmarg tourist circuit to bring the whole area on the world tourism map. Addressing a public gathering at Khag after culmination of an election rally , Yaseen said that Khag revenue block was educationally , socially and economically a backward area . “This area has remained totally neglected during the previous regimes even during the time of ex -chief minister Omar Abdullah , when he represented the area as its MLA in 2014. He assured with the support of the people,” Yaseen said.

title: Gaby Espino y Aleska Génesis conversaron sobre la polémica
creator: Estefani Dos Reis
content: Poco dada a hablar de su vida privada, Gaby Espino ha preferido en todo momento mantenerse al margen del . Una situación que, sin querer, le salpicó a ella y a la que la actriz prefirió no dar eco ni voz. Alejada de todo esto y sin dar declaraciones a los medios, la feliz mamá de dos ha preferido ocuparse y centrarse en sus negocios, sus proyectos y sus seres queridos. Mientras, la actual pareja de Clovis Nienow ha vivido algunos episodios nada agradables como su detención en México y su paso por . En estos días ha salido a la luz un encuentro inesperado entre ambas, no buscado, sino accidental y se han dado a conocer detalles del mismo. Ha sido la propia Aleska quien, en entrevista con Carlos Adyan en su podcast , confirmó que eso ocurrió y que pasaron cosas inesperadas y... buenas. Aunque se tenían bloqueadas y la cosa no apuntaba a conversación cordial sino más bien cada una por su lado, sí hubo tal charla y con un final positivo. “No me imaginé nunca verla allí. Todos alrededor se pusieron nerviosos... Me le acerco y le digo: ‘Gaby, tú y yo tenemos que hablar para dejar cosas atrás'”, comenzó su relato. “Que todo lo que había pasado lo dejaba atrás, que quería saber si ella realmente y había hecho todo lo que ella en algún momento me acusó. Yo sentí que un peso que tenía encima se me quitó. Ese día nos abrazamos, lloré. Fue muy bonito”, añadió la también empresaria al conductor. Y resaltó que, aunque no son amigas y no se siguen, al menos...

title: ラームが首位で最終日 4位ニーマンと年間タイトル争い決着へ 香妻陣一朗21位
content: ◇LIVゴルフリーグ◇シカゴ 2日目(14日)◇ボーリングブルックGC(イリノイ州)◇7131yd(パー70) 11位から出た (スペイン)が6バーディ、ボギーなしの「64」をマークし、通算7アンダーで単独首位に浮上した。移籍初年度の今季は1勝を含め、ここまで出場12戦で棄権した1試合を除いてトップ10を外していない。今大会が個人戦最後の試合となり、ポイントランキング1位を守って年間王者に輝けばボーナスで1800万ドル(約25億7000万円)を獲得する。 > 1打差の通算6アンダー2位は同じく11位から出た (スペイン)。5バーディの「65」で順位を上げた。初日首位の が5アンダー3位。 ラームとともに年間王者の可能性を残すポイントランク2位の (チリ)は、 (イングランド)、 (ポーランド)と並んで通算4アンダー4位。首位とは3打差。逆転が狙える位置で最終日を迎える。 ルーキーで来季のLIV残留がかかる は1イーグル2バーディ、2ダブルボギーの「70」で回り、通算1オーバー21位。

title: Harry Kane lại lập hat-trick cho Bayern Munich, phá sâu kỷ lục của Erling Haaland tại Bundesliga
content: Bayern Munich đã duy trì khởi đầu hoàn hảo của mình với một "set tennis" trên sân Holstein Kiel. Đó là một trận đấu hoàn toàn một chiều khi đội khách tung ra tới 13 cú dứt điểm trúng đích (so với 1 của chủ nhà), và giành thắng lợi 6-1. Harry Kane là tác giả của một cú hat-trick, kèm theo một pha kiến tạo. Trong khi đó, Jamal Musiala, Michael Olise và pha phản lưới từ Nicolai Remberg đã tạo nên chiến thắng hủy diệt ấy. Kane đã ghi 2 bàn thắng trong hiệp một và hoàn tất cú hat-trick của mình bằng quả penalty ở phút 91. Trước trận đấu, Kane đã đóng góp 47 bàn thắng chỉ sau 34 trận đấu Bundesliga. Sau trận đấu, anh đã góp công vào 51 bàn thắng (40 bàn thắng, 11 kiến tạo). Anh đã trở thành cầu thủ đạt mốc góp công vào 50 bàn thắng nhanh nhất trong lịch sử Bundesliga, vượt qua Erling Haaland, người đã chạm mốc này sau 42 trận khoác áo Dortmund. Kane chỉ mất 35 trận để vượt cột mốc 50 bàn + kiến tạo Thậm chí Kane còn vượt sâu Haaland, vì anh vượt mốc này chỉ với 35 trận. Đó cũng là thách thức cực lớn cho những chân sút kế tiếp muốn vượt qua Kane. Chính xác hơn, Kane đã đạt tới cột mốc 50 này chỉ sau 45 phút hiệp một bởi ngoài cú đúp bàn thắng ra, anh còn có pha kiến tạo để Musiala ghi bàn ở ngay phút... đầu...

title: 內地專才2.5萬租康蕙花園 港灣豪庭放租3日即成交
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 租務市場持續暢旺,中原分行經理梁嘉駿表示,鰂魚涌康蕙花園租盤一向不多,最新一宗為2座低層C室,面積538方呎,屬3房間隔,以2.5萬獲內地專才承租,呎租約46.5元。 中原分區營業經理曾向杰透露,何文田半山壹號2期半山徑11號低層戶,面積1,592方呎,4房雙套房間隔,另設工人套房,以每月5.68萬租出,呎租35.7元。 港置分行市務經理(銷售)鄺偉源說,大角咀港灣豪庭7座中層E室,面積約372方呎,屬2房間隔,以1.75萬放租僅3日即獲同區客接洽,雙方經議價後以約1.6萬承租,呎租約43元。 利嘉閣聯席董事陳家豪稱,鰂魚涌君豪峰低層J室,面積約219方呎,開放式間隔,單位原本以1.5萬放租,經議價後,最終獲內地學生以1.3萬承租,呎租約59.4元。 祥益區域董事黃慶德指出,屯門新屯門中心8座高層B室,面積462方呎,2房間隔,單位內籠企理,獲內地家長客議價後以每月1.18萬「即睇即租」上址,呎租約25.5元。

title: ISSI hosts think-tank dialogue with Chinese delegation on arms control and disarmament
creator: APP
content: ISLAMABAD - The Arms Control and Disarmament Centre (ACDC) at the Institute of Strategic Studies Islamabad (ISSI) on Saturday organized an In-House Meeting with a Chinese delegation led by Mr. SUN Xiaobo, Director General, Department of Arms Control, Ministry of Foreign Affairs (MFA), Beijing. The meeting was attended by some other members of the delegation included: Mr. Xie Xinxing, Deputy Division Director, Ms. XIAO Yue, Deputy Division Director, and Jiang Yingbo, Second Secretary, Department of Arms Control, MFA; and Mr. Xu Hangtian, Minister Counsellor and Ms. Wang YiQiu, Third Secretary, Embassy of China, Islamabad. The Session was attended by distinguished former diplomats, practitioners, academics, and think-tanks experts including: Ambassador Zamir Akram; Ambassador Masood Khalid; Ambassador Tehmina Janjua; Ambassador Ali Sarwar Naqvi; Ambassador Babar Amin; Mr Haroon Rashid, DG SECDIV; Maj Gen (R) Ausaf Ali; Maj. Gen. (R) Naseer Ali Khan; Dr. Salma Malik, QAU; Dr. Shabana Fayyaz, QAU; Air Commodore (R) Khalid Banuri; Mr Kamran Hashmi, NIMA; Dr. Adil Sultan, Air University; Mr. Imran Ahmad Khan and Mr. Rashid Sultan, PAEC; and Dr. Ghulam Mujaddid, NDU. Participants from the ISSI included Director General Ambassador Sohail Mahmood, Chairman BoG Ambassador Khalid Mahmood, Centers’ Directors, and members of the ACDC team. The event was moderated by director ACDC Malik Qasim Mustafa. The participants discussed a wide range of subjects including global trends and...

title: Thomas and Ramírez hit HRs, Cantillo pitches 5 scoreless innings and Guardians beat Rays 6-1.
creator: Brian Dulik, The Associated Press
content: CLEVELAND (AP) — Lane Thomas and José Ramírez hit back-to-back eighth-inning homers and Joey Cantillo pitched five scoreless innings as the AL Central-leading Cleveland Guardians beat the Tampa Bay Rays 6-1 on Saturday night. The Guardians remained three games ahead of second-place Kansas City in the division with 13 games remaining. Cleveland has the best home record in the AL at 44-27 and is 85-64 overall, second in the league to the New York Yankees. Josh Naylor’s two-run single through a drawn-in infield ignited a three-run sixth that extended Cleveland’s lead to 4-0. David Fry added a sacrifice fly off Tyler Alexander (6-5), scoring Ramírez, who had been intentionally walked for a franchise-record 88th time. Thomas and Ramírez tacked on solo homers in the eighth against Hunter Bigge. Cantillo (2-3) gave up three hits, walked one and struck out six in his sixth start in the majors. The left-hander threw 6 2/3 perfect innings — and worked a career-high seven — in earning his first win Monday at the White Sox . Junior Caminero had a career-high three doubles for Tampa Bay, driving in the team's only run in the eighth. The Rays fell to 4-5 on a 10-game trip through Baltimore, Philadelphia and Cleveland and are six back for the third AL wild card. Cleveland went ahead 1-0 in the sixth on Brayan Rocchio’s double to right, scoring Andrés Giménez. Jhonkensy Noel also attempted to come home, but was thrown out on a relay from second baseman José Caballero. Tampa Bay...

title: Niño de 6 años murió en una alberca durante una fiesta en Tamazula de Gordiano
content: Una fiesta infantil terminó en una tragedia luego de que un niño de tan solo 6 años de edad, murió ahogado en una alberca en el municipio de Tamazula de Gordiano. La tarde de este sábado se llevaba a cabo una celebración en el salón de eventos denominado Vista Tamazula Terraza, ubicado en la calle de Morelos entre Quintanar y Primero de Mayo, en la zona centro del municipio, cuando el pequeño ingresó a la alberca y comenzó a hundirse. Te recomendamos: Local Trabajadores de Hacienda Pública del Estado, pidieron con manifestación renivelación salarial y alto al acoso laboral Los presentes se metieron, lo sacaron y llamaron al 911 para pedir ayuda. En pocos minutos llegaron los elementos de la unidad municipal de Protección Civil, quienes desafortunadamente ya nada pudieron hacer por el pequeño y solo confirmaron el deceso. Los rescatistas dieron aviso al personal de la Fiscalía del Estado y del Instituto Jalisciense de Ciencias Forenses para que se hicieran cargo del levantamiento del cuerpo. El cadáver fue llevado al Servicio Médico Forense en donde deberá ser entregado a sus familiares. → Únete a nuestro Canal de WhatsApp y recibe las noticias más relevantes $(document).ready(function () {// Removing empty paragraphs first$("#content-body-225-12559890 p").filter(function () {var html = $.trim($(this).html());if (html == '' || html == ' ')return true;}).remove();// Taking a subset of paragraphs using offset and maximumvar offset = 1;var max = 2;if (offset...

title: Confident of NC- Congress forming govt: Mian Altaf Ahmad
creator: GK NEWS SERVICE
content: Rajouri, Sep 14: Senior National Conference (NC) leader and Member of Parliament (MP) Mian Altaf today said that he and his party is confident of forming government with Congress after the assembly polls. He assured the people of the regularisation of land rights. He was addressing election rallies in support of NC nominee Javed Iqbal Choudhary at Khawas and Peeri in Budhal constituency. Mian Altaf aid that over the last 10 years the BJP regime has tried to render lakhs of people in Jammu and Kashmir landless. He said, soon after National Conference- Congress come to power, the new government will regularise the land rights wherever people have been affected. “Last six years saw BJP regime’s assault on land rights of people in both rural and urban areas. This has created uncertainty over dwelling which is the most basic human right,” the MP said. The NC leader pointed out that people of Jammu and Kashmir can never forget New Delhi’s unilateral decisions of abrogating Article 370 and 35A and downgrading of a historic state to a Union Territory. He stated that in the ongoing assembly elections people are all set to convey to the BJP through the power of their vote that downgrading of state to the Union Territory is a blot on the Indian federal constitutional system. Mian Altaf alleged that the BJP regime spent crores of rupees on false advertisements about their achievements such forest rights act but nothing was delivered on the ground. “These elections are first major...

title: إعلام فلسطيني: إصابات في قصف الاحتلال منزلا وسط قطاع غزة
content: كتب- محمد فتحي: أعلنت وسائل إعلام فلسطينية، وقوع إصابات للمدنين في قصف الاحتلال لمنزل غرب مخيم النصيرات وسط قطاع غزة، وفقا لما ذكرته قناة القاهرة الإخبارية في نبأ عاجل لها قبل قليل. واقتحم جيش الاحتلال الإسرائيلي، المنطقة الجنوبية بمدينة الخليل في الضفة الغربية، إذ داهم عددا من المنازل، وفقا لما ذكرته "الغد". واستشهد 5 فلسطينيين وأصيب آخرون، السبت، في قصف قوات الاحتلال الإسرائيلي لمدرسة تؤوي نازحين جنوب شرق مدينة غزة. ونقلت وكالة الأنباء الفلسطينية (وفا) عن مصادر محلية قولها "إن طائرات الاحتلال الحربية قصفت مدرسة شهداء الزيتون التي تؤوي نازحين، ما أدى لاستشهاد خمسة مواطنين وإصابة آخرين". وأضافت أن الاحتلال استهدف 172 مركز إيواء منذ اندلاع العدوان الإسرائيلي على القطاع في السابع من أكتوبر 2023، من بينها 152 مدرسة تابعة لوكالة الأمم المتحدة لغوث وتشغيل اللاجئين الفلسطينيين في الشرق الأدنى (أونروا)، وأخرى حكومية وخاصة، مأهولة بالنازحين.

title: حادث قطاري الزقازيق.. تعليق مهم من محافظ الشرقية بشأن المصابين- صور
content: كتب- محمد فتحي: توجه المهندس حازم الأشموني محافظ الشرقية، لمستشفيات جامعة الزقازيق والأحرار التعليمي، للإطمئنان على الحالة الصحية لمصابي حادث التصادم الذي وقع بين القطار رقم 336 القادم من المنصورة متجها إلى القاهرة، والقطار رقم 281 المنطلق من الزقازيق متجها إلى الإسماعيلية أمام بلوك 5 بمنطقة الكوبري الجديد بمدينة الزقازيق، الذي أسفر حتى الآن عن إصابه 49 ووقوع 3حالات وفاه. واطمأن محافظ الشرقية علي الحالة الصحية لمصابي الحادث بمستشفى الزقازيق والبالغ عددهم 34 مصاب، فضلا عن حالتي وفاه. واطلع على التقارير الطبية الخاصة بهم وتبين إصابتهم بكسور وكدمات وسحجات وجميعهم تحت الملاحظة الطبية لحين تماثلهم للشفاء. وأكد محافظ الشرقية، على ضرورة تقديم كافة الخدمات الطبية والعلاجية للمصابين والتنسيق بين كافة القطاعات الطبية المختلفة لتقديم الدعم الطبي اللازم للمصابين لإستكمال علاجهم متمنياً لهم الشفاء العاجل. وانتقل محافظ الشرقية لمستشفي الأحرار التعليمي، للإطمئنان على الحاله الصحية لمصابي الحادث والبالغ عددهم 13 مصابا، فضلا عن حالة وفاه واحدة. وأكد المحافظ، أن المصابين تحت الرعاية الدقيقة من الأطباء وطاقم التمريض بالمستشفى، وتم تسخير كافة الإمكانات البشرية والطبية لمتابعة حالتهم الصحيه وتوفير العلاج اللازم لهم. ونعى محافظ الشرقية وفاة ٣ من أبناء المحافظة في هذا الحادث، متمنيا أن يسكنهم الله فسيح جناته ويلهم ذويهم الصبر والسلوان، داعيًا المولى أن يمن علي المصابين بالشفاء العاجل.

title: سعر الذهب في مصر اليوم الأحد مع بداية التعاملات الصباحية- تفاصيل
content: كتب- محمد فتحي: استقر سعر الذهب في مصر اليوم الأحد 15-9-2024، وذلك بعد ارتفاعه في منتصف تعاملات أمس السبت، وزاد الجرام بنحو 5 جنيهات، مقارنة بمستواه ببداية التعاملات صباح السبت. يذكر أن سعر جرام الذهب هبط 15 جنيها في بداية تعاملات أمس السبت، قبل أن يعاود الارتفاع بمنتصف التعاملات في نفس اليوم. "مصراوي" في السطور التالية ينشر آخر تحديث لـ أسعار الذهب في مصر اليوم الأحد 15 سبتمبر 2024، وهي كالآتي: - سعر الذهب عيار 24 بلغ 3966 جنيه. - سعر الذهب عيار 21 بلغ 3470 جنيها. - سعر الذهب عيار 18 بلغ 2974 جنيه. - سعر الذهب عيار 14 بلغ 2313 جنيها. - سعر الذهب عيار 10 بلغ 1652 جنيه. - سعر وقية الذهب بلغت 123334 جنيه. - سعر الجنيه الذهب بلغ 27760 جنيه. واليوم عطلة رسمية ببورصات المعادن العالمية. وارتفع سعر الذهب عالميًا إلى نحو 2567 دولارا اللأونصة، "الأوقية وهي تعادل نحو 31.1 جرام عيار 24"، بنهاية تعاملات الجمعة، آخر جلسات الأسبوع، بارتفاع نسبتة 0.77% وفقا لبيانات وكالة بلومبرج. ويمكنكم متابعة أسعار الذهب اليوم وعلى مدار الساعة عبر هذه الخدمة من مصراوي: أسعار الذهب

title: Piura: Video del asalto en urb Miraflores hoy, 14 de setiembre de 2024
creator: SEO El Tiempo
content: La tarde de este 14 de setiembre de 2024, la tranquilidad de la urbanización Miraflores en Castilla (Piura) se vio interrumpida por un violento asalto que tuvo lugar a plena luz. Los residentes de la zona se encuentran alarmados, exigen mayor presencia policial y acciones contundentes por parte de las autoridades. PUEDES LEER ► Programan cortes de servicio de agua durante seis días cada fin de mes en Piura VIDEO del asalto en la urb Miraflores Piura hoy, 14 de setiembre de 2024 El asalto ocurrió en la tarde, cuando dos personas a bordo de un automóvil de lujo fueron interceptadas por un grupo de delincuentes armados. Los atacantes, quienes se desplazaban en un vehículo de color blanco, intentaron robar a las víctimas en una concurrida avenida de la urbanización Miraflores, en el distrito de Castilla, Piura. ¿Cómo reaccionaron las autoridades ante el asalto en Miraflores? Gracias a las cámaras de seguridad instaladas en la zona, el equipo de serenazgo local fue alertado rápidamente. Al llegar al lugar de los hechos, los agentes del Comando Guerrero del Serenazgo de Castilla encendieron sus sirenas para ahuyentar a los delincuentes, quienes no dudaron en responder con disparos. Un suboficial de la Policía Nacional del Perú (PNP) , que se encontraba fuera de servicio en ese momento, intervino de inmediato, disparando contra los asaltantes para proteger a los ocupantes del vehículo atacado. «El hecho ocurrió la tarde hoy, cuando dos sujetos con armas de fuego...

title: PCRWR successfully completes Water Quality Capacity Building Program
creator: APP
content: ISLAMABAD - The Pakistan Council of Research in Water Resources (PCRWR) has successfully completed a capacity-building training program under the project “Enhancing Water Quality System to Achieve SDG 6 in Pakistan.” The program, conducted here at the National Capacity Building Institute (NCBI) aimed at strengthening the skills of professionals working in water supply services, such as the Public Health Engineering Department, in monitoring and improving water quality, said a press release issued here Saturday. The one-year training program focused on enhancing participants’ ability to test and treat water effectively, ensuring accurate data collection for reporting progress on Sustainable Development Goal 6 (SDG 6), which focuses on clean water and sanitation for all. The training was designed to be highly practical, with 30% dedicated to lectures and 70% to hands-on practice. Participants conducted water quality tests in PCRWR’s National Water Quality Laboratory (NWQL), using internationally recognized procedures. A total of 116 professionals from Punjab and Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Public Health Engineering Department, and the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) took part in the program, which ran from August 15, 2023, to June 24. The participants were divided into two groups: Group 1: 38 Research Officers and Junior Research Officers, trained in three batches and Group 2: 78 Laboratory Assistants, trained in five batches. The course included two main sessions: Basic Training...

title: Chính phủ Anh hỗ trợ 32 tỷ đồng giúp Việt Nam khắc phục hậu quả bão số 3
content: Khoản viện trợ sẽ được chuyển trực tiếp đến tay người dân thông qua các đối tác nhân đạo, cung cấp nhu yếu phẩm, hỗ trợ tiền mặt và các dịch vụ quan trọng như y tế, nước và vệ sinh. Bão YAGI là cơn bão mạnh nhất đổ bộ vào Biển Đông trong 30 năm qua, đã gây ra thiệt hại nặng nề về người và tài sản tại nhiều tỉnh thành tại miền Bắc Việt Nam. "Chính phủ Anh sát cánh cùng những người dân chịu ảnh hưởng bởi tác động tàn khốc của bão YAGI tại Việt Nam. Chúng tôi đã phối hợp chặt chẽ với Chính phủ Việt Nam và các đối tác nhân đạo để xác định những địa phương cần hỗ trợ nhằm mang đến tác động tích cực và hiệu quả nhất”, bà Anneliese Dodds - Quốc vụ khanh phụ trách Phát triển của Bộ Ngoại giao và Phát triển Anh, cho biết. Việt Nam là một trong những quốc gia dễ bị tổn thương nhất về khí hậu trên thế giới. Vương quốc Anh đang hợp tác với Việt Nam ứng phó với biến đổi khí hậu trong khuôn khổ chương trình Quan hệ Đối tác về chuyển dịch năng lượng công bằng.

title: Nam Bộ đỉnh điểm mưa lớn, miền Bắc mưa rải rác
content: Đêm qua và sáng sớm nay (15/9), khu vực từ Quảng Nam đến Bình Thuận, Tây Nguyên và Nam Bộ có mưa rào và rải rác có dông, cục bộ có nơi mưa to đến rất to. Lượng mưa tính từ 19h ngày 14/9 đến 3h ngày 15/9 có nơi trên 70mm như Đầu mối hồ Phước Hà (Quảng Nam) 80mm, Mộ Đức (Quảng Ngãi) 136.6mm. Dự báo từ sáng sớm nay đến sáng sớm 17/9, do ảnh hưởng của rãnh thấp ở Nam Biển Đông, khu vực Tây Nguyên và Nam Bộ tiếp tục nhiều mây, có mưa vừa, mưa to và dông, có nơi mưa rất to với lượng mưa phổ biến 40-80mm, có nơi trên 120mm. Thời gian mưa tập trung vào chiều và đêm. Trung tâm Dự báo Khí tượng Thuỷ văn Quốc gia nhận định, ngày và đêm 17/9, khu vực Tây Nguyên và Nam Bộ tiếp tục có mưa vừa, mưa to và rải rác có dông, cục bộ có nơi mưa rất to với lượng mưa phổ biến 20-50mm, cục bộ trên 90mm. Mưa lớn ở khu vực Tây Nguyên và Nam Bộ có khả năng kéo dài đến khoảng ngày 18-19/9. Nhiều khu vực trên cả nước đón mưa trong chiều tối nay. (Ảnh minh hoạ: Như Ý) Khu vực từ Đà Nẵng đến Bình Thuận trong chiều tối và đêm nay cũng có mưa, mưa vừa và rải rác có dông, có nơi mưa to đến rất to với lượng mưa từ 20-40mm, cục bộ trên 90mm. Ban ngày khu vực này ít mưa, có nắng gián đoạn. Nhiệt độ cao nhất...

title: Reuters: Máy bay không người lái Garpiya sử dụng linh kiện Trung Quốc
content: Reuters dẫn các tài liệu, bao gồm hợp đồng sản xuất máy bay không người lái, thư của công ty về quy trình sản xuất và các tài liệu khác, cho thấy IEMZ Kupol - công ty con của hãng sản xuất vũ khí Nga Almaz-Antey, đã sản xuất hơn 2.500 chiếc Garpiya trong thời gian từ tháng 7/2023 – 7/2024. IEMZ Kupol và Almaz-Antey không trả lời đề nghị bình luận. Hai nguồn tin tình báo cho biết Garpiya đã được sử dụng để nhắm vào các mục tiêu quân sự ở Ukraine. Các nguồn tin chia sẻ với Reuters hình ảnh chụp vật thể mà họ gọi là xác máy bay Garpiya ở Ukraine, nhưng không cung cấp thông tin cụ thể. Samuel Bendett, một thành viên cấp cao tại Trung tâm An ninh Mỹ Mới, một nhóm nghiên cứu có trụ sở tại Washington DC, nói rằng nếu những thông tin về Garpiya được xác nhận, điều này cho thấy Nga không phụ thuộc hoàn toàn vào thiết kế máy bay không người lái tầm xa của Iran. Tháng 5 năm ngoái, Tổng thống Ukraine Volodymir Zelensky nói rằng Iran đã cung cấp hơn 1.000 máy bay không người lái Shahed cho Nga kể từ năm 2022. Bộ Quốc phòng Nga không phản hồi đề nghị bình luận về thông tin trên. Bộ Ngoại giao Trung Quốc khẳng định nước này kiểm soát chặt chẽ việc xuất khẩu các mặt hàng có khả năng ứng dụng quân sự, bao gồm máy bay không...

title: Nhận định Girona vs Barcelona, 21h15 ngày 15/9: Đại chiến xứ Catalan rực lửa
content: Yamal và Raphinha góp công lớn vào thành tích 4 trận toàn thắng tại La Liga của Barcelona. Nhận định trước trận đấu Girona vs Barcelona Girona là hiện tượng thú vị của La Liga mùa giải trước. Họ kết thúc ở vị trí thứ 3, xếp trên Atletico Madrid và giành quyền tham dự Champions League lần đầu tiên trong lịch sử. Bước sang mùa giải 2024/2025, Girona gặp nhiều khó khăn trong 2 vòng đấu đầu tiên và chỉ kiếm được vỏn vẹn 1 điểm. Sự ra đi của nhóm cầu thủ trụ cột gồm Savio, Couto, Aleix Garcia, Dovbyk, Eric Garcia khiến HLV Michel chật vật tìm kiếm những cái tên thay thế. Rất may là Girona đã kịp thời trở lại trong 2 trận đấu gần đây khi lần lượt đánh bại Osasuna và Sevilla với các tỷ số là 4-0 và 2-0. Girona leo lên vị trí thứ 5 và chỉ kém Villarreal, Real Madrid và Atletico Madrid 1 điểm. Vào tuần sau, đoàn quân của Michel sẽ có trận đấu đầu tiên tại Champions League, chạm trán với ĐKVĐ nước Pháp PSG. Nhưng trước khi nghĩ đến trận đấu đó, họ sẽ phải dồn hết sự tập trung cho cuộc đọ sức với Barcelona tại La Liga. Barcelona đã phải nhận hai thất bại muối mặt với cùng tỷ số 2-4 trước Girona tại La Liga mùa giải trước. Nhưng sẽ không dễ để Girona tái lập thành tích này vào thời điểm hiện tại. Sau 4 vòng đấu tại La...

title: Lũ rút rất chậm, ngập lụt thêm nhiều ngày ở 8 tỉnh miền Bắc
content: Dù đã qua đỉnh lũ 2 - 3 ngày nhưng mực nước lũ trên 5 dòng sông gồm sông Cầu, sông Thương, sông Lục Nam, sông Hoàng Long và sông Thái Bình vẫn ở mức rất cao. Lúc 1h sáng nay, lũ trên sông Cầu tại Bắc Ninh vẫn cao 6,42m, trên mức báo động 3 . Nước chỉ rút đi 17cm sau 6 tiếng, từ 19h tối qua. Sông Hoàng Long cũng đang trên báo động 3 khi mực nước lúc 1h sáng nay tại Ninh Bình là 4,05m, trên báo động 3, chỉ giảm đi 10cm sau 6 tiếng. Sông Thương ở Bắc Giang sáng nay còn dưới báo động 3 là 36cm, sông Thái Bình ở Hải Dương xuống dưới báo động 2 là 12cm, sông Lục Nam dưới báo động 2 là 21cm. Dự báo, ngày hôm nay, trên 5 dòng sông này, lũ vẫn tiếp tục rút rất chậm. Lũ trên sông Cầu tại Đáp Cầu, sông Thương tại Phủ Lạng Thương, sông Hoàng Long tại Bến Đế tiếp tục ở mức trên báo động 2 dưới báo động 3. Lũ trên sông Lục Nam và sông Thái Bình ở trên mức báo động 1. Dự báo ngập lụt còn kéo dài ở 8 tỉnh miền Bắc. Trong ảnh là ngập lụt tại Sóc Sơn, Hà Nội. Ảnh: Trọng Tài. Trong đêm nay, lũ trên sông Cầu tại Đáp Cầu (Bắc Ninh) tiếp tục xuống nhưng vẫn trên mức báo động 2. Sông Thương tại Phủ Lạng Thương (Bắc Giang), sông Thái Bình tại Phả Lại (Hải Dương), sông Hoàng Long tại Bến Đế (Ninh Bình) tiếp...

title: 대선 열기에 SNS도 '후끈'...해리스-트럼프 전략은?
creator: 정호윤
content: 대선 열기에 SNS도 '후끈'...해리스-트럼프 전략은? [앵커] 미국 대선 레이스가 초박빙 구도로 흐르면서 온라인에서는 연일 총성 없는 전쟁이 벌어지고 있습니다. 트럼프 전 대통령이 공격적이고 직설적이라면, 해리스 부통령 측은 20대 젊은 피를 앞세워 독창적인 방법으로 상대를 압박하는 모습입니다. 워싱턴에서 정호윤 특파원입니다. [기자] 트럼프의 선거유세는 지루하다며 해리스 부통령이 트럼프 전 대통령의 심기를 건드립니다. "(트럼프) 유세장에 온 이들은 피곤하고 지루해서 일찍 자리를 뜹니다. 당신에게 말해주죠. 그들이 당신의 연설을 끝까지 못 듣는 것은 바로 트럼프 당신 때문입니다." 해리스 선거캠프는 '트럼프를 요리했다'며 주방에서 웃고 있는 해리스의 사진을 곧바로 SNS에 게시했습니다. 토론 직후엔 6초짜리 짧은 영상으로 다시 조롱했습니다. "돌아올 준비가 되었다고 생각했어요. (트럼프는) 이보다 강하다고 생각했지만 분명히 그렇지 않았습니다. 집에 가고 싶네요." 폭발적인 조회수를 기록한 이 영상을 만든 건 해리스 캠프 '디지털 대응팀'으로, 모두 25살 이하 젊은이들로 구성됐습니다. '야생의 25세 무리'라는 별칭까지 얻으며 선거운동의 활력소 역할을 한다는 평가를 받고 있습니다. '중독'이라는 말에 걸맞을 정도로 트럼프 전 대통령 소셜미디어 계정은 온종일 분주합니다. 대선일이 가까워지면서 호흡은 더 짧아졌고 밤낮의 구분도 없어졌습니다. "우리는 역사상 가장 위대한 소셜 미디어 프로그램을 갖고...

연휴 둘째 날 가장 막힌다...서울→부산 7시간30분
creator: 이상민
이상민 (imfactor@etoday.co.kr)
content: 추석 연휴 둘째 날인 15일 오전 전국 주요 고속도로 곳곳에서 정체가 빚어지고 있다. 한국도로공사(공사)는 연휴 기간 중 이날 귀성 방향 최대 혼잡이 빚어질 것으로 예상했다. 공사에 따르면 귀성 방향은 오전 5∼6시에 정체가 시작돼 정오∼오후 1시 정점에 이르고 오후 8∼9시께 해소될 것으로 예상했다. 오전 9시 기준 서울 요금소를 출발해 주요 도시까지 걸리는 예상 시간은 부산 7시간 30분, 울산 7시간, 목포 6시간 40분, 대구 6시간 30분, 광주 6시간, 강릉 4시간 30분, 대전 4시간 10분이다. 각 도시에서 서울까지 예상 소요 시간은 부산 5시간 10분, 울산 4시간 40분, 목포 3시간 40분, 대구 4시간 10분, 광주 3시간 20분, 강릉 2시간 40분, 대전 1시간 30분이다. 경부고속도로 부산 방향은 잠원∼서초 3km, 오산∼안성분기점 부근 12km, 망향휴게소∼청주분기점 45km, 대전터널∼비룡분기점 2km 등 구간에서, 서해안고속도로 목포 방향은 서평택분기점 부근∼서해대교 15km 구간에서 정체를 빚고 있다. 중부고속도로 남이 방향은 마장분기점∼남이천IC 부근 11km, 진천터널 부근 3km, 서청주 부근∼남이분기점 7km 구간에서 차량이 속도를 내지 못하고 있다. 영동고속도로 강릉 방향은 신갈분기점 부근 3km, 마성터널 부근∼용인 4km, 용인∼양지터널 부근 6km, 호법분기점 부근 3km 구간에서 차량이 서행하고 있다. 이 밖에 서울양양고속도로 양양 방향 강일∼서종 20km, 조양 부근∼춘천분기점 부근 5km 등 구간, 중부내륙고속도로 창원 방향...

title: Mid-Autumn Festival celebrated with mooncake cutting ceremony at Froebel’s Int’l School
creator: APP
content: ISLAMABAD - Students of Froebel’s International School (F-7 Campus) marked the Mid-Autumn Festival with a vibrant mooncake cutting ceremony, organized by UNI International, a Chinese organization dedicated to promoting cultural exchange and fostering people-to-people interactions. The event provided students and teachers with an engaging platform to learn about one of China’s most important traditional festivals. UNI International’s Founder and CEO, Max Ma, opened the event with welcoming remarks, emphasizing the significance of the festival. This was followed by an interactive storytelling session led by Academic Director Sienna Xi, who explained the rich history and cultural importance of the Mid-Autumn Festival through pictures, videos, Chinese dance performances, and language learning games. Students enthusiastically participated in various interactive activities and enjoyed a selection of mooncakes — traditional festival treats available in different flavors. Max Ma highlighted key aspects of the festival, commonly known as the Full Moon or Mooncake Festival, which is celebrated on the 15th day of the eighth month of the Chinese lunar calendar. He shared that the Mid-Autumn Festival is a time for family and friends to gather, share mooncakes, and appreciate the full moon, which is said to be at its brightest and fullest during this time of year. “Mooncakes, the most famous food of the festival, are round, symbolic of unity, and vary in size, flavor, and style across...

title: PM Modi’s visit has exposed dangerous anti-national game of 3 dynastic parties: Chugh
creator: GK NEWS SERVICE
content: Jammu, Sep 14: BJP National General Secretary Tarun Chugh, who is also party incharge for J&K, today said that the visit of Prime Minister Narendra Modi to Doda has exposed “dangerous anti-national game of Abdullahs, Muftis and Congress.” According to a press note, he was addressing public meetings at Mendhar and Surankote. Chugh applauded the people of Jammu for their massive turnout at PM Modi’s rally in Doda today, noting that their overwhelming support has infused BJP workers with renewed energy and enthusiasm. “This strong show of support has boosted the morale of our Karyakartas, who were eagerly looking forward to the Prime Minister’s address,” he said. The senior BJP leader emphasised the extensive development works carried out in the Union Territory of Jammu and Kashmir over the past decade under the BJP’s leadership. He highlighted that these projects have benefitted both the rich and poor, a departure from the policies of previous governments that used the region as a vote bank for seventy years without delivering real benefits, particularly to these remote areas. He also stressed that NC could not revisit ST bill at any cost. Chugh also highlighted key points from Prime Minister Modi’s speech, reiterating that the government remains fully committed to the overall development of Jammu and Kashmir. “Our Prime Minister emphasised that terrorism is counting its last days in Jammu and Kashmir,” he remarked. He stressed that the upcoming elections in J&K will play a...

title: USA avvisar Venezuela-anklagelser

title: POLICE reinforcements moving into Porgera
creator: Miriam Zarriga
content: AS dawn broke today in Porgera valley, the sounds of chants could be heard as the local people of the valley came together as one group. They marched together and moved into Porgera station where they are currently talking to move out what they call are “illegal settlers”. Smack in the middle of the chaotic scenes are 122 men who have stayed together and guarded each other as gun shots and bush knives sounded around them. They sit back to back, alert and watching, all the while they await for more support. They are running out of ammunition and are waiting for what they say is “eternity” for support. Four days after the first gunshot sounded police reinforcements are now moving into Porgera. To the 122 men it’s a relief but it is one that many feel is a late response from the police hierarchy and the government. Emergency Orders have now been declared in the Porgera Valley with police mobilising to protect critical infrastructure and safeguard residents of the Valley who have been terrorised and attacked by illegal miners and settlers. Commissioner of Police, David Manning, said there is no more tolerance after an escalation in violence and police are escalating the legitimate use of force to remove the combatants. “Police are responding and with force and consolidating resources to resolve this dangerous situation as quickly as possible. “I have directed that police respond to this situation with force to protect life and property, and to remove the illegals from the...

title: Iowa survives Troy upset scare
creator: Field Level Media
content: The Iowa Hawkeyes survived a scare against the Troy Trojans Saturday in Iowa City, Iowa, defeating the Sun Belt Conference team 38-21. Iowa (2-1) entered the second half down four points, after entering the game a 22 and 1⁄2-point favorite against Troy (0-3), but needed a second half turnover and strong running performance to defeat the Spartans. Kaleb Johnson led the Hawkeyes on the ground with 173 yards and two touchdowns. The junior had two runs over 30 yards, including a 33-yard touchdown at the start of the fourth quarter, putting Iowa ahead 31-21. Devonte Ross paced the Trojans with 142 yards receiving and two touchdowns on five catches, adding a punt return score. Brendan Sullivan, a transfer from Northwestern, gave Iowa its first lead of the second half with his only pass of the game. Entering the game on a redzone play, Sullivan sent a shovel pass to Addison Ostrenga for a touchdown. The touchdown was Iowa's only through the air, with Cade McNamara passing for 176 yards on 19 for 23 passing. Then, with 2:30 remaining in the third quarter, Iowa added to its lead with a 28-yard pick six with Jermari Harris reading a pass from Matthew Caldwell and diving into the endzone to cap the return. Iowa put the game away for good in the fourth quarter when Jaziun Patterson ran 39 yards for a touchdown putting the Hawkeyes up 38-21. Iowa outgained Troy 284-24 on the ground. Troy gave the Big Ten squad a scare throughout the first three quarters of the game, thanks in part to the...

title: Circulan medicamentos contra cáncer falsos: ¿Cuáles son, cómo identificarlos y qué hacer si los usas?
creator: Christian Vázquez
content: Lo que necesitas saber: Son tres diferentes medicamentos los que se han identificado como falsos, y pueden provocar reacciones adversas Cofepris emitió una alerta para que andemos a las vivas por medicamentos contra el cáncer falsos que andan circulando en las calles. Por acá te contamos cuáles son y cómo identificar si te encuentras ante una falsificación. Alertan sobre falsificación de medicamentos contra el cáncer Fue por medio de un comunicado que la Cofepris dio el pitazo de que hay medicamentos oncológicos falsos circulando por ahí. “Cofepris recomienda no adquirir ninguno de estos productos, ya que, al ser irregulares, se desconoce el origen de las materias primas, condiciones de fabricación, almacenamiento, transporte y manipulación. Por lo tanto, no se garantiza su seguridad, eficacia ni calidad”. ¿Qué medicamentos contra el cáncer están siendo falsificados y cómo identificarlos? Se trata de tres medicamentos oncológicos, Mabthera (rituximab), Beneflur (fludarabina) y Keytruda (pembrolizumab) . Las farmacéuticas que cuentan con los permisos necesarios para su producción y distribución avisaron que detectaron la circulación de paquetes y frascos falsos de estas medicinas. Si tú, alguien de tu familia o algún conocido o conocida ocupan alguno de estos medicamentos en su tratamiento contra el cáncer , checa la información para saber cómo puedes identificar si se trata de una falsificación : ¿Qué hago si tengo uno de los medicamentos falsos...

title: خريطة فالفيردي الحرارية في مباراة ريال مدريد وسوسيداد
content: هاي كورة – فاز فريق ريال مدريد على نظيره سوسيداد بنتيجة 2-0 في المباراة التي جمعت بينهما ضمن منافسات الجولة الخامسة من الدوري الإسباني الليغا. وحصل فيديريكو فالفيردي على تقييم 6.7/10 حيث قدم مباراة مقبولة. وإليكم أبرز أرقام فيديريكو فالفيردي:

title: كوريا الشمالية ترسل المزيد من بالونات النفايات نحو كوريا الجنوبية
creator: كاتب
content: أرسلت كوريا الشمالية، في وقت متأخر من يوم أمس (السبت)، المزيد من البالونات التي من المحتمل أن تحتوي على نفايات نحو كوريا الجنوبية، وفقا لما ذكرته القوات المسلحة الكورية الجنوبية. يأتي ذلك بعد ثلاثة أيام من إرسالها بالونات مماثلة إلى الجنوب، بحسب ما ذكرته وكالة أنباء يونهاب الكورية الجنوبية. وجاء في بيان لهيئة الأركان المشتركة الكورية الجنوبية، أن بالونات كوريا الشمالية قد تصل إلى محافظة جيونجي التي تحيط بسيول، محذرة المواطنين من إمكانية سقوط أشياء، كما طلبت إبلاغ الجيش أو الشرطة عن البالونات. وأرسلت كوريا الشمالية يوم الأربعاء حوالي 20 بالوناً يحتمل أنها تحتوي على نفايات نحو الجنوب، لكنها فشلت في عبور الخط الفاصل العسكري. وأطلقت كوريا الشمالية منذ أواخر مايو (أيار) الماضي آلاف البالونات التي تحتوي على نفايات كرد انتقامي على المنشورات المناهضة لبيونغ يانغ التي يرسلها منشقون شماليون وناشطون في كوريا الجنوبية عبر الحدود. وتعد حملة البالونات ليل السبت أحدث سلسلة من الاستفزازات التي تقوم بها كوريا الشمالية هذا الأسبوع. ويوم الخميس، أطلقت كوريا الشمالية عدة صواريخ باليستية قصيرة المدى نحو البحر الشرقي، وهو أول إطلاق صاروخي باليستي لها منذ أول يوليو (تموز).

title: Possible explosive shell prompts police response in North Delta neighbourhood
creator: Ian Jacques
content: Delta police are on scene at 94/144th in North Delta dealing with a possible explosive shell that was recently discarded by someone. Public affairs manager Acting Insp. James Sandberg told the Optimist that there is a closure in place and two homes have been evacuated out of an abundance of caution. "We are awaiting the arrival of some specialists who can assess an old shell that has been located behind a bus shelter," said Sandberg. "It appears that someone had discarded this item recently." Sandberg said the origin and use of this shell is not known. He said it may be up to a couple of hours before some explosive disposal experts arrive on scene. "We ask that if anybody has old explosives, shells, etc. and they are looking to dispose of these items, that they contact us by phone for disposal information. Please do not abandon these items in public places, and please don't bring them to the police department."

title: Josh Ross' "Trouble" wins single of year at Canadian Country Music Association awards
creator: Aaron Sousa, The Canadian Press
content: EDMONTON — Country crooner Josh Ross has won single of the year for his song "Trouble" at the 2024 Canadian Country Music Association Awards. It's a whisky-soaked ballad of heartbreak, and Ross says it highlights the sturggle he felt moving to Nashville to pursue his music career. The 28-year-old former college football player turned country star is also up for male artist of the year and entertainer of the year. Joining him in the winners' circle is Ontario singer-songwriter Owen Riegling, who won for breakthrough artist of the year. The show began with American artist and co-host Thomas Rhett being dubbed an honorary Canadian by Edmonton Oilers players Corey Perry and Leon Draisaitl. Rhett donned an Oilers jersey that was gifted to him by the pair. The return of k.d. lang and the Reclines is expected to be a highlight of the show. The appearance marks the first time the Alberta songstress has teamed up with the band in 35 years and is tied to lang's induction into the Canadian Music Hall of Fame. Singer MacKenzie Porter of Medicine Hat, Alta., is co-hosting the show with Rhett. Porter is up for six awards, including female artist of the year, as well as single and video of the year for “Chasin’ Tornadoes.” She's tied with Jade Eagleson of Bailieboro, Ont., who is also nominated for best single for “Rodeo Queen” and top album for “Do It Anyway.” Tenille Townes is defending her title of best female artist after winning the prize in 2023 for the fifth consecutive year. The...

title: Duleep Trophy: Captain Abhimanyu Easwaran’s ton leads India B’s charge against India C
creator: Sentinel Digital Desk
content: Anantapur: India B captain Abhimanyu Easwaran carries the bat throughout day three’s play to be unbeaten on 143 off 262 balls as the side reached 309/7 at stumps against India C in their Duleep Trophy second round match at the Rural Development Trust Stadium ‘B’ on Saturday. But with just one day of play left, the match is headed for a draw as India B still trail India C by 216 runs. Resuming day three from 124/0, N Jagadeesan could only add three runs to his overnight score of 67 before being caught behind by wicketkeeper Abishek Porel off pacer Anshul Kamboj, who brought the 129-run opening stand to an end. Kamboj struck again when he trapped Musheer Khan lbw for just one off 15 balls and went on to dismiss his elder brother Sarfaraz Khan in the same fashion for 16. From the other end, looked to bat through, hitting his shots while being solid in his defence to be unbeaten on 80 at lunch. Post lunch, Kamboj continued to hurt India B as he had Rinku Singh caught at mid-off for just six. The pacer soon completed his five-wicket haul by castling Nitish Kumar Reddy. But from the other end, Easwaran was undeterred in his quest to lead the charge for India B and brought up his 24th first-class century in 178 balls. But India B continued to be in deep trouble as Vijayakumar Vyshak had Washington Sundar caught at silly mid-off for 13, while Mayank Markande trapped R Sai Kishore lbw for 21. Chahar entertained the Anantapur crowd with a four and a six to be unbeaten on 18 as he gave...

title: செப் 15: பெட்ரோல் விலை 100.75, டீசல் விலை 92.34க்கு விற்பனை
content: சென்னை: பெட்ரோல் மற்றும் டீசல் விலை தினமும் மாற்றி அமைக்கப்படுகிறது. அதன் அடிப்படையில் இன்றைய பெட்ரோல் விலை லிட்டருக்கு ரூ.100.75 ஆகவும், டீசல் விலை லிட்டருக்கு ரூ.92.34 -ஆகவும் நிர்ணயம் செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளது. இந்த விலை இன்று காலை 6 மணி முதல் அமலுக்கு வந்தது

title: Mom selling Taylor Swift tickets she got for daughter's birthday, citing popstar's Harris endorsement
content: Hopefully, her daughter can shake this off. A mom is selling three Taylor Swift tickets she bought for her daughter's 13th birthday, citing the megastar's endorsement of Democratic nominee Kamala Harris while explaining her decision. In a viral video circulating on social media, the woman reveals that is putting her three tickets for the Toronto leg of the Eras tour on sale because she no longer wants to support Swift and her "non-Christian beliefs." 4 A mom shared that she would be selling three Taylor Swift tickets she bought for her daughter's 13th birthday, citing the singer's endorsement of democratic nominee Kamala Harris. @TheThe1776/X "Hi, this message is for Taylor Swift," the mom said. "Although I know it's probably a long shot and it'll never get to you, hey, worth a shot." "My tickets are now up for sale because I don't want to spend another dollar supporting you and your private planes and your... Yvonne Juris

title: Jewish reggae star Matisyahu reflects on tumultous year, says anti-Israel protesters attracted to 'darkness' of Hamas
content: After being thrown out of festivals, dropped by his manager and railed against by anti-Israel mobs, reggae star Matisyahu says the backlash over his support for the Jewish state hasn't slowed him down at all. In fact, the 45-year-old Jewish performer says he's "busier than ever." "The Jewish community has been really appreciative and I've felt inspired by it," the pop star, whose birth name is Matthew Miller, told The Post on the deck of his rustic upstate New York home overlooking the Hudson River. 4 Ex-Hasidic Reggae singer Matisyahu at home has been thrown out of festivals, dropped by his manager. Michael Falco 4 Matisyahu performs onstage in 2008. FilmMagic Matisyahu admitted it hasn't been all peaches and cream — he's had concerts in Arizona, New Mexico and Chicago canceled after anti-Israel demonstrators threatened to picket the venues. He was also dropped by his manager after he refused to change the lyrics to his song "Ascent," which contains phrases about dancing on Hamas terrorists'... David Spector

title: Exclusive | 'Jersey Shore' star Sammi 'Sweetheart' Giancola opens up about her IVF journey: 'I will be devastated if it doesn't work'
content: It's the sweetest itch. "Jersey Shore: Family Vacation" star Samantha "Sammi Sweetheart" Giancola wants a baby — and she described her deeply personal IVF journey to The Post in an exclusive interview. The 37-year-old got engaged in March and has spent the last year undergoing in-vitro fertilization treatments, which will be a focus of Part 2 of Season 7 of the MTV series, which premieres on Sept. 19. "I'm really a private person, so this is kind of new for me. I feel weird, I guess, showing the world this aspect of my life. But it's real and it's what I'm going through," she said. The Hazlet, NJ native said she didn't allow cameras to film her doctor appointments, but viewers will see her giving herself hormone injections — and revealing to her castmates she's trying to get pregnant. 3 "I'm really a private person, so this is kind of new for me. I feel weird, I guess, showing the world this aspect of my life. But it's real and it's what I'm going through," Giancola told The Post. Aristide Economopoulos "I wanted to keep it a secret because at first I was like, 'Listen, I don't know if the outcome is what I want... Angela Barbuti

title: Jane's Addiction frontman Perry Farrell punches guitarist Dave Navarro onstage, abruptly ending Boston concert
content: Jane's Addiction frontman Perry Farrell punched guitarist Dave Navarro during an on-stage outburst as several crew members dragged him off stage and abruptly ended the reunited band's Boston concert on Friday night. Farrell was in the middle of performing "Ocean Size" when he started angrily grunting and telling the crowd at the Leader Bank Pavillion "f–k you" before screaming into the microphone. 5 Jane's Addiction frontman Perry Farrell punched guitarist Dave Navarro during an on-stage outburst as several crew members dragged him off stage and abruptly ended the Boston concert on Friday night. Getty Images 5 Frontman Perry Farrell gets in the face of guitarist Dave Navarro during a Jane's Addiction concert in Boston on Friday. YouTube Farrell, seemingly agitated, then turned to Navarro on his right where he again screamed and threw his shoulder into the unsuspecting guitarist, according to a video of the awkward clash posted to social media. The two rockers confronted each other while Farrell inched closer into the face of Navarro, who calmly held him back with his right arm. Farrell in turn throws to elbow jabs at the guitarist when multiple crew and bandmates, including bassist Eric Avery, run up and restrain the "Been Caught Stealing" singer telling him to "stop." The lights lowered on stage, but several punches were thrown as the hot-headed singer was escorted away from the crowd's view. The remaining three band members — Navarro, Avery and drummer Stephen Perkins —...

title: Exclusive | 'Tulsa King' star Michael Beach was really hoping not to get TKO'd by Sylvester Stallone's character
content: He didn't want a Mob hit. "Tulsa King" star Michael Beach was hoping not to get TKO'd by Sylvester Stallone's character Dwight, a NY Mafia capo exiled to Oklahoma, in the Paramount+ series, which premieres its second season Sunday. In Season 1, Beach's character, the father of Dwight's cab driver, confronts the displaced mob boss after he hires his son as his personal driver. 3 The character that Michael Beach (left) portrays is the dad of Sylvester Stallone's character's driver. Brian Douglas/Paramount+ "It's weird, the idea of going toe to toe with Sylvester Stallone. . . . You never know if he's about to punch you or something, that character, cause he's always knocking people out," Beach, 60, told The Post. The veteran actor, who landed his breakthrough role in the 1995 film "Waiting to Exhale" opposite Vanessa Williams, had never met Stallone, which made co-starring with him "surreal." "I'd never even been in his presence. It's definitely a career check because he's Sylvester Stallone. He's Rocky. I was a teenager when 'Rocky' came out," he gushed. On set, Stallone encouraged the cast to add comedic touches to the script — and had patience with those who were less experienced. "He's always trying to help people find the humor . . . 'Why don't you just try to say this.' And a lot of the people in his crew, some were not seasoned actors, and that didn't bother him at all," Beach said. "He was always just... Angela Barbuti

title: Want to own Bruce Lee's iconic 'Enter the Dragon' weapon? Here's what it'll cost you
content: Here's a chance to channel your inner ninja. An iconic pair of nunchaku brandished by martial arts legend Bruce Lee in the film classic "Enter the Dragon" are slated to go under the hammer Sept. 28. The seminal sticks — among a treasure trove of Lee memorabilia up for bid — are expected to fetch at least $50,000, according to Julien's Auctions of Beverly Hills. 5 Bruce Lee displays his martial arts skills using nunchaku in a scene from the iconic 1973 film "Enter the Dragon." Getty Images 5 The seminal sticks — among a treasure trove of Lee memorabilia up for bid — are expected to fetch at least $50,000, according to Julien's Auctions of Beverly Hills. Courtesy Everett Collection "Comprised of lightweight wood (or similar material), encased in durable foam, and reinforced with a resin-treated leather protective coating, Lee used these stunt nunchaku... Dean Balsamini

title: Perry Farrell's wife reveals reason behind Jane's Addiction concert brawl
content: She took to Instagram Saturday morning to give "a first person account of what happened on stage," claiming "there had been a lot of tension and animosity between the members" of the band. Jane's Addiction had just started playing their hit "Ocean Size" on stage at the Leader Bank Pavillion when the 65-year-old frontman became frustrated that the band was so much louder than his vocals that "he was screaming just to be heard." 3 Dave Navarro and Perry Farrell fight on stage during their Boston concert on Sept. 13, 2024 RMWhitaker/X "Perry's frustration had been mounting, night after night, he felt that the stage volume had been extremely loud and his voice was being drowned out by the band,"... Brooke Kato

title: 'Emily in Paris' star Ashley Park calls topless scene 'every actor's worst nightmare'
content: Ashley Park is speaking out on the "stressful" experience of filming topless scenes for "Emily in Paris." The 33-year-old's character, Mindy Chen, is an aspiring singer who embarks on a mission to raise money for her band to compete in Eurovision in the fourth season of the wildly popular Netflix show. In the eighth episode, she agrees to perform at Crazy Horse, a Parisian cabaret known for its nude female dancers. 4 Ashley Park attends the "Emily In Paris" Netflix Photocall at La Samaritaine on September 12, 2024. Getty Images 4 Ashley Park in the Netflix rom com "Emily in Paris." Netflix But Park wasn't quick to say "oui" to what came next. The "Only Murders in the Building" alum described performing the topless scene as "every actor's worst nightmare." "We have this recurrent memory of being... Alexandra Bellusci

title: Kate Winslet, 48, makes surprise sex confession: 'Juicier and sexier'
content: Kate Winslet isn't holding back. The 48-year-old recently revealed that she has enhanced her sex life by undergoing testosterone replacement therapy. Winslet, who tied the knot with her husband Edward Abel Smith in 2012, advised a listener on the "How To Fail" podcast Friday after they asked for tips on how to rediscover their sex drive. 4 Kate Winslet at the FYC event for "The Regime" held at Paramount Theatre on June 5, 2024 in Los Angeles, California. Variety via Getty Images The "Titanic" star admitted that she feels "sexy" again following the treatment, known as TRT, which is prescription-based and helps restore testosterone levels, per the Mayo Clinic. Winslet encouraged women who have seen their libido dip in recent times to check their testosterone levels as she believes that could be the culprit to a low sex drive. "Sometimes women have a real dip in libido because there might be stuff going on with their thyroid," she explained. "There could also be stuff going on with your level of testosterone." 4 Edward Abel Smith and Kate Winslet are seen leaving a... Alexandra Bellusci

title: Meghan Markle is a 'dictator' who 'terrifies' staff, has 'reduced grown men to tears,' bombshell Hollywood Reporter exposé claims
content: Meghan Markle appears to be in royally hot water. A bombshell new report alleges that the Duchess of Sussex, 43, terrifies her staff, with one source describing her as a "dictator in high heels" who has reduced "grown men to tears." The embarrassing exposé was published by The Hollywood Reporter on Friday, and is likely to rattle Markle and her husband, Prince Harry, who is celebrating his 40th birthday this weekend. "Everyone's terrified of Meghan," a source close to the couple alleged in the article, which examined high-turnover among the Sussex's staff. "She belittles people, she doesn't take advice. They're both poor decision-makers, they change their minds frequently. Harry is a very, very charming person — no airs at all — but he's very much an enabler. And she's just terrible." 4 Meghan Markle has been accused of 'terrifying' her staff in a damning new article published by The Hollywood Reporter. / SplashNews.com 4 Meghan Markle speaks during the 'Responsible Digital Future' forum in Bogota on August 15, 2024. AFP via Getty Images "She's absolutely relentless," another insider told the outlet. "She marches around... Alexandra Bellusci

title: Sexy stars are doing great work — and turning heads — at close to 60
content: In two weeks, Andrew Lloyd Webber's musical "Sunset Boulevard" will begin previews on Broadway. Based on Billy Wilder's 1950 cinema masterpiece, the show is about a reclusive actress named Norma Desmond who, at just 50 years old, has been completely abandoned by Hollywood and left to stew in a lonely mansion — all but forgotten by millions of fans. That tragic story is the quintessential expression of a long-held truth: that the entertainment industry cannot abide women getting older. 4 Nicole Kidman stars alongside Harris Dickinson in "Babygirl." AP But, at the Toronto International Film Festival last week, you could feel the ground shifting — and hardly at the expense of enjoyment or heat. The sexiest and most provocative movies coming to a theater near you star popular actresses hovering around age 60. More than once I wondered how these alluring performers were convinced to take on independent projects that don't exactly exude class and could expose them to potential ridicule if things went south. Maybe they needed a job, maybe they were enticed by charismatic directors, maybe they craved a sharp turn. Whatever the reason, their instincts were bang on. 4 Nicole Kidman won Best... Johnny Oleksinski

title: Jackson Arnold (3 total TDs), No. 15 Oklahoma top Tulane
creator: Field Level Media
content: Jackson Arnold threw for 169 yards and a touchdown and ran for 97 yards and another score as No. 15 Oklahoma held off Tulane 34-19 on Saturday in Norman, Okla. The Sooners were in a precarious position in the fourth after Tulane pulled within five. But then Billy Bowman Jr. pulled down a redirected Darian Mensah pass for an interception, giving Oklahoma the ball in Tulane territory. Then the Sooners (3-0), who had come up empty on four consecutive drives, finally showed some life. Arnold hit Deion Burks for a 20-yard gain to begin the drive, then three plays later, Arnold broke off a 24-yard touchdown run to give Oklahoma some breathing room. The Sooners' R Mason Thomas came up with two sacks on the next drive to all but seal the game. Thomas forced and recovered a fumble with less than two minutes left. Arnold finished 18-of-29 passing with one interception as the Sooners failed to reach 200 yards passing for the third consecutive game to start the season. Oklahoma hadn't thrown for less than 200 yards in three consecutive games since 2014. The Sooners outgained Tulane 349-279. Mensah was 14-of-32 passing for 166 yards, a touchdown and an interception while Makhi Hughes ran for 71 yards on 19 carries for the Green Wave (1-2). Earlier in the fourth quarter, Tulane brought pressure up the middle, forcing Arnold to quickly look for a receiver over the middle. Green Wave linebacker Tyler Grubbs stepped in front of Burks and had plenty of clear space in front of him, going 22...
