Arnold hit Deion Burks for a 20-yard gain to begin the drive, then three plays later, Arnold broke off a 24-yard touchdown run to give Oklahoma some breathing room. The Sooners' R Mason Thomas came up with two sacks on the next drive to all but seal the game. Thomas forced and recovered a fumble with less than two minutes left. Arnold finished 18-of-29 passing with one interception as the Sooners failed to reach 200 yards passing for the third consecutive game to start the season. Oklahoma hadn't thrown for less than 200 yards in three consecutive games since 2014. The Sooners outgained Tulane 349-279. Mensah was 14-of-32 passing for 166 yards, a touchdown and an interception while Makhi Hughes ran for 71 yards on 19 carries for the Green Wave (1-2). Earlier in the fourth quarter, Tulane brought pressure up the middle, forcing Arnold to quickly look for a receiver over the middle. Green Wave linebacker Tyler Grubbs stepped in front of Burks and had plenty of clear space in front of him, going 22...

title: Así debes cocinar la coliflor para aprovechar al máximo sus nutrientes
creator: MDZ Estar Mejor
content: La coliflor es muy valorada por su alto contenido de vitaminas, minerales y antioxidantes, sin embargo, una cocción inadecuada puede terminar con la pérdida de sus beneficios por lo que es importante saber cómo cocinar correctamente este vegetal para aprovechar al máximo sus nutrientes . Asimismo, una mala cocción podría afectar su textura original volviéndola blanda y con un gusto desagradable al paladar, por lo que es importante conocer el tiempo de cocción adecuado y cómo darte cuenta de que la coliflor está correctamente cocinada. La coliflor es una rica fuente de vitaminas, minerales y antioxidantes. Foto: Shutterstock Es importante limpiar de manera correcta la coliflor antes de cocinarla, por lo que es aconsejable cortarla en floretes pequeños o medianos para una mejor manipulación y que además la cocción sea pareja. Luego, debes lavar bien cada florete bajo agua para eliminar cualquier desecho de tierra, y para su desinfección es recomendable sumergir la coliflor en agua con vinagre blanco por unos minutos para descartar residuos tóxicos, y luego enjuagarlos nuevamente. Dependiendo del tamaño de los floretes y de la manera de cocinar , el promedio de cocción para que una coliflor sea firme pero tierna es de 7 a 10 minutos en agua hirviendo, aunque su textura puede cambiar si lo cocinas al vapor o en microondas. Si los floretes son pequeños, el tiempo de cocción debería ser más corto, de unos 5 a 7 minutos, aunque si has cortado la coliflor en...

title: Pengundian Nomor Urut Digelar di Halaman Kantor KPU Tala, Paslon Dibatasi Bawa Pendukung
content: - Pemilihan kepala daerah (pilkada) serentak 27 November 2024 terus mendekat. Tahapan demi tahapan juga terus bergulir. Merujuk data pada Komisi Pemilihan Umum (KPU) Kabupaten Tanahlaut (Tala), Kalimantan Selatan (Kalsel), Minggu (15/9/2024), pekan mendatang akan dilakukan penetapan kepala daerah dan pengundian . "Sesuai PKPU 8, penetapan paslon tanggal 22 September 2024 dan keesokan harinya pengundian nomor urut," sebut Fendi Haryadi, koordinator Divisi Teknis Penyelenggaraan Pemilu, . Penetapan paslon bupati/wakil bupati Tala, sebutnya, bertempat di aula kantor di kawasan Jalan A Syairani, Pelaihari. Sedangkan pengundian direncanakan bertempat di halaman depan kantor KPU setempat. Apakah paslon boleh membawa banyak pendukung? Fendi mengatakan pada tahap pengundian nomor urut, paslon boleh membawa pendukung, tapi dibatasi seperti saat pendaftaran beberapa waktu lalu. "Rencananya masing-masing calon boleh membawa pendukung 75 orang. Ini termasuk paslon dan partai pengusungnya," jelas Fendi. Sebagai informasi, di Tala ada dua paslon bupati/wabup yaitu H Rahmat Trianto-HM Zazuli (RaZa) yang diusung mayoritas partai politik peraih kursi di DPRD Tala yakni delapan partai. Jumlah total kursi 29. Paslon lainnya yaitu H Bambang Alamsyah-Ikhwan Khariri (BAIK) yang diusung satu partai yaitu Partai Demokrasi Indonesia Perjuangan PDIP) yang punya enam kursi di DPRD Tala.

title: 膝負傷のパッカーズQBラブがコルツ戦に向けてダウトフルにダウングレード
creator: NFL JAPAN.COM
content: グリーンベイ・パッカーズのクオーターバック(QB)ジョーダン・ラブがMCL(内側側副靭帯/ないそくそくふくじんたい)の捻挫から9日後に奇跡的な先発出場を果たす可能性は低くなっている。 現地14日(土)、ラブのステータスがクエッショナブルからダウトフルにダウングレードされ、ラブが前回の試合で見舞われた膝のケガを抱えた状態で日曜日に行われるインディアナポリス・コルツ戦に出場する可能性はますます低くなった。 ラブはシーズン第1週に敗れたフィラデルフィア・イーグルス戦でMCLを捻挫し、回復にかかる期間は3週間から6週間と見込まれていると『NFL Network(NFLネットワーク)』のイアン・ラポポートとトム・ペリセロが報じていた。 パッカーズは少なくとも4試合の欠場が余儀なくされる故障者リザーブ(IR)への登録を見送っており、これはラブが比較的早く復帰できるとチームが考えていることを示唆していた。また、ヘッドコーチ(HC)マット・ラフルアーは1週間を通してラブがコルツ戦に出場する可能性を否定せず、金曜日にはラブが“いい調子”で毎日良くなっていると述べていたが、その後チームがラブをクエッショナブルとして登録した。 ラブの取り組みが次の試合で実際にフィールド復帰するのに十分かどうかは分からないが、土曜日のニュースはその可能性がますます低くなっていることを示している。 ラブが日曜日に欠場する場合、QBマリク・ウィリスが先発する予定だ。ウィリスのバックアップは、土曜日に練習生から昇格したショーン・クリフォードが務めることになる。 【RA】

title: إحصائيات بالمر أمام بورنموث
content: هاي كورة _ شارك النجم كول بالمر أساسيًا أمام بورنموث، ونال تقييمًا مرتفعًا بلغ ٧.١. إليكم أبرز أرقام بالمر ضد بورنموث: لعب: ٩٠ دقيقة. لمس الكرة: ٥٠. التمريرات: ٣٠ منها ٢٥ صحيحة. دقة التمرير: ٨٣%. التمريرات المفتاحية: ١. الكرات الطويلة الناجحة: ٢ من أصل ٢. المراوغات الناجحة: ٢ من أصل ٣. المواجهات الثنائية الناجحة: ٨ من أصل ١١. أخطاء مرتكبة ضده: ٤. استخلاص الكرة: ٣.

title: Hyderabad Prepares for Grand Ganesh Idols Procession: Final Inspections Conducted
creator: The Hans India
content: Hyderabad: With just 72 hours remaining until the final procession and immersion of Ganesh idols, the Hyderabad City Police are making meticulous preparations to ensure a smooth and successful event. A joint route inspection, involving multiple departments, was conducted on September 14, featuring key officials including Dr. Jitender, IPS, DGP of Telangana; Sri C.V. Anand, IPS, Commissioner of Police, Hyderabad City; and Ms. Amrapali Kata, IAS, Commissioner of GHMC, among others. The inspection began at the renowned Balapur Ganesh Temple and traversed a significant 19-kilometer route leading to Hussain Sagar. Key locations along the procession route included Chandrayanagutta, Falaknuma, Charminar, Nayapool, MJ Market, and the Telugu Talli Flyover. DGP Dr. Jitender emphasized the need for impeccable coordination among all officials to address any outstanding issues, while CP C.V. Anand highlighted the critical role of the City Police as the nodal department to facilitate the smooth movement of the procession. The inspection team examined specific points along the route, including Rajesh Medical Hall, Gulzar Houz, M.J. Market Junction, and Telugu Thalli Junction, assessing both the Law & Order and Traffic divisions' roles in managing the crowds and processions effectively. Officers were reminded about the importance of timely idol movements from various zones, along with the need to maintain en-route height restrictions and junction clearances. In a strong show of support, the...

title: Adams is still in blessing business with ‘Sunny Days’
content: New York, Sept. 15: If happiness is a journey, rather than a destination, then Yolanda Adams has used her faith and smile to sustain her through life’s ebbs and flows along the way. “I think I was born with that happiness gene that people talk about,” said the gospel music superstar. “I want people to come away feeling better about themselves ... I’ve had my days where I was up, I’ve had my days where I was down. But at the end of the day, the one lesson that I learned in each of those scenarios is that this too shall pass.” That theme permeates her new album, “Sunny Days.” It is her first studio project in nearly 13 years. “The way you look at everything has a lot to do with how you get through everything,” said the four-time Grammy winner with the soaring voice. The 15-track project was created during a six-year period, delayed due to the COVID-19 pandemic and her role in the TV drama, “Kingdom Business.” “Sunny Days” features writing and production from gospel giant Donald Lawrence and Rock & Roll Hall of Famers Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis, whose work with Babyface also contributed to the delay. The album is led by “Church Doors” which sits at No. 9 on Billboard’s Hot Gospel Songs after just one week. As she’s done throughout her career, Adams uses her musical gift of encouragement on songs like the title track, “Blessings” and “Powerful,” which has a spoken word intro saying, “The power’s within you / Take the time to decide / If you’ll shine bright / Or let someone else...

title: Депутат Немкин предупредил о мошенничестве с приложениями для здоровья
content: По его словам, мошенничество с поддельными приложениями для здоровья стало еще одной распространенной угрозой, пишет РИА Новости . Злоумышленники создают фальшивые мобильные приложения, которые якобы помогают следить за здоровьем, отслеживать физическую активность или вести дневник питания, отметил Немкин. Эти приложения могут запрашивать доступ к конфиденциальным данным, например, к истории медицинских обращений или даже к банковским данным под предлогом покупки премиум-функций, пояснил собеседник агентства. Ранее Антон Немкин рассказал о махинациях с QR-кодами . Например, мошенники могут подменить QR-код, и вместо оплаты услуги деньги уйдут на счет преступников. Либо злоумышленники могут отправлять поддельные QR-коды, предлагая перейти по ссылке для якобы получения выигрыша или скидки. Учредитель ФГБУ «Редакция «Российской газеты» Главный редактор В.А. Фронин Редакция не несет ответственности за мнения, высказанные в комментариях читателей. © 1998- 2024 ФГБУ «Редакция «Российской газеты»

title: Fahmi: Patriotism must be instilled beyond National Month, Rukun Negara key to unity
content: KOTA KINABALU, Sept 15 — The spirit of patriotism must not only be felt and celebrated during the National Month but, instead, it should be instilled in the hearts of all Malaysians at all times, said Communications Minister Fahmi Fadzil. To achieve this goal, he said Malaysians must understand and appreciate the true meaning of the Rukun Negara and the national anthem of NegaraKu, instead of just being proud to possess the Malaysian identity card. “Need to strive harder and, here, I need the help of everyone in the MADANI Community to give meaning to the Rukun Negara,” he said when officiating the launch of the One House One Jalur Gemilang Initiative of the Security Cluster at the Kota Kinabalu District Police Headquarters here yesterday. Also present was Sabah Police Commissioner Datuk Jauteh Dikun. Fahmi, also the 2024 Malaysia Day Celebration Main Committee chairman, said one of Malaysia’s greatest assets is its people, who come from diverse backgrounds and live peacefully, harmoniously and freely in one country. He said this is the legacy of previous generations, especially leaders who worked to gain independence for the country, which must be defended and appreciated for the future of the nation. Fahmi said the country’s economic situation is becoming increasingly positive, with investor perceptions improving and more tourists coming in. “With the people benefitting from all these, we hope they will be happier with the peace that they are enjoying,” he said. — Bernama

title: Top priority to Vijayawada airport: Ram Mohan
creator: Md Ameen
content: Civil aviation minister K Ram Mohan Naidu along with Machilipatnam MP V Balashowri, excise minister Kollu Ravindra and others launches Vijayawada-New Delhi IndiGo service on Saturday Vijayawada: Civil aviation minister Kinjarapu Ram Mohan Naidu said Vijayawada international airport new terminal building construction works will be completed in one year and some more domestic and international flight services will be started from the airport. He, along with prohibition and excise minister Kollu Ravindra, Parliament members and Gannavaram MLA inaugurated Vijayawada-Delhi IndiGo flight services on Saturday at Gannavaram and addressed the gathering. The minister also inaugurated the approach road from national highway to international terminal. The Union minister said that he was giving priority to the development of Vijayawada airport after he assumed charge as the civil aviation minister. “Vijayawada airport will be developed as per the instructions of Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu so that Andhra Pradesh will be developed with the air connectivity to various places in the country and abroad. Four new services have been launched from Vijayawada airport after the NDA government was formed three months ago in the state. Two services were launched to Mumbai, one to Bengaluru and one service to Delhi,” he said. The minister said efforts were on to operate services from Vijayawada to Dubai and Singapore and it will be beneficial to a large number of flight passengers. He said...

title: รอก่อน! คลังเลื่อนลงทะเบียน ‘ดิจิทัลวอลเล็ต’ กลุ่มไม่มีสมาร์ทโฟน จาก 16 ก.ย. ออกไปก่อน
creator: NAPAPORN PANITCHART
content: นายจุลพันธ์ อมรวิวัฒน์ รัฐมนตรีช่วยว่าการ กระทรวงการคลัง เปิดเผยว่า ตามที่กระทรวงการคลังกําหนดเปิดลงทะเบียนโครงการดิจิทัล วอลเล็ต สําหรับกลุ่มที่ไม่มีสมาร์ทโฟน ผ่าน 3 ธนาคารรัฐ ได้แก่ ธนาคารออมสิน ธนาคารเพื่อการเกษตรและสหกรณ์การเกษตร (ธ.ก.ส.) และธนาคารอาคารสงเคราะห์ (ธอส.) ในวันที่ 16 กันยายน 2567 ทั้งนี้ กระทรวงการคลังขอเลื่อนการลงทะเบียนเข้าร่วมโครงการเติมเงิน 10,000 บาท ผ่านดิจิทัลวอลเล็ต กลุ่มไม่มีสมาร์ทโฟนออกไปก่อน เนื่องจากต้องให้กระบวนการจ่ายเงินในเฟสแรก สําหรับกลุ่มเปราะบาง 14.5 ล้านคนเรียบร้อยก่อน ตอนนี้ยังไม่ได้กําหนดวันว่าจะเปิดให้ลงทะเบียนอีกครั้งเมื่อใด แต่ยืนยันว่าไม่นาน อาจจะครึ่งเดือน หรือเดือนหนึ่งจากนี้ ละแยืนยันว่าไม่เกี่ยวกับประเด็นที่รัฐบาลไม่มีงบประมาณ หรือระบบไม่มีความพร้อมดําเนินการแต่อย่างใด นายจุลพันธ์ กล่าวว่า ขอให้ประชาชนที่ลงทะเบียนผ่านแอปพลิเคชันทางรัฐไม่ต้องกังวลใจ เพราะรัฐบาลจะเดินหน้าโครงการต่ออย่างแน่นอน ไม่มีอะไรต้องเป็นห่วง ทุกอย่างพร้อมหมดแล้ว รวมทั้งงบประมาณ ที่ขณะนี้มีแล้ว 1.8 แสนล้านบาท ซึ่งเพียงพอที่ดําเนินโครงการฯ รองรับทั้งระบบ ส่วนจะจ่ายแบบครั้งเดียว 10,000 บาท หรือแบ่งจ่ายเป็นเงินสด และดิจิทัล ครั้งและ 5,000 บาท ขอรออดูยอดหลังปิดการลงทะเบียนก่อน แต่ติดว่าไม่เกินตามที่รัฐบาลประมาณการไว้ อ่านข่าวเพิ่มเติม ติดตามเราได้ที่

title: Evacuan 3 cuerpos tras choque entre policía fronteriza y asaltantes de migrantes en DariénEFE
creator: EFE
content: Ciudad de Panamá – La policía fronteriza Panamá informó este sábado de la evacuación de tres cuerpos, entre ellos el de un migrante haitiano, después de que el pasado 11 de septiembre mataran a dos delincuentes que robaban a transeúntes mientras cruzaban la densa selva del Darién, la frontera con Colombia, en su camino hacia Norteamérica. El Servicio Nacional de Fronteras (Senafront) de Panamá informó en un breve comunicado que entre «los cuerpos evacuados se encuentra un ciudadano haitiano y dos individuos que abrieron fuego contra las fuerzas especiales» de esa policía fronteriza. El migrante de Haití falleció al «momento de ser atracado» por los asaltantes, previo al enfrentamiento entre los mismos y las unidades especiales de esa policía, según explicó a EFE una fuente del Senafront. La recuperación de las víctimas, indica el documento, «tomó tres días debido a las difíciles condiciones del terreno selvático» y se realizó junto con el Ministerio Público (MP/Fiscalía), que «continuará con las investigaciones». El pasado 11 de septiembre, las unidades de las fuerzas especiales del Senafront mataron a dos delincuentes que robaban a migrantes mientras cruzaban el Darién, la selva fronteriza entre Panamá y Colombia usada a diario como ruta migratoria. El suceso ocurrió cuando los agentes realizaban una patrulla en un sector de la comarca de la etnia Emberá Wounaan (ubicada dentro de Darién), donde estaba un grupo de personas «que abrieron...

title: Multicampeão com Real detona Vini Jr. por fazer gesto de 'silêncio' para torcida: 'Joga pedras no próprio telhado'
creator: ESPN.com.br
content: Apesar de ter feito o 1o gol e sofrido o pênalti no 2o tento da vitória por 2 a 0 do Real Madrid sobre a Real Sociedad , neste sábado (14), por LALIGA , o atacante Vinicius Jr. terminou a partida sendo duramente criticado por Predrag Mijatovic , ex-jogador merengue e hoje comentarista da rádio espanhola Cadena SER . O montenegrino, que foi campeão do Espanhol, da Champions e do Mundial entre 1996 e 1999 com os blancos , detonou o "Malvadeza" por ter comemorado seu gol fazendo gesto de "silêncio" para a torcida do time da casa, que vinha vaiando o atleta durante toda a partida. Na opinião de Mijatovic, o brasileiro deveria ter se controlado e evitar entrar em conflito com os fãs da Sociedad. "(Vinicius) Está jogando pedras no próprio telhado", disparou o ex-atacante. "Ele segue atirando pedras, mesmo sabendo que tudo o que está acontecendo ao seu redor. Ele deveria dar esse passo à frente e ficar um pouquinho mais tranquilo em campo", seguiu. Falando como torcedor do Real Madrid, Mijatovic também afirmou que muitos merengues estão ficando irritados com a constante busca de Vini Jr. pelo embate. title: Xoldra y OUR Fest marcaron el ritmo de los ourensanos
creator: La Región
content: Ourense vibró este sábado a golpe de festival y es que el Xoldra de Aguiar y el OUR Fest llenaron de música, baile y mucha diversión la tarde-noche del sábado. El campo de Os Gozos, en Pereiro de Aguiar , fue de nuevo el escenario escogido para esta celebración con la que se persigue poner en valor el rural y su relación con la cultura y las fiestas populares. Así, en un ambiente familiar, niños, padres y abuelos, disfrutaron de la música, el baile, los juegos y también de la buena gastronomía. Además de apostar por la música tradicional y la cultura del rural, esta iniciativa también tiene un fin solidario, ya que parte del coste de la entrada (5 euros) se destina al Banco de Alimentos del Concello de Pereiro de Aguiar, mientras que para los menores de 10 años el acceso al recinto fue totalmente gratuito. Con un cartel 100% gallego, Cé Orquestra Pantasma, Los Camachuelos, O Sonoro Maxín y Luar na Lubre no faltaron a su cita ante un público muy animoso que no dejó de bailar en todo momento. Al igual que en los cientos de romerías de toda Galicia, no faltó la gastronomía, contando los asistentes con un servicio de comida típica de las fiestas y ferias y, por supuesto, de una pulpeira. Los más pequeños también disfrutaron con las actividades organizadas por los grupos de animación. El toque internacional a la tarde musical lo puso el OUR Fest. Expourense acogió la tercera edición donde se dieron cita artistas de talla internacional como Jake Bugg...

title: Pameran GSI Dorong Pertumbuhan Ekonomi dengan Dukungan kepada Pengusaha Lokal
creator: Gilang Akbar Prambadi
content: REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA -- Global Sources Indonesia, sebagai pameran dagang produk elektronik dan lifestyle kembali hadir tahun ini untuk memberikan kontribusi signifikan dalam peningkatan perekonomian Indonesia. Acara ini dirancang untuk membantu pengusaha lokal mengembangkan bisnis mereka dengan menstimulasi hubungan dagang dan kerjasama antara Indonesia dengan berbagai negara di dunia. Dalam beberapa tahun terakhir, ekonomi Indonesia telah menunjukkan pertumbuhan yang signifikan, didorong oleh inovasi dan semangat kewirausahaan yang semakin berkembang di kalangan pengusaha lokal. Global Sources Indonesia hadir sebagai platform yang ideal untuk mempertemukan pemilik bisnis, distributor, importir, dan retailer dengan produsen, supplier, dan mitra bisnis dari negara lain termasuk Tiongkok, Korea Selatan, Taiwan, dan Hong Kong untuk menjalin kerjasama strategis yang dapat mendorong ekspanis bisnis dan meningkatkan daya saing global. Ketua Umum Asosiasi Pengusaha Teknologi Informasi dan Komunikasi Nasional (APTIKNAS) Soegiharto Santoso mengatakan, acara Global Sources Indonesia 2024 bukan hanya menjadi ajang kolaborasi untuk mendorong pertumbuhan ekonomi di Indonesia tapi juga membantu pengusaha lokal dalam pencarian barang dengan lebih mudah dan murah. "Global Sources Indonesia tak hanya mendorong pertumbuhan ekonomi, tapi juga mempermudah aksesbilitas pengusaha elektronik untuk bertemu dengan supplier dan produsen produk elektronik dalam pencarian produk baru, dan...

title: Hoa hậu Kỳ Duyên không phải là người duy nhất tạo nên lịch sử
content: Việc Nguyễn Cao Kỳ Duyên bước lên ngôi vị cao nhất tại cuộc thi đang nhận được nhiều phản hồi tích cực của fan sắc đẹp. Cô gái đến từ Nam Định đã thực hiện được ước nguyện của mình sau nhiều năm ấp ủ. Như vậy Hoa hậu Kỳ Duyên là cô gái đăng quang hai cuộc thi nhan sắc lớn trong nước. Vào năm 2014, cô vượt qua nhiều đối thủ nặng ký như Phạm Hương, Huyền My để đăng quang Hoa hậu Việt Nam 2014. Và 10 năm sau, cô gái tiếp tục đăng quang Miss Universe Vietnam 2024. Câu chuyện không từ bỏ ước mơ, dám gác lại đỉnh cao một thời để trả mình về con số 0. Đặc biệt là việc chấp nhận làm thí sinh tại một cuộc thi "sinh sau đẻ muộn" như bao cô gái trẻ khác của Kỳ Duyên đã truyền cảm hứng tới rất nhiều người. Và Kỳ Duyên chỉ có vẻn vẹn 45 ngày để chuẩn bị tất cả mọi thứ trước ngày khởi hành sang Mexico. Chiến thắng này của cô cũng giúp cô có thêm cơ hội xuất ngoại sau nhiều năm bị ngâm giấm. Tuy nhiên, Hoa hậu Kỳ Duyên không phải là trường hợp duy nhất tạo nên lịch sử Hoa hậu thi lại hoa hậu vẫn đăng quang. Trước đó, đàn chị Nguyễn Thiên Nga cũng từng đăng quang Hoa hậu báo Tiền Phong chính là tiền thân của cuộc thi Hoa hậu Việt Nam. Sau 3 năm giữ chiếc vương miện danh giá, cô tranh tài...

title: Venezuela says it arrested 6 foreigners allegedly involved in a plot to kill President Maduro
creator: By MANUEL RUEDA - Associated Press
content: BOGOTA, Colombia (AP) — Three Americans, two Spaniards and a Czech citizen were arrested Saturday after Venezuelan officials accused them of coming to the South American country to assassinate President Nicolas Maduro . The arrests were announced on state television by Diosdado Cabello, the nation's powerful interior minister. Cabello said the foreign citizens were part of a CIA-led plot to overthrow the Venezuelan government and kill several members of its leadership. In the television program, Cabello showed images of rifles that he said were confiscated from some of the plotters of the alleged plan. The arrest of the American citizens included a member of the Navy, who Cabello identified as Wilbert Joseph Castañeda Gomez. Cabello said that Gomez was a former navy seal who had served in Afghanistan, Iraq and Colombia. Spain's embassy in Venezuela did not reply to a request for comment on the arrests of its citizens. The U.S. State Department late Saturday confirmed the detention of a U.S. military member and said it was aware of “unconfirmed reports of two additional U.S. citizens detained in Venezuela.” “Any claims of U.S. involvement in a plot to overthrow Maduro are categorically false. The United States continues to support a democratic solution to the political crisis in Venezuela,” the statement said. The announcement of the arrests comes just two days after the U.S. Treasury imposed sanctions on 16 allies of Maduro who were accused by the U.S. government of...

title: RNAAS: Небольшой астероид станет временным спутником Земли в течение 53 дней
content: RNAAS: Небольшой астероид станет временным спутником Земли в течение 53 дней Tекст: Вера Басилая Астрономы из Мадридского университета Комплутенсе, изучив траекторию астероида 2024 PT5, пришли к выводу, что он будет захвачен гравитацией, и в течение примерно 53 дней будет обращаться вокруг Земли. После этого космический объект покинет околоземное пространство и продолжит свое движение по Солнечной системе, пишет «Газета.Ru» . Согласно данным ученых, астероид 2024 PT5 имеет относительно небольшие размеры и, скорее всего, является фрагментом более крупного космического тела. Его происхождение связывают с поясом астероидов Арджуна, расположенным между орбитами Марса и Юпитера. Предыдущие наблюдения показали, что многие астероиды попадают на эллиптические траектории вокруг нашей планеты и остаются на них в течение некоторого времени.

title: Lũ rút rất chậm, ngập lụt thêm nhiều ngày ở 8 tỉnh miền Bắc
content: Dù đã qua đỉnh lũ 2 - 3 ngày nhưng mực nước lũ trên 5 dòng sông gồm sông Cầu, sông Thương, sông Lục Nam, sông Hoàng Long và sông Thái Bình vẫn ở mức rất cao. Lúc 1h sáng nay, lũ trên sông Cầu tại Bắc Ninh vẫn cao 6,42m, trên mức báo động 3 . Nước chỉ rút đi 17cm sau 6 tiếng, từ 19h tối qua. Sông Hoàng Long cũng đang trên báo động 3 khi mực nước lúc 1h sáng nay tại Ninh Bình là 4,05m, trên báo động 3, chỉ giảm đi 10cm sau 6 tiếng. Sông Thương ở Bắc Giang sáng nay còn dưới báo động 3 là 36cm, sông Thái Bình ở Hải Dương xuống dưới báo động 2 là 12cm, sông Lục Nam dưới báo động 2 là 21cm. Dự báo, ngày hôm nay, trên 5 dòng sông này, lũ vẫn tiếp tục rút rất chậm. Lũ trên sông Cầu tại Đáp Cầu, sông Thương tại Phủ Lạng Thương, sông Hoàng Long tại Bến Đế tiếp tục ở mức trên báo động 2 dưới báo động 3. Lũ trên sông Lục Nam và sông Thái Bình ở trên mức báo động 1. Dự báo ngập lụt còn kéo dài ở 8 tỉnh miền Bắc. Trong ảnh là ngập lụt tại Sóc Sơn, Hà Nội. Ảnh: Trọng Tài. Trong đêm nay, lũ trên sông Cầu tại Đáp Cầu (Bắc Ninh) tiếp tục xuống nhưng vẫn trên mức báo động 2. Sông Thương tại Phủ Lạng Thương (Bắc Giang), sông Thái Bình tại Phả Lại (Hải Dương), sông Hoàng Long tại Bến Đế (Ninh Bình) tiếp...

title: 15 settembre 1578, la Sindone arriva a Torino: il telo di Gesù tra mistero e scienza
content: Firenze, 15 settembre 2024 – Era il quando la dal 1453, venne dalla famiglia Savoia. La tradizione lo identifica come il nel sepolcro, ma la storia della Sindone è segnata da tanti misteri, oltre che da continue controversie sull'autenticità della reliquia. La sindone (un , di forma rettangolare e dimensioni di circa 442x113 cm) porta l'immagine impressionante di quel corpo massacrato proprio come era avvenuto a Gesù secondo i Vangeli: si vede tutto, la carne dei muscoli tesi nella rigidità che accompagna le prime ore dopo la morte, il volto gonfio sotto l'effetto delle percosse, la pelle strappata dagli aculei del flagello. È visibile la di un uomo sottoposto a una serie di torture e infine crocifisso. Nella parte superiore e in quella inferiore l'immagine è segnata dalle che si sviluppò nel 1532 nella cappella del castello di Chambery, dove era custodito il lenzuolo ripiegato in una cassetta d'argento. degli imperatori bizantini durante il tremendo di Costantinopoli consumato durante la quarta crociata nel 1204, per alcuni secoli non si è saputo più nulla della Sacra Sindone. Un'ipotesi spiega che in quegli "anni oscuri" durante i quali le fonti storiche non parlano della sindone corrispondano in realtà al periodo in cui la reliquia fu custodita in assoluto segreto dai . Tutti gli storici ritengono documentata la storia della reliquia a partire dalla metà del XIV secolo, data della sua apparizione. Sulla sua storia precedente e sulla sua antichità non c'e'...

title: ≪J1アルビレックス新潟≫3ゴールで湘南に快勝し10位に浮上 エース谷口は10得点目で好調チームをけん引
content: 明治安田J1アルビレックス新潟は14日、ホームで湘南と対戦し3ゴールで快勝しました。 ホームに湘南を迎えたアルビレックス新潟は前半8分、こぼれ球に反応した小野が押し込み先制点を奪うと、32分にはペナルティエリア内でパスを受けた長倉がディフェンダーを交わし右足を振り抜きます。 これが決まり2点リードで試合を折り返すと、後半も勢いは止まらず30分、谷口がペナルティエリア手前からゴール左に狙いすましたシュート。 エースストライカーの今シーズン10得点目が決まり、3-1と快勝したアルビ、順位は10位に浮上しました。 次の試合は18日、アウェイで名古屋と対戦します。 新潟の最新ニュース、身近な話題、災害や事故の速報などを発信します。

title: Today Rashi Bhavishya : आजचे राशिभविष्य - 15 सप्टेंबर 2024
creator: सकाळ  वृत्तसेवा
content: मेष : आरोग्याच्या तक्रारी कमी होतील. तुमचे कार्यक्षेत्र वाढणार आहे. वृषभ : दैनंदिन कामे मार्गी लागतील. तुमच्या कार्यक्षेत्रात सुसंधी व प्रसिद्धी लाभेल. मिथुन : वाहने जपून चालवावीत. मनोबल कमी राहील. कर्क : आपल्या मतांविषयी आग्रही राहाल. प्रवास सुखकर होतील. सिंह : काहींचा मनोरंजनाकडे कल राहील. कोणाच्याही सहकार्याची अपेक्षा नको. कन्या : संततिसौख्य लाभेल. महत्त्वाची कामे मार्गी लागतील. तूळ : काहींना कामानिमित्त प्रवास होतील. हाती घेतलेल्या कामात सुयश लाभेल. वृश्‍चिक : नोकरी, व्यवसायात उत्तम स्थिती राहील. शत्रूपिडा नाही. धनू : कौटुंबिक जीवनात सुसंवाद साधाल. सामाजिक क्षेत्रात सहभागी व्हाल. मकर : वरिष्ठांचे सहकार्य लाभेल. मन आनंदी व आशावादी राहील. कुंभ : काहींचा धार्मिक कार्यात सहभाग होईल. वस्तू गहाळ होणार नाही याची दक्षता घ्यावी. मीन : अनेकांचे सहकार्य लाभेल. महत्त्वाचे पत्रव्यवहार पार पडतील.

title: Lần đầu tiên trong lịch sử, Hoa hậu Việt Nam 2014 sau 10 năm đăng quang Miss Universe Vietnam 2024
content: GĐXH - Top 10 Miss Universe Vietnam 2024 gọi tên nhiều gương mặt đã nằm trong dự đoán: Phí Phương Anh, Nguyễn Trà My, Vũ Thuý Quỳnh, Mlee và Nguyễn Cao Kỳ Duyên. Hành trình của Miss Universe Vietnam 2024 (Hoa hậu Hoàn vũ Việt Nam) khép lại bằng đêm chung kết diễn ra tại TP.HCM. Trải qua hơn 4 tiếng tổ chức với các phần thi hô tên, trình diễn bikini, trang phục dạ hội, phần thi thuyết trình, ứng xử, Miss Universe Vietnam 2024 đã tìm ra được người chiến thắng chung cuộc là người đẹp quen thuộc Nguyễn Cao Kỳ Duyên. Á hậu 1 gọi tên Nguyễn Quỳnh Anh và Á hậu 2 là Vũ Thúy Quỳnh. Khoảnh khắc Nguyễn Quỳnh Anh và Nguyễn Cao Kỳ Duyên hồi hộp chờ đợi được xướng tên Tân Miss Universe Vietnam 2024 Nguyễn Cao Kỳ Duyên đăng quang Miss Universe Vietnam 2024 Miss Universe Vietnam 2024 Nguyễn Cao Kỳ Duyên và 2 Á hậu: Nguyễn Quỳnh Anh, Vũ Thúy Quỳnh. Chia sẻ ngay sau khi nhận vương miện, Kỳ Duyên bày tỏ: "Trước đêm chung kết tôi đã đăng tải bài viết rằng sẽ dùng tiền thưởng tại Miss Universe Vietnam (nếu được) để ủng hộ bà con miền Bắc đang chịu ảnh hưởng của bão Yagi. Hiện tại, tôi xin trích 500 triệu đồng (trong 2 tỷ đồng) để thực hiện lời hứa. Mong rằng hành động này sẽ nhận được nhiều hưởng ứng, sẽ truyền cảm hứng cho nhiều...

title: The big swell on Smoky Cape
creator: Christien de Garis
content: I can’t believe what I’ve just heard. One of the biggest swells ever to hit is pummelling right up and down the New South Wales coast and I’ve just arrived where I thought I could experience the most ferocious illustration of its energy — Smoky Cape on the mid-north coast near South West Rocks. I’m not disappointed. Even though the sun is shining and the wind is coming from the west, producing an offshore groomed ocean surface, it’s an awesome sight looking down at the gigantic ocean swells that have travelled thousands of kilometres from a storm somewhere below Tasmania until their final explosive release of energy on the beach below. I’m thinking how scary it would be to be out in the middle of that. And that’s when I spot it, before I hear it. Erupting from beneath a mountainous unbroken wave, a whale breaches. Something else catches my eye further along the small cove. A pod of dolphins is riding the enormous surf below — truly in their element. And then I hear the whale siren — I can’t believe, in all that raw energy and chaos, hundreds of metres below, I hear it clear as day. This must have been everyday life for the former lighthouse keepers on Smoky Cape, and as I walk around the summit, I’ve discovered you can experience that life, with the keepers’ heritage cottages available for holiday accommodation. There are two cottages and a bed-and-breakfast with three ensuite rooms, all facing different stunning vistas around the cape. Ranging from $550-$750 per night...

title: 張度練與李洙赫的爆笑情境劇:我有曖昧的對象了!結尾爆笑大反轉~XD
creator: Mico
content: (封面圖源:youtube@TEO 테오) 一整集主持人張度練都在演我!李洙赫的任何表情舉動,都在牽動著萬千網友們的心啊~~~~。 人氣演員李洙赫為了宣傳新劇《于氏王后》而出演了張度練的網路綜藝《Salon Drip 2》,節目上展現的許多行為舉止都讓人更加為他著迷。 (圖源:IG@teo.universe) TEO(@teo.universe)分享的貼文 節目組的最後放了一個情境劇小彩蛋,張度練給出了讓李洙赫隨意發揮的指令,開頭就丟出震撼彈!! (圖源:youtube@TEO 테오) 張:「我們分手吧。」 李:「為什麼?」 張:「我有了曖昧的歐巴。」 李:「什麼時候的事?」 張稍微心動:「哦...」恢復冷靜後回:「有一段時間了。」 張度練想到自己是年上忍不住爆笑!XD(張度練1985年生;李洙赫1988年生) (圖源:youtube@TEO 테오) 張:「我曖昧的對象已經60歲了,還很健康。」 李:「那妳想怎麼做呢?」 (圖源:youtube@TEO 테오) 張:「喔...會分手的。」 李:「跟我嗎(分手)?。」 張:「不!是跟(曖昧的)那位分手。」、「還會祝他長命百歲的~XD」 (圖源:youtube@TEO 테오) 爆笑情境劇反轉再反轉,張度練每一次的機智提案,都被李洙赫充滿魅力的回應給瓦解。 하 이거 진짜 연하남같은 답변임 실제로도 도연님이 이수혁보다 연상인게 미치겠음 pic.twitter.com/HU3ZzlLRu1 ▼影片定位在結尾小彩蛋33:42。 對這一集有興趣的觀眾,也可以從頭開始看,感受一下李洙赫擺脫演員人設後,日常面貌所展現的獨特魅力~。 @leesoohyuk 分享的貼文 Mico@KSD / 非得本站書面同意 請勿抄襲、轉載、改寫或引述本站內容。如有違者,本站將予以追究

title: Corbin posts 2-2 mark during Capital City Classic
creator: By Les Dixon For the Times-Tribune
content: FRANKFORT — Despite not being able to have their regular season routine of practicing and playing games this past week to prepare for this weekend’s Capital City Classic, Krystal Jones’ Corbin Lady Redhounds still managed to turn in an impressive showing against some of the state’s top teams. Corbin (12-2) posted a 2-2 mark during its stay, recording wins over Danville Christian (25-8, 25-19) and Marion County (25-22, 25-21) while falling to Anderson County, Tenn. (25-14, 25-21), and Johnson Central (25-15, 25-22). “This weekend was a significant test for our team as we faced high-level competition outside of our region,” Jones said.Not being able to practice or play with the girls leading up to it definitely impacted us, and we got off to a slow start. “Despite the challenges, we were pleased with how the team managed to bounce back and regain some momentum later in the tournament,” she added. “We’re excited to get back in the gym, regroup, and prepare for Franklin County next week as we head into the 2A tournament.”

creator: Nick Judd
content: TOP STORY: Madrid prepared to wait for Davies are confident of landing left-back on a free transfer, according to . Davies has so far rejected any advances from Bayern to extend his contract, which is now in its final year. Moreover, from Jan. 1, he'll be able to talk to other clubs and sign a pre-contract agreement, with Madrid already confident of landing the international. had made moves to bring Davies to the Bernabeu last summer but Bayern weren't prepared to allow the defender to leave, a decision which means that they many now lose the player for nothing. Now, having had direct conversations with Davies, Madrid are prepared to continue with the players they have this season in the hope that Davies will follow through on his word and sign in January ahead of a move in July 2025. title: 경복대, 지역민과 함께하는 '커리어 페스티벌' 개최...9월25일
content: 경복대학교가 이달 25일 남양주캠퍼스 문화관·체육관에서 ‘2024 경복 Career Festival’을 개최한다. 이번 행사는 경복대 재학생과 졸업생뿐만 아니라 남양주 지역 시민도 함께한다. 경복대는 행사장에 학생 중심의 취창업 지원 강화를 위해 학과와 지역 및 우수산업체의 취업 연계 채용관을 운영한다. 또 대학과 지역사회 상생을 위한 다양한 이벤트 및 외국인 유학생의 정주를 위한 맞춤형 취업지원 프로그램도 제공한다. 경복대 관계자는 "올해 경복 Career Festival은 지역민 및 외국인 유학생에게 초점을 맞추고 풍성한 프로그램으로 진행될 예정"이라고 설명했다.

title: What the numbers tell us about Canelo Alvarez vs. Edgar Berlanga
content: will headline a boxing card in Las Vegas for the 18th time when he puts his WBC, WBO and WBA super middleweight world titles on the line against on Saturday night. The fight card at T-Mobile Arena also includes Erislandy Lara defending his WBA middleweight title against Danny Garcia and a super middleweight bout between Caleb Plant and Trevor McCumby for the vacant WBA interim title. Alvarez (61-2-2, 39 KOs) has held titles in four divisions, including the lineal championship at middleweight and super middleweight. Alvarez became the undisputed super middleweight champion by defeating Plant by 11th-round TKO in November 2021. He made four successful defenses before in July when Alvarez decided to face Berlanga instead of the IBF's mandatory challenger, William Scull. "I just want to show everyone that I'm still the best," Alvarez said during Wednesday's news conference in Las Vegas. "I still love this sport. When I stop loving it, you'll know. I love my routine and I love going to the gym every day." Berlanga (22-0, 17 KOs) has never fought for a world title. After starting his career 16-0, with all of his , Berlanga has scored just one stoppage in his past six victories. Berlanga, a heavy underdog (+900 per ESPN BET), knows he has to do something special to beat Alvarez, one of the best fighters in the world. "This is the opportunity of a lifetime," Berlanga said. "It's gonna be a firefight this weekend. ... I'm gonna make everyone a believer. We have Puerto Rico vs. Mexico...

title: Canelo Alvarez vs. Edgar Berlanga live results and analysis
content: will put his WBC, WBO and WBA super middleweight world titles on the line against Edgar Berlanga on Saturday at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. Alvarez (61-2-2, 39 KOs) was the undisputed champion at 168 pounds before the after Alvarez decided to face Berlanga instead of the organization's No. 1 mandatory challenger, William Scull. Alvarez, 34, has won titles in four divisions, and he's coming off a unanimous decision victory over in May. Since his loss to in May 2022 challenging for a light heavyweight title, Alvarez has won four consecutive fights, all by unanimous decisions. "This is a good fight for the fans," Alvarez said during an August news conference in New York to officially announce the fight. "I know he's going to come to bring everything, and I will too. It's the kind of fight I enjoy a lot. I can't wait." Berlanga (22-0, 17 KOs), ranked at No. 5 at super middleweight by ESPN, scored professional fights. Since then, he has scored only one KO in his past six fights, a sixth-round TKO of Padraig McCrory in February. This is the first title fight for the 27-year-old Berlanga. "Canelo is definitely going to bring the best out of me," Berlanga said. "Every time I step up, I step up my abilities. This fight is all about intelligence. We have to make sure we match him there. It's will versus will. We're not running. We're going to stay right there and we're going to do what we do." title: 사비로 회사 차린 조현아 "아깝지 않을 만큼 사랑하는 멤버들"
creator: 강주희 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스]강주희 기자 = 그룹 '어반자카파' 조현아가 사비로 회사를 운영했던 이유를 밝혀 눈길을 모았다. 14일 방송된 MBC TV 예능물 '전지적 참견 시점'에는 어반자카파 조현아, 권순일, 박용일이 함께 저녁을 먹으며 과거를 회상하는 모습이 그려졌다. 네 사람은 사진예술과였던 박용인이 사진을 직접 찍어 앨범을 만들었던 일이나 권순일이 괴외하던 학생이 앨범 커버를 만들어준 일들을 떠올리며 눈물을 흘렸다. 조현아는 "내가 그때 주택청약 깨서 80만 원으로 보도자료도 다 썼지 않냐"고 회상했다. 어려웠던 시기를 함께 했던 박용인과 권순일은 사비로 회사를 설립해 마음껏 음악을 할 수 있는 환경을 만들어진 조현아에게 고마움을 전했다. 스튜디오에서 이를 지켜본 전현무는 "원하는 대로 무대를 하고 싶어 개인 돈으로 한 거냐"고 물었다. 조현아는 "100% 그 이유 때문"이라며 "투자는 받으면 얼마든바 바로 받을 수 있는데 (멤버들이) 하고 싶은 것을 하게 해주는 것 이상으로 더 필요한 건 없다고 생각한다"고 말했다. 이어 "빚을 아직도 갚고 있다. 9개월 동안 헤어 메이크업 비용을 한 번을 못냈는데 정산하고 40만원이 통장에 있었다"며 "그것만으로도 너무 행복했다. 다 줘도 아깝지 않을 만큼 너무 사랑하는 멤버들"고 눈물을 흘렸다. 조현아는 매니저이자 함께 회사 '앤드류'를 공동 설립한 류호원 대표에게도 고마움을 표했다. 그는 멤버들에게 "대표님한테 어떤 사람이 우리 앞에서 막 쌍욕했던 것 기억나냐. 그때...

title: Rahm leads LIV Golf Chicago, closing in on points title
creator: Staff Writers
content: Jon Rahm has moved closer to two big paydays with a six-under 64 giving the Spaniard a one-shot lead in LIV Golf Chicago. Rahm tapped in for birdie on his final hole on Saturday, the par-5 third at Bolingbrook Golf Course, to lead Sergio Garcia (65) by one shot as he approaches the season points title. Rahm and Joaquin Niemann of Chile are the only players who can win the points title and the $US18 million ($A27 million) bonus. Niemann birdied his last two holes to salvage a 68 and was three shots behind Rahm going into the third and final round. "The goal is to win. If I do that, the rest takes care of itself," Rahm, who sits at seven under, said. "I felt like I did everything I needed to do right, committed to the shots that I needed to, and then executed really, really well. "Didn't miss a lot of fairways. That's a great key around here. Yeah, I think it wasn't until 1, which was my 16th, the only fairway I had missed was 14, and it was barely in the first cut." American Brooks Koepka, who opened with a 62 to build a four-shot lead after 18 holes, had six bogeys and had to make a 20-foot birdie putt on the last hole for a 73. He still was two shots behind. Poland's Adrian Meronk (65), Great Britain's Ian Poulter (68) and Niemann (68) are three back in a tie for fourth. Lucas Herbert (69) is joint-seventh at three under while fellow Australians Matt Jones (70) sits at three over, Marc Leishman (70) four over and Cameron Smith (73) six over. title: Rahm leads LIV Golf Chicago, closing in on points title
creator: Staff Writers
content: Jon Rahm has moved closer to two big paydays with a six-under 64 giving the Spaniard a one-shot lead in LIV Golf Chicago. Rahm tapped in for birdie on his final hole on Saturday, the par-5 third at Bolingbrook Golf Course, to lead Sergio Garcia (65) by one shot as he approaches the season points title. Rahm and Joaquin Niemann of Chile are the only players who can win the points title and the $US18 million ($A27 million) bonus. Niemann birdied his last two holes to salvage a 68 and was three shots behind Rahm going into the third and final round. "The goal is to win. If I do that, the rest takes care of itself," Rahm, who sits at seven under, said. "I felt like I did everything I needed to do right, committed to the shots that I needed to, and then executed really, really well. "Didn't miss a lot of fairways. That's a great key around here. Yeah, I think it wasn't until 1, which was my 16th, the only fairway I had missed was 14, and it was barely in the first cut." American Brooks Koepka, who opened with a 62 to build a four-shot lead after 18 holes, had six bogeys and had to make a 20-foot birdie putt on the last hole for a 73. He still was two shots behind. Poland's Adrian Meronk (65), Great Britain's Ian Poulter (68) and Niemann (68) are three back in a tie for fourth. Lucas Herbert (69) is joint-seventh at three under while fellow Australians Matt Jones (70) sits at three over, Marc Leishman (70) four over and Cameron Smith (73) six over. title: 꽃게의 계절이 돌아왔다...태안 꽃게잡이 한창
creator: 이호진
content: 꽃게의 계절이 돌아왔다...태안 꽃게잡이 한창 [앵커] 아직 많이 덥습니다만 우리가 계절이 바뀌고 있다는 것을 쉽게 알 수 있는 부분이 바로 먹거리입니다. 가을이 왔음을 알리는 먹거리가 있는데요. 바로 꽃게입니다. 충남 태안에서는 제철에 접어든 꽃게 잡이가 한창 이뤄지고 있습니다. 특히 올해는 어획량도 늘고 가격도 비교적 저렴해 인기를 끌 것으로 보입니다. 이호진 기자입니다. [기자] 아직 어둠이 가시지 않은 새벽 시간. 밤새 조업에 나섰던 배들이 항구로 들어옵니다. 어창에는 꽃게가 한가득 실려있습니다. 꽃게가 채워진 박스를 뜯자 수십마리가 쏟아져 나옵니다. 선별사들은 잠시도 쉬지 않고 움직이는 꽃게를 살피며 순식간에 상·중·하품으로 나눠 담습니다. 꽃게의 배를 봤을 때 이렇게 둥근 모양이면 암게, 이렇게 뾰족한 모양이면 수게로 암수를 구별할 수 있습니다. 가을에 잡히는 꽃게는 산란을 마친 암게보다 살이 꽉 찬 수게가 더 맛있다고 알려져 있습니다. 선별을 마친 꽃게는 곧바로 경매에 붙여집니다. 현란한 손동작으로 치열한 가격 경쟁이 이뤄지고 그렇게 꽃게가 식탁에 오를 준비를 마칩니다. 지난달 21일 꽃게 금어기가 해제되며 태안에서는 이렇게 매일 꽃게잡이가 이뤄지고 있습니다. 역설적이게도 기후변화로 인해 꽃게의 어획량이 늘고 있습니다. 꽃게는 난류성 어종으로 분류가 되는데, 바닷물 온도가 올라가면서 꽃게어장도 넓어졌습니다. "작년 대비 꽃게 크기도 커지고 품질도 좋아져서 시장 경쟁력은 조금...

title: [Trên Ghế 14] Vì sao người Việt toàn mua Ranger, Triton mới được và mất gì?
content: Dưới đây là phần trao đổi giữa host Đăng Việt và Lê Mạnh Linh về chủ đề: Mitsubitri Triton có chắc top 2 phân khúc bán tải tại Việt Nam? Tôi nghĩ rằng, không cần nói thì ai cũng biết lý do vì sao Ford Ranger lại là vua bán tải tại Việt Nam. Thị hiếu người tiêu dùng Việt Nam mua bán tải để đi uống cà phê và đi đường onroad là chủ yếu. Vì thế, ngoại hình là yếu tố cực kỳ quan trọng. Đó là lý do lớn nhất để trả lời cho câu hỏi vì sao Ford Ranger bán chạy. Tại Việt Nam, doanh số phân khúc bán tải luôn được ngầm hiểu là “Ranger và phần còn lại”. Thực tế thị trường không phải Ford Ranger bán được 1.000 xe, những chiếc xe bám buổi bán được 700-800 xe. Thậm chí, doanh số bán hàng của Ford Ranger có thời điểm gấp 3 lần tổng doanh số của các đối thủ cộng lại. Từ thế hệ trước, Triton luôn là cái mẫu bán tải bám đuổi doanh số ngay sau Ranger. Ở một vài thời điểm, Triton còn cạnh tranh với Hilux. Tuy nhiên, phân khúc bán tải nhiều lần chứng kiến Ranger về nhất sau đó là Triton rồi mới đến các mẫu xe khác. Từ thế hệ trước đến thế hệ mới nhất, Mitsubishi Triton luôn có những điểm mạnh so với phần còn lại trong phân khúc xe bán tải. Thứ nhất, Triton là xe có kích thước nhỏ gọn, trục cơ sở...

title: Hər gün banan yemək lazımdır
content: Banan bir çoxlarının sevdiyi meyvə növüdür. Çünki bu meyvə həm dadlı, həm də sağlamdır. Day.Az lent.az-a istinadən bildirir ki, banan həmçinin aclığın öhdəsindən tez gələ bilir. Bununla belə, gündə bir banan yeməyin yeganə səbəbi bu deyil. Bananın başqa üstünlükləri də var. Onları təqdim edirik: İdmançılar üçün Əgər müntəzəm məşq edirsinizsə, onda bananlar sizin üçün əsl lütf olacaq. Meyvə yemək məşqdən sonrakı ağrıları azaltmağa kömək edəcək. Banan daha effektiv məşq etməyə kömək edir. Stress Stress və əsəb gərginliyini necə idarə edəcəyinizi bilmirsinizsə, o zaman pəhrizinizə banan daxil etməlisiniz. Mənfi duyğuların öhdəsindən gəlməyə kömək edirlər. Məhsul sinir gərginliyini aradan qaldıra və yuxunu yaxşılaşdıra bilər. Oksidləşdirici stress Məhsulun oksidləşdirici stresslə mübarizədə təsirli olduğunu az adam bilir. Bunun sayəsində xarici və daxili yaşlanma yavaşlayır. Görmə və ürək Banan yeməklə qocalığa qədər görmə qabiliyyətinizi qoruya bilərsiniz. Məhsul ürək sağlamlığına da müsbət təsir göstərir. Ancaq meyvəni acqarına yemək olmaz.

title: Kapolsek Air Besar Ajak Warga Serimbu Jaga Keamanan Jelang Pilkada 2024
content: , Sabtu 14 September 2024. Kegiatan ini bertujuan untuk mendekatkan diri kepada masyarakat sekaligus memberikan arahan terkait keamanan jelang 2024. Dalam kesempatan tersebut, Kapolsek Air Besar berbaur dengan Kepala Dusun Hanura, Bapak Yasirin, serta tokoh pemuda Desa Serimbu, Devi. Kehadiran mereka disambut hangat oleh masyarakat setempat dengan senyuman dan suasana penuh kebersamaan. Dalam pertemuan ini, Kapolsek memberikan himbauan mengenai pentingnya menjaga stabilitas keamanan dan ketertiban, khususnya menjelang pelaksanaan Pilkada yang akan segera berlangsung. Kapolsek Air Besar IPTU Mohammad , SH, menyampaikan, “Kami mengajak seluruh elemen masyarakat untuk turut serta menjaga keamanan dan ketertiban menjelang 2024. Peran serta masyarakat sangat penting agar proses demokrasi dapat berjalan dengan aman dan damai."tutur nya Ia juga menambahkan, “Mari kita bersama-sama mencegah segala bentuk gangguan keamanan, termasuk tindakan provokasi dan penyebaran berita hoaks yang dapat merusak keharmonisan di tengah masyarakat.” jelas nya Kepala Dusun Hanura, Bapak Yasirin, menuturkan, "Kami sangat mendukung langkah yang diambil Kapolsek dan jajarannya. Kami akan berusaha semaksimal mungkin untuk menjaga ketertiban dan keamanan di desa kami, serta mengajak seluruh warga untuk tetap waspada dan bersikap bijak dalam menyikapi situasi jelang .

title: Espanhol: Áudio do VAR sobre pênalti contra Vinícius Júnior provoca polêmica
content: Campinas, SP, 14 – A vitória do Real Madrid sobre a Real Sociedad por 2 a 0 neste sábado deixou uma imagem polêmica no segundo pênalti da partida. À primeira vista, o juiz Martínez Munuera não apontou o lance, mas o árbitro Alejandro Hernández, que estava no VAR , pediu-lhe para ver e ele acabou apitando a falta. Aos 27 minutos, com o placar em 1 a 0, Vinícius Júnior ganhou a linha de fundo, cortou para trás, deu um passe para trás e logo após soltar a bola recebeu uma pisada do zagueiro venezuelano Aramburu. Martínez Munuera foi até a tela e avaliou a ação: “Parece uma batida clara. Já é tarde. Vou sem cartão. Pênalti sem cartão”, declarou antes de apontar os onze metros. A Real Sociedad e o técnico Imanol Alguacil não gostaram nada da decisão, que foi contundente na sala de imprensa: “Para mim só houve um pênalti”. “Não gosto disso. E se nos derem esses cartões, o que para mim não eram. Se quisermos que todos desfrutem deste futebol, penso que algumas coisas têm de mudar.” “Não entendo como o VAR entra na ação de Aramburu sobre Vinicius. A pisada não tem impacto na jogada. O contato é produzido por inércia”, disse o ex-árbitro espanhol Pérez Burrull no programa “Marcador” da Rádio Marca. O técnico do Real Madrid, Carlo Ancelotti, disse na coletiva após o jogo: “Eles escolhem as penalidades. Eles assumem a responsabilidade e tudo correu muito bem”. Questionado se o segundo pênalti pareceu uma falta e se gostou da comemoração de...

title: ART di Bekasi Diduga Bawa Kabur Brankas Majikan Berisi Harta Ratusan Juta
content: - Seorang diduga brankas milik majikannya di Perumahan Harapan Indah, Kecamatan Medan Satria, Kota Bekasi. Kerugian ditaksir mencapai ratusan juta. Peristiwa bermula ketika Henny (51) mendapatkan telepon dari suaminya pada siang hari. Suaminya menelepon dan memberitahu bahwa ART berinisial E (35) itu pulang kampung. "Satpam bilang ada yang meninggal, itu aja statement-nya (E) dan memang ada bukti CCTV-nya," kata Henny kepada wartawan dikutip, Minggu (15/9/2024). Henny dan suaminya baru curiga atas perlakuan ART saat menyadari brankas miliknya hilang. Brankas itu diduga dibawa oleh ARTnya saat izin pulang kampung. "Kita punya dua brankas, yang satu yang besar, yang satu itu, nah yang itu hilang," kata Henny. Brankas itu berisi surat-surat berharga, termasuk uang tunai. "Kalau ditaksir semuanya beserta isinya itu sekitar Rp375-400 juta," ungkapnya. Henny melaporkan dugaan pencurian itu ke Polsek Medan Satria. Ia berharap polisi mengungkap pencurian tersebut. "Kami enggak tahu apakah perbuatan ini karena ada pengaruh pihak ketiga, ini juga masih dalam penyidikan," katanya.

title: السفارة الإيرانية في لندن للغرب: تحدثوا مع ايران بلغة الاحترام وليس بلغة العقوبات
content: وكتبت السفارة الإيرانية في لندن منشورا على شبكة التواصل الاجتماعي X (تويتر سابقًا): نجحت إيران في إرسال قمرها الصناعي البحثي "جمران" إلى الفضاء. لقد مضى الوقت الذي كانت فيه إيران تبحث عن صاروخ واحد من دولة إلى أخرى للدفاع عن نفسها، واليوم، على الرغم من العقوبات، ترسل قمرها الصناعي المتطور إلى الفضاء. وتضيف هذه الرسالة: إذن تحدثوا مع إيران بلغة الاحترام وليس بلغة العقوبات. وكتب المتحدث باسم وزارة الخارجية الايرانية ناصر كنعاني منشورا على موقع التواصل الاجتماعي إكس جاء فيه: إن فارضي العقوبات غير المنطقيين قد تلقوا مرة اخرى بوضوح الرد على أفعالهم غير المنطقية. وتابع كنعاني مخاطبا الغرب: إيران لاعب منطقي وقوي وصاحب تفاعل بناء. من الأفضل لكم ان تجعلوا سلوككم وكلامكم منطقيا. وأطلقت ايران صباح السبت بنجاح، القمر الصناعي "جمران 1" بواسطة صاروخ الفضاء الحامل للاقمار الصناعية "قائم-100" وقد وضع هذا القمر المخصص للابحاث في المدار الذي يبعد 550 كيلومترا عن الارض بنجاح. وقد تم تصميم وصنع القمر الصناعي المخصص للابحاث "جمران 1" على يد قسم الصناعات الفضائية في شركة الصناعات الالكترونية الايرانية "صاايران" بمشاركة وتعاون معهد الابحاث الجوفضائية وشركات معرفية تابعة للقطاع الخاص الايراني. ويزن هذا القمر الصناعي حوالي 60 كيلوغراما ومهامه الرئيسية تتلخص في اختبار منظومات الكترونية وبرمجية واختبار تكنولوجيا المناورة في المدارات في مختلف الارتفاعات والمراحل. انتهى ** 2342

title: MDF yüklü tır alev alev yandı, İstanbul yönü trafik sıkıştı
content: Düzce'de MDF yüklü tır Üçköprü mevkiinde yanmaya başladı Ankara'dan İstanbul istikametine seyir halinde olan T.G. idaresinde ki tır Asarsuyu köprüsü çıkışında balatalarından birden alevler yükseldi. Olay sonrası hemen ekiplere haber verildi. SABAH SAATLERİNDE KALDIRILACAK İtfaiye ekipleri yangına hemen müdahale ederek kontrol altına aldı. Ancak yaşanan sıkıntı sebebiyle İstanbul yönü trafik 2 şeride indirildi. Tırın sabah kaldırılması bekleniyor. İlgili Haberler

title: 인천 남동구, 임신 희망 부부에 '필수 검사 비용' 지원한다
creator: 김동영 기자
content: [인천=뉴시스] 김동영 기자 = 인천시 남동구가 임신을 희망하거나 준비하는 부부(예비부부, 사실혼 포함)를 위해 임신 전 필수 검사 비용을 지원한다고 15일 밝혔다. 여성에게는 난소 기능검사(AMH), 부인과(난소, 자궁 등) 초음파 비용 최대 13만원까지, 남성은 정액검사(정자 정밀형태 검사 포함) 비용을 최대 5만원까지 지원한다. 주소지 관할 보건소에 방문하거나 e보건소로 온라인 신청할 수 있다. 지원 대상자로 결정되면 검사의뢰서를 발급받은 뒤 발급일로부터 3개월 이내에 검사의뢰서 지참해 사업참여 의료기관에서 검사를 진행하면 된다. 검사 후에는 검사일로부터 3개월 이내 청구서, 진료비영수증, 세부내역서, 입금 계좌 통장 사본을 첨부해 신청하면 검사비를 지원받을 수 있다. 사업참여 의료기관은 인터넷 공공보건 포털 e보건소의 정보·알림(공지사항)에서 확인할 수 있다. 남동구 보건소 관계자는“임신 및 출산에 장애가 될 수 있는 건강위험 요인을 조기 발견할 수 있도록 임신 전 건강관리를 통해 건강한 임신·출산 환경을 조성하겠다”고 말했다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: “더러워, 침 섞였을 텐데”...생선에 쓴 얼음, 배수구에 쏟아부은 음료컵에서 나와
creator: 매일경제
content: 시장 상인이 아이스 음료 컵에 있던 얼음을 재사용하는 모습이 포착돼 위생논란을 일으키고 있다. 최근 온라인 커뮤니티 보배드림에 올라온 영상을 보면 여성 상인이 아이스 음료 컵에 담긴 음료와 얼음을 배수구에 쏟아 붓더니 손으로 얼음만 골라 담아 생선 위에 올리는 장면이 담겼다. 글쓴이는 “코로나 시대가 지나가고 사람들의 침과 이물질이 들어간 비위생적인 음료수, 먹다 남은 얼음은 패스트푸드 (프랜차이즈나) 편의점처럼 버려야 하는데”라고 적었다. 이 영상은 지난 4~5월께 촬영된 것으로 알려졌다. 관할구청은 지난 5월 이 업소에 대한 신고가 접수돼 식품위생법 위반으로 과태료 100만원 처분을 내렸다고 밝혔다. 또 해당 영상이 퍼지면서 민원이 접수돼 조만간 현장 점검에 다시 나설 예정이라고 덧붙였다.

title: First round of Gaza anti-polio campaign ends, 560,000 children vaccinated: UN
content: Xinhua, United Nations, Sept. 15: The United Nations and its partners have vaccinated against polio more than 560,000 children under 10 in the Gaza Strip, UN humanitarians said on Friday. The UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA) said the World Health Organization (WHO) reported that the first round of the emergency vaccination campaign in the north, central, and southern zones of Gaza wound up on Thursday. OCHA said that during the final phase of the first round in northern Gaza, the United Nations and its partners reached more than 112,000 children with the vaccine over three days. The office said its partners are set to begin the second round of the vaccination campaign in about four weeks. The humanitarians said a new analysis by the WHO found 22,500 people injured in Gaza as of July 23 are estimated to have life-changing injuries that will require rehabilitation services now and for years to come. The injuries represent a quarter of the overall injuries the Ministry of Health reported in that period. OCHA said the report comes amid the decimation of the health system in Gaza, with just 17 of 36 hospitals partially functional, while primary health care and community-level services are often suspended or made inaccessible due to attacks, insecurity and repeated evacuation orders. The office said it has mobilized humanitarian partners to assess the needs of people affected by the latest two-day operation by Israeli forces in Tulkarm and Tubas in the...

title: प्रतिनिधि सभा बैठक बस्दै, यी हुन् कार्यसूची
content: संघीय संसद्अन्तर्गत प्रतिनिधि सभाको बैठक बस्दैछ। संघीय संसद् भवन नयाँ बानेश्वरमा दिउँसो १ बजे बस्ने बैठकमा सभामुख देवराज घिमिरेले प्रधानमन्त्री तथा मन्त्रिपरिषद्को कार्यालयबाट प्राप्त कार्यभार थपसम्बन्धी पत्रको व्यहोरा पढेर सुनाउने कार्यसूची छ। आजको बैठकमा प्रधानमन्त्री केपी शर्मा ओलीले राष्ट्रिय सूचना आयोगको वार्षिक प्रतिवेदन पेश गर्ने कार्यसूची छ।माननीय उपप्रधानमन्त्री एवम् अर्थ मन्त्री विष्णुप्रसाद पौडेलले अर्थ समितिको प्रतिवेदन सहितको बैंकिङ कसूर तथा सजाय (दोस्रो संशोधन) विधेयक, २०८० माथी छलफल गरियोस् भनी प्रस्ताव प्रस्तुत गर्नेछन्। बैंकिङ कसूर तथा सजाय (दोस्रो संशोधन) विधेयक, २०८१ लाई पारित गरियोस् भनी प्रस्ताव प्रस्तुत गर्नेछन्। कानून, न्याय तथा संसदीय मामिला मन्त्री अजय कुमार चौरसियाले कानून, न्याय तथा मानव अधिकार समितिको प्रतिवेदन सहितको राष्ट्रिय सभामा उत्पत्ति भएको विधायन विधेयक, २०८० माथि छलफल गरियोस् भनी प्रस्ताव प्रस्तुत गर्नेछन्। विधायन विधेयक, २०८१ लाई पारित गरियोस् भनी प्रस्ताव प्रस्तुत गर्ने कार्यसूची रहेको संसद् सचिवालयले जानकारी दिएको छ।

title: Phụ nữ xinh đến mấy cũng khiến đàn ông 'chạy mất dép' nếu sở hữu điều này
content: Đàn ông sợ nhất chính là phụ nữ nói nhiều, nói đi nói lại mãi một vấn đề. Đàn ông cũng sợ lập trình tư duy của phụ nữ. Sự suy diễn của đàn bà đối với đàn ông mà nói là một điều khủng khiếp. Họ có nhìn cái lọ suy ra cái chai và từ cái chai có thể ra cả một đại dương vấn đề, từ đó khó lòng có con kiến nào lọt qua mắt họ được. Đôi khi, phụ nữ có xu hướng cho người đàn ông của họ gợi ý về điều gì đó họ thích hoặc muốn làm. Nhưng hầu như đàn ông đều không hiểu được những gợi ý mà phụ nữ đưa ra. Họ cảm thấy đối tác của họ nói chuyện vòng vo khiến họ hoàn toàn bối rối. Nhiều phụ nữ khi có chồng, con thường không chú ý đến bản thân mà chỉ chăm chăm chú trọng đầu tư cho tổ ấm của cả hai, chăm lo cho các con, trau chuốt cho gia đình. Bạn bỏ bê bản thân: Cân nặng mất kiểm soát, làn da chùng nhão chảy xệ, đầy tàn nhang, không bao giờ nghĩ đến việc tẩy trắng răng, và đầu tư cho mái tóc đang mỏng dần đi theo ngày tháng. Chính sự mất cân bằng này đã đẩy bạn đến sự tiêu cực, bạn đầu tư cho mối quan hệ quá nhiều và trở nên mệt mỏi. Sự mệt mỏi làm cho bạn không còn sức sống nữa, bạn cằn nhằn chồng bạn nhiều hơn, xót xa cho thời thanh xuân không bao giờ còn trở...

title: 152-я ракетка мира Гадеки обыграла Осорио и вышла в финал турнира в Гвадалахаре
content: Австралийская теннисистка Оливия Гадеки в полуфинале турнира в Гвадалахаре обыграла колумбийку Марию Осорио со счетом 6:2, 6:3. Встреча продолжалась 1 час 20 минут. На счету 22-летней австралийки 5 эйсов, 3 двойные ошибки и 4 реализованных брейк-пойнта из 12. В финале 152-я ракетка мира встретится с победительницей матча Магдалена Фрех (Польша) — Каролин Гарсия (Франция).

title: Klitih dan Ekonomi Kreatif di Yogya Dibahas Calon Pemimpin dan Komunitas
creator: Erik Purnama Putra
content: REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, YOGYAKARTA -- Komite Independen Sadar Pemilu (KISP) bersama Muda Bicara ID menyelenggarakan diskusi bertema 'Muda Bicara Kandidat Menjawab' di Tarumartani Coffee, Kota Yogyakarta, Sabtu (14/9/2024). Ketiga pasangan calon wali kota dan wakil wali kota Yogyakarta, yaitu Muhammad Afnan Hadikusumo-Singgih Raharjo, Heroe Poerwadi-Sri Widya Supena, dan Hasto Wardoyo-Wawan Harmawan dalam dalam dialog tersebut. Dalam sesi dialog yang dimoderatori oleh Muhammad Iqbal Khatami, masing-masing kandidat menyampaikan gagasannya untuk mengatasi persoalan klitih dan ekonomi kreatif di Kota Yogyakarta. Cawalkot Muhammad Afnan Hadikusumo mengaku, ia bersama Singgih Raharjo akan menyiapkan anggaran subsidi Rp 100 juta per tahun untuk setiap kelurahan di Kota Yogyakarta. Dana itu salah satunya bisa digunakan untuk mengatasi kenakalan remaja. "Subsidi ini dapat digunakan untuk menciptakan lingkungan sosial yang aman dan nyaman sehingga anak muda punya ruang untuk berkreasi," jelas mantan anggota Dewan Perwakilan Daerah (DPD) RI tersebut. Cawawalkot Singgih Raharjo menambahkan, pihaknya sudah menyiapkan program untuk mengembangkan ekonomi kreatif, khususnya mendorong Yogyakarta menjadi kota kreatif tingkat dunia. "Salah satu subsektornya adalah Jogja Kota Festival, juga kita dorong ekosistem yang dihubungkan ke HAKI (hak atas kekayaan intelektual)," jelas Singgih. Sementara itu, cawawalkot Sri Widya Supena menerangkan tentang ekonomi kreatif harus menghubungkan dan mensinergikan...

title: Explosión de un camión de gas deja más de 15 muertos en Haití
creator: La Jornada
content: Más de 15 personas murieron en el oeste de Haití tras la explosión de un camión cisterna de gas el sábado, informó el primer ministro haitiano, Garry Conille, en un mensaje en las redes sociales. Otras 40 personas sufrieron quemaduras graves a causa del incidente cerca de Miragoane, en el departamento de Nippes, agregó. Dijo que las cifras eran aún preliminares y que el gobierno estaba planeando evacuaciones en helicóptero. «El Gobierno se solidariza con todas las víctimas y sus familias», dijo Conille. Una explosión similar de un camión de combustible en 2021 en la ciudad de Cabo Haitiano dejó al menos a 60 muertos. En los últimos meses, bandas violentas se han apoderado de gran parte de la capital y se han extendido a regiones cercanas, alimentando una crisis humanitaria con desplazamientos masivos, violencia sexual, reclutamiento de niños y hambre generalizada. Haití amplió a principios de este mes su estado de emergencia para cubrir todo el territorio del país.

title: Fiji drops out | Rodu emphasises need for overseas player support
creator: John Chetty
content: “We have a lot of overseas players, and I think our government needs to support them, to build a good team,” says Digicel Fiji Junior Kulas head coach Marika Rodu after his team’s 0-1 defeat, against Samoa in the Oceania Federation Confederation Women’s Under-16 Championship. In a challenging match, where Fiji needed a draw to advance, they were unable to overcome a strong Samoan side. Coach Rodu believes that it’s not a matter of lacking skills, but rather the difference in player levels. According to Rodu, there are some players playing overseas, who can represent Fiji, if the can get a Fijian passport. He points out that some players are younger and still have another year in the U16 grade, offering hope for the future. “Samoa has a lot of overseas players, and I think our government needs to support our players who are living overseas, so we can really build a good team,” said Rodu. “As we will hang around with local players, there is an opportunity out there for players residing overseas, who can bring us some good football in the future.” We have sent questions to the Minister for Youth and Sports Jese Saukuru, which remained unanswered when this edition went to press last night. Despite the disappointment of not being able to beat Oceania teams, Rodu recognizes there is still a lot of work to be done. “We have a lot of work to be done, and we have young team, and being the host and losing is a big loss, we let everyone down. “Even though our journey to the World Cup...

title: 10 ஆண்டுகளாக கொடூரம்... மனைவிக்கு மயக்க மருந்து கொடுத்து வெளியாட்களை பலாத்காரம் செய்ய வைத்த கணவர்
creator: தினத்தந்தி
content: பாரீஸ், பிரான்ஸ் நாட்டில் வசித்து வருபவர் கிஸ்செல் பெலிகோட் (வயது 72). இவருடைய கணவர் டாமினிக் பெலிகோட் (வயது 71). மஜான் கிராமத்தில் உள்ள வீட்டில் வசித்து வந்த இந்த தம்பதிக்கு ஒரு பெண் உள்பட 3 வாரிசுகள் உள்ளனர். 7 பேரக்குழந்தைகளும் உள்ளனர். இவர்களின் 50 ஆண்டு கால வாழ்க்கையில் கணவரை சூப்பர் நபர் என மனைவி கூறியுள்ளார். ஆனால், அது எல்லாம் பொய்யாகி போனது. கிஸ்செல்லை கணவர் டாமினிக் ஏறக்குறைய 10 ஆண்டுகளாக அவருக்கே தெரியாமல் சித்ரவதை செய்துள்ளார். ஆனால், இந்த விவரம் மனைவிக்கு தெரியவில்லை. ஏனெனில், வீட்டில் மனைவிக்கு மயக்க மருந்து கொடுத்து படுக்க வைத்து விடுவார். சுயநினைவு இல்லாத நிலையிலேயே, வெளியாட்களை அழைத்து வந்து மனைவியை பாலியல் பலாத்காரம் செய்ய வைத்திருக்கிறார். இதனை புகைப்படங்களாக படம் பிடித்தும் வைத்து கொண்டார். இந்த விவரம் போலீசாருக்கு சமீபத்தில் தெரிய வந்தது. அவர்கள் அந்த புகைப்படங்களை கிஸ்செல்லிடம் காட்டியதும் அவர் அதிர்ச்சி அடைந்து உள்ளார். துன்பத்தின் உச்சத்திற்கு சென்ற அவர், கணவர் டாமினிக்குக்கு எதிராக கோர்ட்டில் வழக்கு தொடர்ந்துள்ளார். பொதுவாக இதுபோன்ற வழக்குகளில் அடையாளம் வெளியே தெரிவதற்கு தொடர்புடைய நபர்கள் விரும்புவதில்லை. ஆனால், பாலியல் துன்புறுத்தல் மற்றும் போதை பொருட்களை பயன்படுத்தி துன்புறுத்துதல் போன்ற விசயங்களில் பொதுமக்கள் எச்சரிக்கையுடன் இருக்க வேண்டும் என்பதற்காக அவர் வெளிப்படையான விசாரணை வேண்டும் என கோரியுள்ளார். அவருடைய இந்த துணிச்சலை பாராட்டி நூற்றுக்கணக்கானோர் மார்சீல்லே நகரில் இருந்து பாரீஸ் நகர் வரை நேற்று பேரணியாக சென்று ஆதரவை வெளிப்படுத்தினர். ஒரு தம்பதியாக இவர்களுடைய 50 ஆண்டு கால வாழ்வில், பலமுறை இதுபோன்று பலரை வீட்டுக்கு கொண்டு...

title: विमल फौंडेशनतर्फे गणहोम, अथर्वशीर्ष-महाप्रसाद वितरण
creator: Tarun Bharat Portal
content: बेळगाव : न्यू गुड्सशेड रोड, शास्त्राrनगर येथील विमल कॉम्लेक्स-विमल प्राईड संकुल सभागृहात सालाबादप्रमाणे यावर्षीही गणहोम, अथर्वशीर्ष पठण आणि महाप्रसाद कार्यक्रमाचे आयोजन करण्यात आले होते. विमल फाउंडेशन या सेवाभावी संस्थेचे संस्थापक अध्यक्ष आणि मराठा समाजाचे युवा नेते किरण जाधव यांच्या उपस्थितीत धार्मिक विधी पार पडला. सकाळी विधीवत गणहोम झाला. विनायक कुलकर्णी भटजी यासह पाच भटजींनी कार्यक्रमाचे पौरोहित्य केले. विशेष म्हणजे यजमान म्हणून सिंधी, मारवाडी, गुजराती, जैन, मराठा, पंजाबी, लिंगायत यासह विविध धर्मातील नऊ जोडपी गणहोम पूजेला बसली होती. गणहोमनंतर 21 वेळा अथर्वशीर्ष पठण करण्यात आले. यावेळी परिसरातील भाविक मोठ्या संख्येने उपस्थित होते. यानंतर महाप्रसाद वितरण झाले. भाविकांनी मोठ्या संख्येने महाप्रसादाचा लाभ घेतला. गेल्या 15 वर्षांपासून विमल फौंडेशनच्यावतीने गणहोम, अथर्वशीर्ष पठण आणि महाप्रसाद कार्यक्रम आयोजित केला जात असल्याचे किरण जाधव यांनी सांगितले. फौंडेशनच्यावतीने राबविल्या जाणाऱ्या विविध सेवाभावी उपक्रमांची त्यांनी माहिती दिली. याप्रसंगी महेश शर्मा, संदीप जाधव, मंगलानी, श्रीकांत देसाई, अनिल जैन यासह उत्सव मंडळाचे पदाधिकारी आणि कार्यकर्ते व मान्यवर उपस्थित होते.

title: Lagi-lagi, Israel Bantai 11 Orang dari Satu Keluarga Palestina di Gaza
content: - untuk kesekian kalinya telah melakukan pembantaian massal terhadap keluarga-keluarga Palestina di Yang terbaru, serangan udara Zionis menghantam sebuah rumah di Kota Gaza pada Sabtu pagi dan menewaskan 11 orang dari satu keluarga, termasuk wanita dan anak-anak. "Kami telah menemukan jenazah 11 martir, termasuk empat anak-anak dan tiga wanita, setelah serangan udara Israel menghantam rumah keluarga Bustan di Kota Gaza timur," kata juru bicara badan pertahanan sipil Gaza, Mahmud Bassal, kepada , Minggu (11/9/2024). Serangan itu, lanjut Bassal, terjadi di dekat sekolah Shujaiya di lingkungan al-Tuffah di Kota Gaza. "Tim penyelamat terus mencari yang hilang," ujarnya. Militer Israel belum memberikan komentar langsung mengenai serangan udara brutal tersebut. Bassal mengatakan pasukan Israel melancarkan serangan serupa di beberapa bagian lain wilayah yang dikuasai Hamas pada Jumat malam, menewaskan sedikitnya 10 orang. Lima orang tewas di Kota Gaza barat laut ketika serangan udara menghantam sekelompok orang di dekat sekolah Dar al-Arqam, imbuh Bassal. Dia menambahkan, tiga orang lainnya tewas dalam serangan di wilayah al-Mawasi di provinsi selatan Khan Younis, tempat puluhan ribu warga Palestina yang mengungsi mencari perlindungan. Perang di Gaza pecah setelah serangan Hamas pada 7 Oktober di Israel selatan, yang mengakibatkan kematian 1.205 orang, menurut penghitungan berdasarkan angka resmi Israel. Hamas juga menangkap 251 orang lainnya sebagai sandera selama serangan itu, 97...

title: Kaleb Johnson rushes for 173 yards and 2 TDs in Iowa's 38-21 win over Troy
creator: By JOHN BOHNENKAMP - Associated Press
content: IOWA CITY, Iowa (AP) — Kaleb Johnson rushed for 173 yards and two touchdowns as Iowa rallied in the second half for a 38-21 win over Troy on Saturday. It was the third consecutive 100-yard rushing game to start the season for Johnson, who came into the game ranked third nationally at 153 yards per game. “That's one thing I've always had in mind — to be a top-five running back in the nation,” Johnson said. “I've got to keep going, keep my head down, keep focusing.” Johnson has 479 yards on 61 carries this season, even after missing the first half of the season opener against Illinois State as punishment for violation of team rules. Johnson, who had just 463 yards last season after missing three games with an injury, has already matched his single-season high with six touchdowns this season. “I've seen a ton of improvement from him in the last month,” tackle Mason Richman said. “I think he had one of the best camps of anyone on the team. He brings that energy. He's a big guy, but he's pretty fast, too.” “I learned a lot my first two years here,” Johnson said. “I was so used to using my speed on people, because that's all I was in high school. Now it's just me knowing people are faster. Now it's just me using my strength, putting my head down.” Johnson opened the scoring with a 4-yard touchdown run on Iowa’s first possession then his 33-yard touchdown run with 12:05 left in the game gave the Hawkeyes a 31-21 lead. The Hawkeyes (2-1) were able to shake off the Trojans (0-3), who...

title: Земфира* пытается обжаловать отказ в снятии статуса иноагента
content: Певица Земфира* (физическое лицо, выполняющее функции иноагента), обжаловала в Верховном суде России отказ исключить ее из реестра иностранных агентов. Об этом сообщает РИА Новости со ссылкой на судебные документы. Земфира* находится в этом списке с февраля прошлого года. Поводом для внесения ее в список иностранных агентов стала открытая поддержка киевского режима, концерты в недружественных России государства, критика СВО, поддержка со стороны иностранных источников финансирования. Ранее певица подавала иск к Министерству юстиции России по этому поводу. Иск был отклонен Замоскворецким судом, позднее этот вердикт утвердил Мосгорсуд. * Физическое лицо, выполняющее функции иноагента
