title: Lil Tay 'recovering from open-heart surgery' as she shares photos from hospital bed - a year after death hoax
content: Lil Tay 'recovering from open-heart surgery' as she shares photos from hospital bed - a year after death hoax Have YOU got a story? Email tips@dailymail.com By Terry Zeller and Emma Richter For Dailymail.Com Published: 01:36, 15 September 2024 | Updated: 01:43, 15 September 2024 e-mail View comments Lil Tay has undergone open-heart surgery amid a private health battle - a year after she claimed her father faked her death . On Saturday, the 16-year-old influencer shared a video on her official Instagram account showing her resting in a hospital bed with an update on her condition. 'We are overjoyed to share that Tay’s open-heart surgery was a great success! We are deeply thankful to her surgeon, cardiologist and the team who are the best in the world!,' read the message. 'Thank you for the love, prayers, and positive energy you have all sent her way. Thank you for your continued support.' 'We are off to a great start on the road to recovery.' Two days earlier, Tay raised alarm among fans when her Instagram account posted a video of an echocardiogram with the caption, 'Tay has been diagnosed with a life threatening heart tumor. We ask kindly for everyone’s love and prayers.' हजारो किलोमीटरवरुन करा स्पर्श
creator: Tarun Bharat Portal
content: सध्याचे युग दूरनियंत्रणाचे किंवा रिमोट कंट्रोलचे आहे. विशेषत: वैद्यकीय उपचार क्षेत्रात ऑन लाईन किंवा दूरनियंत्रणाचे महत्व मोठ्या प्रमाणात वाढले आहे. शस्त्रक्रियाही दूरनियंत्रित पद्धतीने करता येतील असे तंत्रज्ञान विकसीत केले जात आहे. तथापि, रुग्णाला केवळ औषधोपचारांची किंवा शस्त्रक्रियांची आवश्यकता नसते. तर त्याला आजारीपणात त्याच्या निकटवर्तीयांचे सान्निध्य आणि त्यांचा स्पर्शही हवा असतो. असे सान्निध्य आणि स्पर्श त्याला लवकर बरे करण्यासाठी साहाय्यभूत ठरतात. कारण त्याला ते मानसिक आधार देतात. तथापि, सध्या उपलब्ध असणाऱ्या तंत्रज्ञाची मर्यादा अशी आहे, की रुग्णाचे अशा प्रकारे भावनिक समाधान या तंत्रज्ञानाचा आधारे करता येत नाहीत. पण आता ही त्रुटी दूर होण्याची शक्यता निर्माण झाली आहे. लंडन विद्यापीठाचे प्राध्यापक हेल्गे वुर्डेमन यांनी असे एक साधन शोधल्याचे प्रतिपादन केले आहे, की जे आपल्याला आपल्या निकटवर्तीयांच्या किंवा नातेवाईकांचा स्पर्श हजारो किलोमीटर अंतरावरुन घडवून आणू शकेल. तशा प्रकारचा एक हातमोजा निर्माण करता येईल असे त्यांचे म्हणणे आहे. या हातमोज्याला अनेक ‘बोटे’ असतील. असे तंत्रज्ञान शोधण्यात त्यांना यश आले आहे. या तंत्रज्ञानाला ‘बायो इन्स्पायर्ड हेप्टिक सिस्टिम’ (बीएएमएच ) अशी संज्ञा देण्यात आली आहे. वेगवेगळ्या व्यक्तींच्या स्पर्शाची प्रतिकृती (सिम्युलेशन) या तंत्रज्ञानाचा आधारे करण्यात येऊ शकते, जेणेकरुन रुग्ण किंवा स्पर्शासाठी आसुललेल्या व्यक्तींना त्यांच्या प्रियजनांच्या स्पर्शाचे समाधान मिळू शकेल. अर्थात, हे तंत्रज्ञान अद्याप संकल्पनेच्या अवस्थेत आहे. ही संकल्पना प्रत्यक्षात उतरली, तर या तंत्रज्ञानाचा असंख्य प्रकारे उपयोग केला जाऊ शकेल, असा वुर्डेमन यांचा ठाम विश्वास आहे.

title: BTS 정국 "아티스트 죄 없다, 이용 말라"...뉴진스 염두에 뒀나
content: 그룹 방탄소년단(BTS) 정국이 사회관계망서비스(SNS)에 소속사 하이브와 갈등을 겪고 있는 걸그룹 뉴진스를 연상시키는 글을 올려 다양한 해석을 낳고 있다. 정국은 14일 자신의 반려견 소식을 공유하는 인스타그램 계정에 반려견 사진과 함께 "Artists are not guilty"(아티스트는 죄가 없다)라는 글을 올렸다. 정국은 파랑, 분홍, 노랑, 초록, 보라색의 하트 이모티콘 다섯 개를 함께 게시했다. 이모티콘 색상은 과거 뉴진스가 미국 애니메이션 '파워퍼프걸'과 협업으로 멤버별 캐릭터를 제작할 때 사용한 색상과 같았다. 이에 따라 팬들 사이에선 정국이 뉴진스를 염두에 두고 한 말이라는 해석이 나왔다. 정국은 약 4시간 뒤에 또 글을 올려 "Don't use them"(그들을 이용하지 말라)이라고 썼다. 정국의 소속사 빅히트 뮤직 측은 이와 관련해 "어떤 경우에도 어린 아티스트를 분쟁에 끌어들이고 방패막이로 내세우는 일은 있어서는 안 된다는 생각에서 올린 글로 확인됐다"고 설명했다. 뉴진스는 지난 11일 유튜브 라이브 방송을 통해 이달 25일까지 민희진 어도어 전 대표를 복귀시킬 것을 하이브에 요구한 바 있다. 민 전 대표는 지난달 어도어 대표이사직에서 전격 해임됐다. 멤버들은 라이브 방송에서 하이브를 향해 "우리가 무엇을 잘못했느냐"며 "(민희진) 대표님을 복귀시키고 낯선 사람들이 아닌 원래의 어도어로 돌려달라"고 말했다. 연합> [c 세계일보 & Segye.com, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

title: Aleska Génesis se lució en la Semana de la Moda de Nueva York
content: Aleska Génesis brilló en la Semana de la Moda de Nueva York. La venezolana fue una de las modelos que desfilaron algunas de las creaciones más emblemáticas de Ágatha Ruiz de la Prada. La modelo venezolana desfiló con un top con un brillante corazón tridimensional y una original falda escalonada de varios colores. A post shared by Genesis Aleska (@aleskagenesis) Aleska compartió varias fotos de su desfile en la Semana de la Moda de Nueva York . La publicación de la venezolana se llenó de comentarios con halagos de sus seguidores, incluyendo uno de la diseñadora española. “Qué placer tenerte en mi desfile. Mua”, comentó Ágatha Ruiz de la Prada, a quien la venezolana le respondió con cariño: “Amé mi corona de queso, toda que versh (ver)”. Esta no es la primera vez que Aleska Génesis desfila para Ágatha Ruiz de la Prada. En el pasado, la venezolana también ha desfilado para diseñadores y casas de moda importantes Virgilio Madinah, Passarela & Brenda Noy y Georgia Reyes A casi un año de su arresto en México, la modelo venezolana podría volver a estar tras las rejas. En enero, tras permanecer una horas detenida, Aleska fue liberada y su caso archivado; sin embargo, en una conversación en el programa de Telemundo Pica y se extiende , la modelo contó que su abogado le informó que hay una nueva orden de aprehensión en su contra porque alguien apeló para reabrir su caso. “Le pagaron a alguien para que abrieran el caso. No tengo las pruebas, pero eso es...

title: Australian batsman Jake Fraser-McGurk can star across white and red-ball cricket at international level, says former Test skipper Ricky Ponting
content: Ricky Ponting is backing T20 phenomenon Jake Fraser-McGurk to become a star for Australia in all formats of international cricket. Batting great Ponting, who's helped hone the brilliant 22-year-old while coaching Delhi Capitals in the IPL, was thrilled to see his protege blasting to his first international half-century during the defeat against England in the second T20I clash at Cardiff. The former Australia captain hailed Fraser-McGurk as "a very exciting young package", adding that "the scary thing is that I think there's a whole lot of improvement to come." Yet, Ponting believes Fraser-McGurk, who proved a sensation in India with his 330 runs at an incredible strike rate of 234, is far more than just a stand-and-deliver T20 merchant, suggesting his talent could allow him even to shine in the Test arena. England levels T20 series against Australia Photo shows An England batsman watches the ball go for four after hitting a shot square on the offside against Australia. A five-wicket haul by Australia's Matt Short cannot stop England — led by a brilliant knock of 87 by big-hitting Liam Livingstone — from winning the second T20 international in Cardiff, to level the series. "It's really pleasing to see. Everyone who saw him tonight would realise the talent that he has got," Ponting told Sky TV in Cardiff on Friday, after Fraser-McGurk took advantage... ABC News

title: Surf life saving patrol season starts this weekend as Surfers Paradise club celebrates oldest member
content: At the age of 17, Claude Jeanneret was asked to join the Surfers Paradise Surf Life Saving Club following WWII because so many of its members had fought overseas and there was nobody left to patrol the beach. Now 94 years old, he is still at the club most Saturdays. Claude competing as a young surf lifesaver in the 1960s. (Supplied: Claude Jeanneret) He was recruited from his Brisbane swimming club and remembers hitchhiking to the Gold Coast every weekend to volunteer. "As long as you had your club blazer the motorists would always give you a lift," he said. "I've still got the blazer at home and it's in mint condition." He's got tales of shark attacks, rescues and was awarded an OAM for his service, but said his claim to fame was helping to bring mouth-to-mouth resuscitation into surf lifesaving in the early 1960s. As one of the busiest beaches in Queensland, it's no surprise Surfers Paradise is one of the country's most storied surf clubs. It's produced champion ironmen and women who are some of the sport's greatest athletes. Loading... This year the club celebrates its 100th anniversary. "I'm nearly as old as Surfers Paradise itself," Mr Jeanneret laughed. "Surf lifesaving is the greatest social... Jessica Lamb , Mackenzie Colahan

title: Hawks captain James Sicily stands firm after Ken Hinkley confrontation as AFL issues 'please explain' to Power coach
content: Hawthorn captain James Sicily has defended his behaviour following a heated exchange with Port Adelaide coach Ken Hinkley in the wake of Friday night's AFL semifinal. Hinkley taunted the Hawks players on the field after the Power's tense 11.9 (75) to 11.6 (72) win at Adelaide Oval. He later revealed his antics were motivated by a comment Hawks forward Jack Ginnivan made on social media in the build-up to the match. Sicily fired back at Hinkley, with Hawks teammate Jarman Impey having the unenviable task of stopping the situation from escalating. The AFL confirmed it had issued a "please explain" to Hinkley. Sicily said his actions in standing up for Ginnivan were justified. "I can't recall exactly what was said. He (Hinkley) was talking to our players and said something to Ginni," Sicily told reporters in Adelaide on Saturday morning. "I think what I do as a leader is I always have my teammates' back and I will stick up for them regardless of who is in the right or the wrong. "It is something I pride myself on and I don't regret it one bit really." Sicily added: "Jack openly admitted during the week to the leaders that he really wished he didn't do it. "It was cheeky. I don't think the game was lost or won on motivation because of it. It wasn't necessarily a direct attack at Ken [or] Port Adelaide." Hinkley said he regretted his behaviour after the match. (Getty Images: Mark Brake) Port... ABC News

title: England beats Australia by three wickets in second T20 international to level series at 1-1
content: Travis Head's unexpected first date with the Australian captaincy has ended in huge disappointment as England levelled the T20 international series with a thrilling three-wicket victory at Cardiff. Head, handed the leader's job after Mitch Marsh was ruled out with illness, hit a brisk 31 as he led from the front and also watched the exciting Jake Fraser-McGurk then crash his maiden international half-century on Friday evening. But despite amassing a formidable total of 6-193 at Sophia Gardens, Head's big evening... ABC News

title: Diamond League final — Australia's Matt Denny wins second straight men's discus title, Nicola Olyslagers second in women's high jump
Pain and saddle soreness is common while cycling — here's how to improve it
content: Cycling has a reputation for being a literal pain in the arse. Saddle soreness, pain or discomfort from the pressure of the seat of the bike, affects many cyclists: from the everyday to the elite. "It's a problem for everyone, because you're putting a lot of pressure on a pretty soft part of the body," says Chris Steffanoni, a professional bike fitter based in the regional Victorian town of Gisborne. "Sometimes I see people who have pain going to the toilet, and things that are a bit more escalated that need to be addressed from a health perspective." Bike fitter Chris Steffanoni says sometimes uncomfortable subjects prevent people from getting the right saddle for them. (ABC News) As an example, Steffanoni says many women experience vulval irritation when riding. If left untreated, this can result in permanent structural changes to the labia, such as tissue enlargement or the formation of nodules. "The labia can become thickened and enlarged, and even result in infection," he says. "But once you resolve that infection, for instance with antibiotics, the tissue doesn't go back [to its original form]. "So you basically have extra tissue that causes pressure points, which can be very problematic." Many women experience vulval irritation while riding a bicycle. (Getty Images) Steffanoni says while anyone can experience saddle-related problems, they are more common in females. One survey of over 500 women found that almost half had been turned off recreational cycling because of...

title: Australian Olympic champion Nina Kennedy wins pole vault title at Diamond League final to end best-ever season
content: Nina Kennedy has soared to one final glorious triumph of her glittering pole vault season, taking the Diamond League crown in Brussels to add to her Olympic gold from Paris. Nina Kennedy Pole vault results Sept 14: Diamond League final, Brussels — 1st (4.88m) Sept 4: Diamond League, Zurich — 1st (4.87m) Aug 30: Golden Gala, Rome — 1st (4.83m) Aug 7: Olympic Games final, Paris — 1st (4.90m) Jul 20: Diamond League, London — 1st (4.85m) Jul 12: Diamond League, Monaco — 1st (4.88m) Jul 4: International meet, Sotteville — 1st (4.75m) Jun 18: Paavo Nurmi Games, Turku — 1st (4.80m) While the 27-year-old West Australian was completing her all-conquering 2024 campaign, another Olympic heroine Jess Hull battled for bronze in the 1,500m final on Saturday's second day of the final in the Belgian capital. Following Matt Denny's discus gold and a silver for high jumper Nicola Olyslagers on Friday's opening night, it meant four Australians finished on the podium, equalling the country's best-ever performance in the season-long Diamond League series. Both Kennedy and Denny, who the vaulter cited as an inspiration, were among the 16 event winners rewarded with a $US30,000 ($A45,000) prize. Pride of place, though,... ABC News

The Australians booked their place with two... ABC News

title: Tigers romp to massive 46-point AFLW win over Swans as Dockers and Blues post victories
content: Richmond captain Katie Brennan has kicked three goals in a stunning first-quarter blitz to help fire the Tigers to a 46-point AFLW thumping of Sydney. The Tigers' red-hot pressure and slick ball-use overwhelmed their opponents early as a five-goal opening term laid the platform for a 10.8 (68) to 3.4 (22) victory on Saturday in Coffs Harbour. Brennan's match-high tally of three majors was complemented by two each from Maddy Shevlin, Sarah Hosking and Mackenzie Ford. Ellie McKenzie was best afield with a career-high 23 disposals, with Grace Egan (19 disposals) and lead ruck Poppy Kelly (38 hit-outs) also outstanding. The result, in the first AFLW meeting between the sides, gave Richmond a 2-1 win-loss record ahead of its next match against Carlton on Thursday night. The Swans (1-2), who lost co-captain Chloe Molloy to a season-ending knee injury last week, have recorded defeats in consecutive matches. They face a derby clash with GWS in round four. Montana Ham (two goals) was a shining light in attack for the Swans and Laura... ABC News

« L'Épreuve de Dieu » : peut-on encore prouver l'existence du divin ?
content: L'Épreuve de Dieu. Affronter aujourd'hui la question de l'existence de Dieu Emmanuel Tourpe Emmanuel, 168 p., 16,90 € Peut-on prouver que Dieu existe ? La question est toujours brûlante, comme le montre le renouveau depuis quelques années de l'apologétique, la défense rationnelle de la foi. Pourtant, souligne Emmanuel Tourpe en préambule de L'Épreuve de Dieu, « si l'existence de Dieu était aussi évidente que le fait que deux et deux font quatre, ce serait un acquis général ». title: Le Brésil n'en finit plus de lutter contre les incendies
content: « Le gouvernement fédéral, en coopération avec les gouvernements d'Etat et municipaux, travaille pour combattre les foyers d'incendies », a écrit le président Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva sur le réseau social Bluesky, solution de repli depuis l'interdiction de X au Brésil. Les incendies se sont faits plus nombreux au cours des 12 premiers jours de septembre de cette année par rapport au mois de septembre 2023 entier, avec 49.266 feux contre 46.486, selon des chiffres de l'Institut national des enquêtes spatiales basés sur des données recueillies par des satellites. Un feu brûle dans la réserve biologique de Tingua à Nova Iguacu, dans l'État de Rio de Janeiro, au Brésil, le 13 septembre 2024 / Pablo PORCIUNCULA / AFP Jeudi à minuit, 60,7% des incendies répertoriés en septembre en Amérique du Sud brûlaient au Brésil, d'après la même source. De nombreux foyers évoluent dans des zones naturelles clés pour la biodiversité telles que l'Amazonie, le Cerrado et le Pantanal. Les incendies ont aussi atteint les villes, dont Sao Paulo, qui a vu les feux approcher vendredi de ses quartiers nord. Un hélicoptère de la police tentait d'éteindre un feu de forêt près de la favela de... AFP

title: Laure Grandbesançon : « Avec "Les odyssées", j'ai voulu rêver grand pour les enfants »
content: La Croix L'Hebdo : Qu'est-ce que « L'école des odyssées », lancée en cette rentrée ? C'est un concours de création de podcast pour les élèves de CM2. Les classes qui s'inscrivent avant le 30 septembre1 choisissent un personnage ou une aventure collective à raconter, et nous les accompagnerons pour créer leur « odyssée » d'ici avril. La classe gagnante sera invitée en juin à la Maison de la Radio pour voir son épisode enregistré et diffusé par France Inter. Ce projet pédagogique mêle tous les savoirs et valorise tous les élèves : ceux qui aiment écrire, ceux qui aiment faire des recherches, ceux qui aiment jouer avec les sons, incarner des personnages, faire des blagues... Comment sont nées « Les odyssées » ? J'ai découvert la radio à 29 ans, lors d'un stage à France Inter. J'ai eu un coup de foudre pour ce média, tout me plaisait ! J'ai fait des chroniques, proposé des émissions qui ont été retoquées, puis un projet de magazine pour enfants composé de différentes séquences : une interview, le décodage d'un tube, un récit historique... Dans la maquette, ce récit retraçait la découverte du tombeau de Toutankhamon. Cette séquence a séduit la direction et donné naissance au podcast « Les odyssées ». Créé en 2019, le podcast rencontre un tel succès (plus de 30 millions d'écoutes) qu'il a été décliné en livres et adapté sur scène, où vous incarnez plusieurs personnages. Une revanche, pour vous qui avez longtemps voulu devenir...

title: F1: Leclerc partira en pole du GP d'Azerbaïdjan, Verstappen 6e
content: L'Espagnol Carlos Sainz (Ferrari) et le Mexicain Sergio Pérez (Red Bull) partiront de la deuxième ligne. Le leader du championnat Max Verstappen (Red Bull) ne sera que 6e sur la grille, derrière la Mercedes du Britannique George Russell, 5e. La quatrième ligne verra deux anciens multi-champions du monde, Lewis Hamilton (Mercedes), 7e, ayant devancé Fernando Alonso (Aston Martin), 8e. L'Argentin Franco Colapinto, qui dispute avec Williams son deuxième GP dans l'élite, partira 9e. Dimanche, Red... AFP

title: Trafic de viande de brousse : un réseau hors de contrôle en Europe
content: Le quartier Château-Rouge est en pleine effervescence. Fin d'après-midi, c'est l'heure des affaires pour les boutiques de ce carrefour des cultures africaines, au pied de la butte Montmartre à Paris. Sous les néons blancs d'une épicerie congolaise, les étals de poisson séché, d'herbes ciselées et de chikwangue – manioc enveloppé dans des feuilles de bananier – cachent d'autres denrées, vendues plus discrètement. En sous-main, on peut s'y procurer de l'antilope ou du potamochère, cousin du phacochère : « Entre 45 et 90 € le kilo », fait savoir le vendeur assis derrière sa caisse. Dans une boutique camerounaise un peu plus loin, on parle de « pangolin » et de « porc-épic ». 50 € pièce. L'importation de ces viandes d'animaux sauvages en provenance d'Afrique, dite viande de brousse, est strictement interdite. À peine dissimulé pourtant, le marché prospère. À lire aussi Comment mieux lutter contre le trafic d'espèces sauvages en France En 2022, plus de 800 kilogrammes de viande de brousse ont été saisis par les douanes des aéroports de Paris. Une fraction des flux réels : des chercheurs ont estimé en 2010 que près de 5 tonnes de « bushmeat » passent chaque semaine par l'aéroport Paris-Charles-de-Gaulle, qui servirait de plaque tournante en Europe. Chauves-souris, singes, agoutis et autres espèces sauvages, fraîches ou boucanées (séchées), sont rapportés dans leurs valises par des voyageurs, principalement d'Afrique de l'Ouest et centrale. De la...

title: Abbé Pierre: un silence nourri par son statut d'icône?
content: Décédé en 2007, l'abbé Pierre est depuis juillet visé par des accusations de violences sexuelles commises entre les années 1950 et 2000, avec début septembre une nouvelle salve de témoignages sur des faits gravissimes pouvant pour certains s'apparenter à des viols ou concernant des mineures. Vendredi soir, le pape François a fait savoir que le Vatican avait été informé, a minima après la mort de l'abbé Pierre, des accusations visant le prêtre français qu'il a qualifié « de terrible pécheur ». Le pape François lors d'une conférence de presse à bord de son avion, le 13 septembre 2024 / Guglielmo Mangiapane / POOL/AFP Ces propos du pape « encouragent » un « travail de vérité et de clarification historique », a salué samedi la Conférence des évêques de France. Pour Véronique Margron, présidente de la Conférence des religieux et religieuses de France (Corref), « on ne peut sérieusement imaginer une seconde que cela s'est fait à l'insu de tout le monde. Sur une figure aussi connue, aussi publique, aussi repérée, c'est impossible ». Mais il fallait sans doute « protéger la naissance de ce qui allait s'appeler Emmaüs », note auprès de l'AFP la religieuse, selon qui « la figure de l'abbé Pierre était trop forte et le mouvement trop important pour aller au-delà de décisions de conscience personnelle ». Adrien Chaboche, délégué général d'Emmaüs International, estimait le 9 septembre sur RTL que « forcément il y a des gens qui ont su ce...

title: Photovoltaïque : les arnaques sur les panneaux solaires se multiplient
content: Pierre n'a rien vu venir. Intéressé par la pose de panneaux solaires, il commence par faire quelques recherches sur Internet. Il est très vite contacté par un commercial qui propose de venir chez lui faire un devis. Tout s'enchaîne alors. Le représentant sait se montrer persuasif. Il promet à ce couple de retraités une baisse des deux tiers de leur facture d'électricité. De quoi donner à réfléchir. Pierre appose alors sa signature sur ce qu'il pense être une simple autorisation à monter sur son toit, afin de réaliser l'expertise technique. Mais ce qui était présenté comme un simple « contrat de prestation de service » s'avère être finalement un bon de commande, assorti d'une demande de crédit de 37 000 € pour financer l'installation. À lire aussi En France, le photovoltaïque prend le pas sur l'éolien Le couple ne s'en rend pas compte tout de suite. Ce n'est que deux semaines plus tard, soit après la fin du délai de rétractation, qu'il reçoit un appel de l'entreprise lui proposant une date de démarrage des travaux. Ainsi qu'un courrier d'une société de crédit l'informant que son dossier a été accepté. Menaçant l'entreprise et la banque de poursuites judiciaire, son fils Joël fait immédiatement tout stopper. Sans suites. Le label RGE n'est pas forcément une garantie de qualité « C'est une chance, car beaucoup de personnes âgées, victimes d'individus peu scrupuleux, préfèrent ne rien dire à leur famille, par crainte d'apparaître...

title: Conflit au Proche-Orient, jour 344 : funérailles d'Aysenur Ezgi Eygi en Turquie, nouveau bilan du Hamas
content: ► Aysenur Ezgi Eygi, inhumée en martyre en Turquie La jeune militante américano-turque Aysenur Ezgi Eygi, tuée en Cisjordanie occupée le 6 septembre, a été inhumée en martyre samedi 14 septembre, dans l'ouest de la Turquie. Plusieurs centaines de personnes ont escorté le cercueil recouvert aux couleurs du drapeau turc et porté par la police anti-émeute casquée de blanc, réservée aux martyrs tombés au combat, jusqu'au cimetière de Didim sur la côte égéenne. Dès l'annonce de sa mort, Ankara a ouvert une enquête et dénoncé l'« assassinat arbitraire » de la jeune femme de 26 ans au cours d'une manifestation près de Naplouse, attribué à l'armée israélienne. Une autopsie turque a confirmé la mort de la militante par « arme à feu », correspondant aux conclusions de trois médecins palestiniens qui écartaient l'hypothèse d'un tir indirect. À lire aussi En Cisjordanie, appels à faire la lumière sur la mort d'une militante américaine « La seule chose que je demande à l'État c'est de réclamer la justice pour ma fille. Que (son) sang soit vengé. Que les responsables soient punis car elle a été délibérément visée », a accusé la mère d'Aysenur Ezgi Eygi, Rabia Birden, citée par l'agence Anadolu. La... La Croix (avec AFP)

title: A la braderie de Lille, on cherche l'«utile» et on trouve le bigarré
content: La braderie de Lille débute à peine que des badauds se pressent par centaines entre les stands, en quête de « la bonne affaire » et surtout d'achats « utiles ». Ce qui n'empêche pas nombre d'entre eux de s'enticher de décorations parfois dispensables, fruits en faïences ou train miniature. « C'est à ces heures-là qu'on fait les meilleures affaires », sourit Jean-Louis Sobrie, 70 ans, pull à capuche et écharpe sombre pour affronter le froid matinal. Cet habitué ne compte d'ailleurs pas s'éterniser: dès 11H30, il entend « profiter des moules-frites (...), parce qu'après, ça bouchonne ». Venu avant tout pour des achats « utiles », il est en quête d'une perle rare...une grappe de raisins en faïence, pour compléter un plateau de fruits du même matériau qui orne son salon. Tôt le samedi, c'est le créneau des connaisseurs, qui veulent devancer les 2,5 millions de visiteurs attendus. « Chacun voit l'utilité où il veut la voir », sourit Fabien Arevalo, les yeux encore un peu lourds, tenant sous le bras une locomotive miniature en aluminium... AFP

title: A69: un dernier bastion d'«écureuils» sur le chemin de la future autoroute
content: « Il n'y a plus aucun arbre sur le tracé, à part à Verfeil », a déclaré vendredi à l'AFP Martial Gerlinger, directeur d'Atosca, concessionnaire de l'A69. Un dernier opposant campant dans un arbre à Saïx, dans le Tarn, a dû le quitter en début de semaine, après une nouvelle intervention des gendarmes, et la dernière Zone à défendre (ZAD) tarnaise sur le tracé a donc été rasée. Sur le terrain de Verfeil, à quelque 25 km de Toulouse, une quinzaine de zadistes déjeunent autour d'une table ou s'affairent pour préparer la suite. Un "écureuil" occupe le dernier arbre de la ZAD (Zone à défendre) "Cal'arbre" pour empêcher son abattage, lors d'un rassemblement des opposants au projet d'autoroute A69 à Saix (Tarn), le 8 septembre 2024 / Lionel BONAVENTURE / AFP/Archives Trois jeunes, certains d'entre eux cagoulés, clouent des planches en bois pour faire une cabane qui restera au sol. Trois autres, marteau en main, en fabriquent une plus petite, destinée à être remontée à l'aide de poulies en haut d'un des grands arbres devant être abattus. « Nous sommes déterminés » à tenir, souligne un autre zadiste d'une trentaine d'années qui souhaite aussi rester anonyme. Tentatives d'incendie Des cabanes comparables sont déjà installées en haut de certains grands arbres de ce terrain de 8.000 m2 qui en compte une vingtaine et entoure une maison où réside Alexandra, 44 ans, qui elle non plus ne souhaite pas donner son nom. Un bûcheron coupe un arbre lors...

title: Conversations à la une
content: Un œil sur le panneau d'affichage le confirme : le prochain train ne passe pas avant huit minutes. Alors je suis la file de mes semblables qui, comme des insectes attirés par la lumière, pénètrent dans la petite échoppe du marchand de journaux située dans le hall de la gare. En réalité « des » marchands, puisqu'ils sont deux, un homme et une femme, à être employés dans cette boutique. Il y a quelques années, ils ont installé des mange-debout. Le matin, les amateurs de café sur le pouce croisent les irréductibles du papier. C'est le seul point de vente presse de ma ville. Aussi, depuis quinze ans que j'y vis, je m'y rends quotidiennement. Et, depuis le temps, des habitudes sont prises : ils mettent de côté un exemplaire de son quotidien à mon mari afin que, même s'il passe tard dans la matinée, il lui en reste un. Quand ils reçoivent des échantillons de paquets de bonbons, ils m'en glissent toujours deux ou trois « pour votre fils ». Ils savent quand j'ai un coup de mou car, ces... Joséphine Lebard, journaliste et autrice

title: Guerre en Ukraine, jour 934 : Gabriel Attal à Kiev, échange de prisonniers russes et ukrainiens
content: ► À Kiev, Gabriel Attal réaffirme « tout le soutien de la France à l'Ukraine » En visite à Kiev pour le forum Yalta European Strategy, l'ancien premier ministre Gabriel Attal a « réaffirme [r] tout le soutien de la France à l'Ukraine », ajoutant dans un post X que « le destin de l'Ukraine est en Europe ». À Kiev, au forum Yalta European Strategy, je réaffirme tout le soutien de la France à l'Ukraine, victime de la guerre menée par la Russie de Vladimir Poutine. À travers l'Ukraine, c'est aussi un modèle de société fondé sur la liberté et la démocratie que nous défendons. Au... pic.twitter.com/psKeqF5L3m — Gabriel Attal (@GabrielAttal) September 14, 2024 « Au Parlement, je me battrai pour que la France continue d'apporter le soutien militaire et financier dont le pays a besoin pour résister et se reconstruire » a ajouté le président du groupe Ensemble pour la République à l'Assemblée nationale, lors d'une réunion de travail avec le président du parlement ukrainien et le premier ministre Denys Chmyhal. ► La Russie annonce un échange de 103 prisonniers de chaque camp avec l'Ukraine Moscou a annoncé samedi avoir procédé avec l'Ukraine à un échange de 103 prisonniers de chaque camp, notamment des soldats russes capturés lors de l'offensive ukrainienne dans la région frontalière de Koursk. « À l'issue du processus de négociation, 103 militaires russes faits prisonniers dans la région de... La Croix (avec AFP)

title: Japon : le navire scientifique « Chikyu » en mission pour percer le mystère des séismes
content: Le Chikyu est un monstre des mers. Pas un paquebot de croisière ni un porte-conteneurs, mais un navire scientifique de forage des fonds marins aux dimensions impressionnantes. « Le Chikyu est le plus grand navire de recherche océanographique au monde » explique fièrement Nobu Eguchi, directeur général de l'Institut japonais d'exploration maritime et terrestre. « Il est multifonction, car il peut aussi bien mener des opérations de forage de pétrole et de gaz que des missions océanographiques pour approfondir nos connaissances sur les séismes », ajoute cet ingénieur qui va mener cette mission scientifique de trois mois au large des côtes nippones le long de la faille du Japon. Au pays des typhons, des séismes et des tsunamis, on comprend l'importance de ces missions d'exploration sous-marines menées depuis des décennies, afin de percer les mystères des glissements des plaques tectoniques, leur évolution et les possibilités d'anticiper les risques de futurs tremblements de terre. « Aucun sismologue n'avait prévu que le séisme le plus puissant de l'histoire du Japon de magnitude 9,1 au large du Tohoku en 2011 allait se produire à cet endroit précis », explique en préambule Takehiro Hirose, directeur de l'Institut Kochi au sein de l'Agence japonaise des sciences et technologies maritimes et terrestres (Jamstec). À lire aussi Japon : une série de séismes entraîne une alerte au tsunami « L'épicentre du séisme était situé à l'intersection de deux...

title: '62억 건물주' 기안84, '나혼산' 하차하나...미모의 女와 '시그널' ('음악일주')
creator: 정안지 기자
content: [스포츠조선닷컴 정안지 기자]기안84와 미모의 여성의 '텍사스 시그널'이 포착된다. 오는 15일(일) 방송될 MBC 예능 프로그램 '태어난 김에 음악일주(연출 김지우, 이하 '음악일주')' 5회에서는 텍사스의 한 바에서 기안84의 마음에 핑크빛 토네이도를 일으킬 운명적인 만남이 펼쳐진다. 지난 방송에서 토네이도를 보러 홀로 사우스다코타로 떠났던 기안84는 텍사스에서 빠니보틀, 유태오와 재회한다. 세 사람은 카우보이들을 만나고 그들의 문화를 접하기 위해 바를 방문, 따뜻한 정과 분위기에 녹아든다. 특히 기안84의 시선을 빼앗은 여성이 나타나 '음악일주'에 로맨스 바람이 불어닥친다. 관심이 있지만 표현하지 못하고 부끄러워하는 기안84를 위해 빠니보틀과 유태오가 사랑의 큐피트를 자처하며 서포트에 나서 보는 재미를 더할 예정이다. 또한 "유 솔로(You solo)?"라고 용기 내어 질문한 기안84에게 여성은 알쏭달쏭한 답변을 남기고 기안84 역시 숨 막히는 밀당을 이어가 보는 이들의 마음을 간지럽힌다. 무엇보다 심상치 않은 썸 기류를 풍기는 기안84와 여성의 댄스 타임이 예고되어 흥미를 자극하고 있다. 시청자들의 연애 세포를 자극할 기안84의 텍사스 러브 스토리 결말은 오는 15일(일) 밤 9시 10분에 방송되는 MBC '태어난 김에 음악일주'에서 공개된다. 본방송 하루 전인 14일(토) 저녁 8시 40분에는 추석특집 '태어난 김에 음악일주' 중간점검이 방송된다. anjee85@sportschosun.com

title: L'athlète Rebecca Cheptegei, victime d'un féminicide, enterrée en Ouganda
content: Des centaines d'Ougandais et de nombreux athlètes ont rendu, samedi 14 septembre, un dernier hommage à l'athlète ougandaise Rebecca Cheptegei, aspergée d'essence et brûlée vive par son compagnon le 1er septembre au Kenya, quelques semaines après avoir couru le marathon des Jeux olympiques de Paris. Elle avait succombé à ses multiples et graves blessures le 5 septembre. Son agresseur, Dickson Ndiema Marangach, 32 ans, également gravement brûlé, est décédé lundi dans un hôpital kényan. Le décès de Rebecca Cheptegei a provoqué une vague internationale d'indignation. Des militants des droits humains ont dénoncé ce nouveau féminicide au Kenya, où deux autres athlètes, Agnes Tirop et Damaris Mutua, ont été tuées et leurs compagnons respectifs accusés des meurtres depuis 2021. « Une inspiration » Samedi matin, des proches de l'athlète ougandaise, des habitants, des responsables officiels, se sont rassemblés pour ses funérailles dans le village de Bukwo où habite sa famille, à quelque 380 kilomètres au nord-est de la capitale Kampala. Le cercueil de l'athlète, qui... La Croix (avec AFP)

title: Les Maldives, à court de liquidités, disent ne pas avoir besoin d'un plan de sauvetage du FMI
content: Les Maldives ont affirmé que leurs difficultés financières étaient « temporaires » et que la destination touristique n'avait pas l'intention de solliciter un plan de sauvetage du Fonds monétaire international (FMI) après les avertissements sur un éventuel défaut de paiement. « Je ne pense sérieusement pas que ce soit le moment pour dialoguer avec le FMI. Notre problème est très temporaire car nous avons actuellement une baisse de nos réserves », a-t-il dit. En mai, le FMI avait exhorté les Maldives à augmenter d'urgence ses recettes et à réduire ses dépenses et les emprunts extérieurs afin d'éviter une crise économique majeure. Selon les données officielles, la dette extérieure des Maldives s'est élevée à 3,37 milliards de dollars au premier trimestre de cette année, ce qui équivaut à environ 45% du produit intérieur... AFP

title: Déchets électroniques en Afrique : « Il nous importait de construire une contre-narration »
content: La Croix : Votre travail, qui a été récompensé fin juin par le prix Carmignac du photojournalisme, porte sur la filière des déchets électroniques au Ghana. Qu'est-ce qui vous a poussé à vous intéresser à cette réalité ? Bénédicte Kurzen : Nous sommes partis du constat fait par l'ONU que les déchets électroniques avaient atteint un nouveau record mondial en 2022 : 62 millions de tonnes, dont l'Europe est la principale productrice avec 17,6 kg par an et par habitant, dont seulement 40 % sont correctement collectés et recyclés sur le territoire. Les 60 % restant sont exportés vers les grands ports de l'Afrique de l'Ouest, notamment à Accra au Ghana. Seule une infime partie de ces exportations se fait dans un cadre contrôlé et documenté, la grande majorité de ces e-déchets part de manière informelle dans des conteneurs au chargement hétéroclite. À lire aussi Gestion des déchets : de nombreuses défaillances dans la filière de recyclage, selon un rapport Avec le photographe Muntaka Chasant et le journaliste Anas Aremeyaw Anas, nous avons eu envie de documenter cette réalité chiffrée, en s'intéressant aux filières mais aussi aux hommes vivant de ces déchets. En effet, vos images se distinguent des images chocs de décharge à ciel ouvert qu'on a l'habitude de voir... B. K. : Nous voulions sortir des clichés habituels sur les représentations des problématiques africaines, des poncifs simplificateurs véhiculés trop souvent par les médias...

title: Dans une ville du Midwest, des bénévoles aident les Haïtiens sur fond de rumeurs racistes
content: Dans un petit immeuble de Springfield, le FBI débarque après des appels menaçant les étrangers dans cette petite ville au coeur de la rhétorique anti-migrant de Donald Trump. Mais dans l'une des salles, le vrai problème est tout autre: comment prononcer « réfrigérateur » en anglais. Les bénévoles qui organisent le cours d'anglais donnent à voir un autre visage de cette ville de l'Ohio, Etat du Midwest dans le nord des Etats-Unis. Springfield s'est retrouvée sous les feux de l'actualité en pleine campagne présidentielle tendue, avec des rumeurs racistes amplifiées par la droite, selon lesquelles les migrants haïtiens y mangeraient les chats, les chiens et autres animaux de compagnie. Ces derniers jours, ces allégations infondées, largement relayées par le candidat républicain Donald Trump, se sont transformées en menaces à la bombe et fermeture temporaire d'écoles, avec une police sur les dents et des immigrés plongés dans la peur. « Aider » Une immigrée haïtienne apprend l'anglais lors d'un cours proposé par des bénévoles, à Springfield (Ohio), aux Etats-Unis, le 13 septembre 2024 / ROBERTO SCHMIDT / AFP « Je veux simplement aider », confie à l'AFP Hope Kaufman,... AFP

title: Sur les Champs-Elysées, une foule nostalgique acclame une dernière fois les champions des Jeux
content: Ils sont venus acclamer « Teddy », « Léon » et « Antoine ». Des dizaines de milliers de spectateurs se sont massés samedi avenue des Champs-Elysées pour « profiter une dernière fois », dans une ambiance festive et déjà nostalgique, des Jeux de Paris et célébrer leurs champions. Être là, "ça fait chaud au cœur! » estime Stéphanie Gers, 40 ans, venue de Montfort-L'Amaury (Yvelines). Les athlètes « nous ont fait vibrer tous les mois de juillet-août, on a suivi à fond les Jeux olympiques et les paralympiques, on a eu la chance d'aller voir des épreuves », souligne cette ancienne sportive de haut niveau. « On a réussi nos JO et c'est aussi la fierté d'être Français, sur les Champs-Elysées, la plus belle avenue du monde, pour fêter nos sportifs, c'est une fierté nationale », s'exclame-t-elle. La « parade des champions » met à l'honneur les artisans des Jeux, quelque 300 athlètes olympiens et paralympiens, mais aussi les bénévoles, les agents publics et les membres du comité d'organisation (Cojo). « Tony, Tony! », crie la foule alors que défile le président du comité d'organisation des JO et triple champion olympique Tony Estanguet. Un même tonnerre d'applaudissements accompagne les passages du directeur artistique des cérémonies des Jeux, Thomas Jolly, ou de « Marie-Jo » Pérec, qui a allumé la vasque olympique. Ravis, les spectateurs immortalisent ces autres vedettes des Jeux de Paris avec leur... AFP

title: Top 14: le Racing prend le dessus en fin de match sur Clermont
content: Après la défaite sur le fil contre Castres à l'entame du championnat (31-28), le Racing 92 avait déjà un peu la pression au moment d'accueillir Clermont, seule équipe avec Toulouse à avoir terminé la première journée avec le bonus offensif contre Pau (39-7). Les Racingmen se sont fait peur notamment en début de seconde période, où ils se sont même retrouvés menés par les Clermontois à l'heure de jeu, après une longue période de domination (20-16). Mais l'essai encaissé a réveillé leur orgueil et les Ciel et Blanc ont marqué trois fois coup sur coup, par Arundell (64), Fickou (67) et Le Garrec (69) pour son retour après sa blessure à l'épaule gauche, à chaque fois tout à gauche de l'en-but. La 400e pour... AFP

title: गुजरातमध्ये मेश्वो नदीत आठ जणांचा बुडून मृत्यू
creator: Tarun Bharat Portal
content: गांधीनगर : गुजरातमधील गांधीनगर जिह्यात मेश्वो नदीत आंघोळ करताना आठ जणांचा बुडून मृत्यू झाला. मृत हे देहगाम तालुक्मयातील वसना सोगठी गावचे रहिवासी होते. पोलिसांनी दिलेल्या माहितीनुसार, हे सर्वजण गणेश विसर्जनासाठी गेले होते. जवळच चेक डॅम बांधण्यात आल्याने या लोकांना नदीच्या खोलीचा अंदाज आला नाही. अचानक पाणी वाढल्याने ही दुर्घटना घडली. शनिवारी सकाळी सर्व 8 मृतदेह सापडल्यानंतर बचावकार्य थांबवण्यात आले. गेल्या सहा दिवसांत गणेश विसर्जनावेळी घडलेली ही चौथी घटना असून त्यामध्ये एकूण 15 जणांचा मृत्यू झाला आहे.

title: Dillon Gabriel leads No. 9 Oregon to 49-14 win over rival Oregon State
content: CORVALLIS, Ore. — After a rather underwhelming start to their first Big Ten season, the ninth-ranked Oregon Ducks got it together against their former conference rivals. Dillon Gabriel threw for 291 yards and two touchdowns and ran for 64 yards with another score to lead Oregon to a 49-14 win over Oregon State on Saturday. Jordan James had 12 carries for 86 yards and two touchdowns, and the Ducks improved to 3-0 in their first Big Ten season after the demise of the Pac-12. It was the 128th meeting in the rivalry between the two teams. Formerly known as the Civil War, the rivalry was normally held over Thanksgiving weekend. It had never before been played in September. Oregon, ranked No. 3 in the preseason AP Top 25 , had struggled in underwhelming victories over Idaho and Boise State to start the season. But the Ducks got their ground game going against the Beavers with 240 rushing yards, more than they had against the Vandals and Broncos combined. “I feel like we played to our standard today,” Ducks coach Dan Lanning said. In all, Oregon piled up 546 total offensive yards compared to the Beavers' 309. Gabriel completed 20 of 24 passes. Oregon State (2-1), playing under new coach Trent Bray , beat both Idaho State and San Diego State to start what is an unusual season as one of just two teams still standing in the Pac-12. The Beavers' running game, their strength in the first two games, managed just 131 yards rushing. “I think when you're playing a group as skilled as they...

title: As an ex-One Direction stan, Swifties need to relinquish accountability politics
content: One Direction polluted my 13-year-old life like an infection. My hormone-riddled teenage obsession fueled the creation of several fan accounts on platforms like Twitter, Instagram and Tumblr. At a certain point, I even ran an account that had amassed 13,000 followers. I bled the British Union Jack before I understood British politics or anything more complex than my hots for the British and Irish boyband and their bubble-gum pop music. When the boys — Harry Styles, Niall Horan, Zayn Malik, Liam Payne and Louis Tomlinson (in order of my preference) — cried, I cried. When they struggled, so did I. But mostly, when they made mistakes unbecoming of their role model image, I dutifully took it upon myself to defend them from criticism. At the time, being a Directioner was the only religion I believed in and I bought in like they were irresistibly charming televangelists. My devotion to One Direction came without question. Why would I question the boys and their devotion to their fans? Just like the countless other millions of girls across the world, I put my blood, sweat and tears into free marketing that bolstered their wildly successful careers and I thought that made me special. Ultimately, there was no need to question figures in my life that brought me such joy and a sense of identity— until they no longer did. title: मुंबई, पुणे शहरांना विमानसेवा उपलब्ध करून द्या
creator: Tarun Bharat Portal
content: प्रतिनिधी/ बेळगाव बेळगावहून मुंबई व पुण्यासाठी दररोज विमानसेवा उपलब्ध नसल्याने उद्योजक व व्यापाऱ्यांची गैरसोय होत आहे. मुंबई ही देशाची आर्थिक राजधानी असून पुणे हे आयटी हब आहे. त्यामुळबेळगावमधून दररोज विमानसेवा सुरू करावी अशी मागणी बेळगाव चेंबर ऑफ कॉमर्स अँड इंडस्ट्रिजच्यावतीने खासदार जगदीश शेट्टर यांच्याकडे निवेदनाद्वारे करण्यात आली. चेंबर ऑफ कॉमर्सच्या पदाधिकाऱ्यांनी शुक्रवारी खासदार शेट्टर यांची भेट घेऊन बेळगावमधील रस्ते, रेल्वे सेवा व विमानसेवेबाबत मागण्या वाढल्या. बेळगाव-बेंगळूर मार्गावर वंदे भारत सुरू करण्यासोबतच बेळगाव रेल्वे स्थानकावर पीटलाईनची व्यवस्था मागणी करण्यात आली. बेळगावनजीकच्या सांबरा व देसूर या दोन्ही रेल्वे स्थानकांना हायटेक सुविधा उपलब्ध करून द्याव्यात यामुळे बेळगावमधील अतिरिक्त सेवा तेथे वळविण्यात येतील. त्याचबरोबर बेळगाव परिसरात नवीन औद्योगिक वसाहत निर्माण करण्यासाठी प्रयत्न करण्याची मागणी खासदारांकडे करण्यात आली. बेळगाव-गोवा रस्त्याची चाळण उद्योजकांनी बेळगाव-गोवा रस्त्याबाबत नाराजी व्यक्त केली. चोर्ला व रामनगर या दोन्हीही रस्त्यांची चाळण झाली आहे. वाहने चालविणे कठीण झाल्यामुळे गोव्यातील ग्राहक बेळगावऐवजी खरेदीसाठी इतर शहरांना जात आहेत. त्यामुळे बेळगावच्या व्यापाराला फटका बसत असून, खासदारांनी या समस्येकडे प्रामुख्याने लक्ष देण्याची मागणी करण्यात आली. यावेळी चेंबर ऑफ कॉमर्सचे अध्यक्ष संजीव कट्टीशेट्टी, लघु उद्योग भारतीचे कर्नाटक अध्यक्ष सचिन सबनीस, राजेंद्र मुतगेकर, उदय जोशी, स्वप्नील शहा यांच्यासह इतर सदस्य उपस्थित होते.

title: 15 September કન્યા રાશિફળ: આ રાશિના જાતકોની આજે નબળી આર્થિક સ્થિતિ અપમાનનું કારણ બનશે
creator: Devankashi rana
content: આજનું રાશિફળ: જાણો કેવો રહેશે આજનો તમારો દિવસ? દિવસ દરમિયાન તમારે શું રાખવું પડશે ધ્યાન? ધંધા રોજગારમાં થશે નફો કે નુકસાન ? નોકરિયાત લોકો કઈ બાબતનું રાખશે ધ્યાન ? કોને કેટલો થશે ધન લાભ અને કઈ રીતે વધશે માઁ લક્ષ્મીની કૃપા? આજે કોઈ રહેશે તંદુરસ્ત તો કોઈ હશે દુખાવાથી પરેશાન. પ્રેમી યુગલો માટે શું છે સમાચાર ? કેવું રહેશે તમારું આજનું ગોચર અને કેવી રહેશે તમારા ગ્રહોની આજની સ્થિતી, આજે તમારું કેવું રહેશે સ્વાસ્થ્ય સહિત ચાલો આ બધું જ જાણીએ આજના તમારા રાશિફળમાં કન્યા રાશિ :- આજે સવારથી જ બિનજરૂરી દોડધામ અને તણાવની સ્થિતિ રહેશે. કોઈ અપ્રિય ઘટના જરૂર બનશે. વેપારમાં અવરોધોને કારણે મન ઉદાસ રહેશે. લક્ઝરીમાં વધુ રસ રહેશે. કોઈ પ્રિય વ્યક્તિ સાથે નકામી દલીલ થઈ શકે છે. નોકરીમાં તમને તમારા પદ પરથી દૂર કરવામાં આવી શકે છે. દૂર ક્યાંક ટ્રાન્સફર થઈ શકે છે.રાજકારણમાં વિરોધીઓ તમારા પર પ્રભુત્વ જમાવશે. મુસાફરી દરમિયાન કોઈપણ કિંમતી વસ્તુ ચોરાઈ કે ખોવાઈ શકે છે. વેપારમાં ઉધાર આપવાનું ટાળો. નહીંતર તમારા પૈસા ફસાઈ શકે છે. નાણાકીયઃ- આજે દેવાદારો તમને વારંવાર પરેશાન કરતા રહેશે. નબળી આર્થિક સ્થિતિ અપમાનનું કારણ બનશે. કાર્યક્ષેત્રમાં અપેક્ષિત સહયોગના અભાવે આવકમાં ઘટાડો થશે. કોઈપણ અધૂરા કામની અડચણ પૈસા આપીને જ દૂર કરી શકાય છે. બહુરાષ્ટ્રીય કંપનીઓમાં કામ કરતા લોકોને દૂરના દેશોમાં જવું પડશે. પરિવારમાં કોઈ પ્રિય વ્યક્તિના કારણે અચાનક મોટો ખર્ચ થઈ શકે છે. કેટલાક મહત્વપૂર્ણ કાર્યની જવાબદારી મળવાથી કાર્યક્ષેત્રમાં આર્થિક લાભ થશે. ભાવનાત્મકઃ આજે તમારા પ્રેમ સંબંધમાં ત્રીજી વ્યક્તિ પ્રવેશ કરી શકે છે. જેના કારણે સંબંધોમાં શંકા અને મૂંઝવણ વધશે. તેનાથી સંબંધોમાં અંતર વધશે. લવ મેરેજની યોજનાઓ પાછી આવશે. પ્રક્રિયામાં...

title: તાકીદ:અબડાસાની ભારાવાંઢમાં આરોગ્ય સેવાને વધુ અસરકારક કરવા તાકીદ
content: લખપત અને અબડાસા તાલુકાના ગામોમાં 19 વ્યક્તિઓના શંકાસ્પદ રોગના કારણે મૃત્યુ થયા છે. વધુમાં ભારાવાંઢ ગામમાં 3 દર્દીને સ્વાઇન ફ્લુ અને બે દર્દીને કોવિડ હોવાનું બહાર આવ્યું છે ત્યારે ભારાવાંઢમાં આરોગ્ય સેવાને વધુ અસરકારક બનાવવા તાકીદ કરાઇ છે. આ અંગે રાજ્ આ ઉપરાંત મેડીકલ ટીમો દ્વારા સધન સર્વેલન્સ કરાવવા, દર્દીઓને રીફર કરવા માટે ચોવીસ કલાક એમ્બયુલન્સ સેવા કાર્ય૨ત ક૨વા, સીઝનલ ફલુ અને કોવિડના પોઝીટીવ દર્દીઓના હાઈરીસ્ક કોન્ટેકટનું ટ્રેસિંગ કરી તેઓનું સેમ્પલ લઇ ટેસ્ટીંગ માટે ગાંધીનગર મોકલવા, ગામના તમામ વ્યકિતોઓને ગાઈડલાઈન (ઉમર મુજબ) મુજબ ઓસલ્ટામીવીર દવા આપવા, શંકાસ્પદ દર્દીઓના સેમ્પલ લઈ તપાસ અર્થે લેબોરેટરી ખાતે મોકલવા, જો કોઈ મરણ નોંધાય તો તેનું પોસ્ટ મોર્ટમ ફરજીયાત પણે કરવામાં આવે તે સુનિશ્ચિત કરવા, અસરગ્રસ્ત અને આસપાસના 100% ગામોમાં સંપૂર્ણ ફોગિંગ, ઘરોમાં દવા છંટકા કરવા સહિતની સુચના આપવામાં આવી હતી. લોકોને અસ્વચ્છ ખોરાક અથવા માંસનું સેવન ન કરવા માટે સલાહ આપવા તથા રોગ અટકાયત માટે જનજાગૃતિ લાવવા માટેના પ્રયત્નો હાથ ધરવા અધિક સચિવે જણાવ્યું હતું. બીમારી બાબતે હજુ પણ તબીબો માથું ખંજવાળે છે લખપત અને અબડાસા તાલુકામાં મોટા ભાગે વાયરલ ન્યૂમોનિયાથી મોત થયું હોવાનું તારણ રાજ્યના આરોગ્ય વિભાગ દ્વારા કાઢવામાં આવ્યું છે. પણ ખુદ તબીબો હજુય આ બાબતે અવઢવમાં છે. જો ન્યૂમોનિયા હોય તો ચેપ લાગ્યા બાદ ગણતરીના દિવસોમાં મોત નથી થતું અને મોટા ભાગે સારવારથી દર્દી સ્થસ્થ થઇ જાય છે પણ પશ્ચિમ કચ્છમાં ફેલાયેલી બીમારીની ઝપેટમાં આલેવા મોટા ભાગના દર્દીને તાવ આવ્યા બાદ તુરંત શરીરમાં રહેલા વાયરસે હૃદયના મસલ્સને ભારે નુકસાન પહોંચાડ્યું હોવાથી સારવાર નસીબ થાય તે પહેલા મોતને ભેટ્યા હતા તેમ તબીબી આલમમાંથી જાણવા મળ્યું...

title: World News | EU Envoy Faces Lack of Engagement During Pakistan Visit
content: Islamabad [Pakistan], September 15 (ANI): As a special envoy from Brussels wrapped up a fact-finding mission in Pakistan on Friday, there was a general feeling among diplomats that the visit might have yielded more favourable results for Pakistan if top officials had engaged with the mission as planned, Dawn reported. Frans van Daele, the European Union's Ambassador and Special Envoy for the Promotion of Freedom of Religion or Belief, met with several high-ranking officials during his week-long visit. Also Read | 'Sex Camp' in China: 'Sex Appeal' Training Camp by Sex Appeal Academy Allegedly Charges USD 420 To Teach Women Art of Seduction, Discourage Their Husbands From Cheating. Although Senate Chairman Syed Yousuf Raza Gillani, National Assembly Speaker Sardar Ayaz Sadiq, Law Minister Azam Nazeer Tarar, and Foreign Secretary Amna Baloch were present, other key officials are said to have skipped meetings with the EU diplomat. A diplomatic source was quoted as saying, "The meetings that did not happen... confirmed the impression that certain voices -- which are some of the key voices on these issues -- do not seem ready to engage in the matter." Also Read | UK Shocker: Nurse Bombarded Ex-Partner With 1,000 Calls, Placed Tracking Device in Car, Broke Into His Home in Devon; Sentenced to 20-Week Imprisonment for Stalking. title: Bild: Зеленский поедет в США, чтобы попросить разрешения на удары вглубь РФ
creator: Вера  Логинова
content: Украинский глава Владимир Зеленский планирует отправиться в Соединённые Штаты, чтобы лично просить у президента США Джо Байдена разрешения наносить удары вглубь Российской Федерации дальнобойным оружием, пишет Bild. Кроме того, Зеленский собрался «представить свою стратегию» Камале Харрис и Дональду Трампу. «Зеленский в ближайшие несколько недель отправится в США и представит там свою стратегию как президенту США Джо Байдену, так и кандидатам в президенты Камале Харрис и Дональду Трампу», — говорится в публикации. Посол РФ в Соединённых Штатах Анатолий Антонов , что американский лидер Джо Байден позволит Киеву наносить удары дальнобойным оружием вглубь территории РФ.

title: Трамп пообіцяв депортувати мігрантів, які нібито їдять собак та котів
content: Вислів Трампа на дебатах, що мігранти з Гаїті нібито їдять домашніх тварин, активно обговорюють у США та світі Кандидат у президенти від Республіканської партії Дональд Трамп пообіцяв провести масову депортацію гаїтянських мігрантів із міста Спрінгфілд в Огайо. Ця обіцянка пролунала після того, як у вівторок, 10 вересня, на дебатах із Камалою Гарріс він неправдиво звинуватив гаїтянців у тому, що вони їдять домашніх тварин місцевих мешканців. Про це повідомляє Reuters. «Ми зробимо великі депортації в Спрінгфілді, штат Огайо», – сказав Трамп на прес-конференції на своєму гольф-курорті поблизу Лос-Анджелеса. Цього разу він не повторив свого твердження, висловленого під час президентських дебатів, про те, що мігранти їдять собак і котів, яке зробило кандидата від республіканців посміховиськом у соцмережах, зауважують в Reuters. Однак Дональд Трамп не назвав жодних інших аргументів для депортації гаїтян. Більшість із 15 тис. мігрантів із Гаїті , які проживають у Спрінгфілді, перебувають у Сполучених Штатах на законних підставах. Нагадаємо, на дебатах Трамп звинуватив демократів у тому, що при них збільшилася кількість нелегальних мігрантів, зросла злочинність , особливо «мігрантська злочинність». «Вони дозволили злочинцям в'їжджати сюди. У Венесуелі знизився рівень злочинності, знаєте чому? Тому що всі їхні злочинці приїхали сюди. Тому що вона (Гарріс – ред.) дозволяє їм приїжджати сюди. Подивіться, що відбувається в наших містах? У Спрінгфілді мігранти їдять...

title: 3 terrorists killed in Kreeri encounter: Army
creator: ALTAF BABA
content: Baramulla, Sep 14: At least three terrorists were killed in a gunfight between security forces and terrorists in the Chak Tappar Kreeri area of north Kashmir’s Baramulla district on Saturday, the Army said. It said that the identity of the killed terrorists had not been established yet. The Army said that the gunfight in Baramulla occurred even as two Army personnel including a Junior Commissioned Officer (JCO) were killed while two others were injured in an encounter with terrorists in the higher reaches of Kishtwar district. It identified the two terrorists killed in the operation as Bilal Ahmad Wani, son of Habibullah Wani and Mahim Ahmad Wani, son of Shamshad Ahmad Wani, both residents of Kaschan, Ganderbal. Addressing media persons at Haiderbeig Pattan, Commander of 10 Sector Rashtriya Rifles, Brig Sanjay Kannoth said that for the last few days, security forces have been receiving inputs about the movement of terrorists in Kreeri and its adjoining areas. He said that based on specific intelligence input about the presence of terrorists in the Chak Tappar area of Kreeri, the Army’s 29 RR, along with J&K Police, SSB, and CRPF cordoned the area on Friday evening. Brig Kannoth said that as the search operation was continuing, the terrorists inside a deserted building in the orchards fired a volley of bullets at the security forces, triggering a fierce gunfight. “The exchange of fire continued throughout the night,” he said. “On Saturday morning, three terrorists were...

title: Matt Baker: Is Florida’s loss to Texas A&M the end of the Billy Napier era?
creator: Matt Baker - Tampa Bay Times (TNS)
content: GAINESVILLE, Fla. — It would be easy to view the Florida Gators’ 33-20 home loss to Texas A&M as rock bottom for the Billy Napier era. And it might be. His job was — to put it politely — in jeopardy before Saturday. It’s fair to wonder when the clock will run out. But if Napier remains the coach next week against Mississippi State and past the open date after that, it’s possible, if not probable, things will get worse for Florida (1-2, 0-1 SEC). The Gators were overpowered by a perennial underachiever with a first-year coach (Mike Elko). They were outfoxed by a backup, true freshman quarterback making his first career start (Marcel Reed). They were crushed at home by a team that had lost nine consecutive true SEC road games. They were uncompetitive despite being gifted 114 yards through penalties. If that’s what happened Saturday, what will happen when the Gators’ face No. 1 Georgia and No. 2 Texas and No. 7 Tennessee and the rest of the nation’s toughest schedule? Judging by Saturday’s showing against the Aggies (2-1, 1-0), the outlook is bleak. It did not matter Saturday whether incumbent starter Graham Mertz or five-star freshman DJ Lagway took most of the snaps. It did not matter that standout sophomore Tre Wilson was sidelined with a knee injury. It did not matter who called the plays on offense or defense or how many players the Gators fielded on special teams. It did not even matter that Texas A&M committed 13 penalties for 114 yards. This was an undeniable,...

title: NFL fines Chiefs, Peyton Hendershot for sideline incident involving Ravens linebacker
content: KANSAS CITY, Mo. — The NFL fined the Chiefs $100,000 and tight end Peyton Hendershot $5,472 for a sideline shoving incident during the fourth quarter of the opening game victory over the Baltimore Ravens on Sept. 5. Baltimore Ravens linebacker Roquan Smith made contact with Patrick Mahomes and appeared to shove him down after he ran out of bounds on a play early in the fourth quarter. Hendershot, who was inactive for the game and not in uniform, came to Mahomes’ defense and shoved Smith. No flags were thrown. After the game, Smith accused Mahomes of flopping on the play and took a shot at Hendershot, who joined the Chiefs via a trade with the Dallas Cowboys last month. “Whoever 88 (Hendershot) is, I don’t know who he is, but he better watch himself,” Smith said. “He did a little slick push. I’ll see him when I see him.” According to Tom Pelissero of NFL.com , the NFL sent teams a reminder in a memo before the season prohibiting non-participating players from making “unnecessary physical contact with, or taunting or directing abusive language, threatening or insulting language or gestures at, opponents, Game Officials or representatives of the League.” Pelissero reported that Hendershot plans to appeal his fine. Smith was one of two Ravens who received fines for other incidents in the game. Smith was fined $16,883 for a horse collar tackle of running back Isiah Pacheco. Smith was penalized on the play. Outside linebacker Odafe Oweh was fined $20,050 for a fourth quarter...

title: Se suman organizaciones a la marcha para defender triunfo electoral de Pablo Lemus
content: Salvador Cosío Gaona, presidente de la asociación "Confío en México", confirmó que se sumaron 25 organizaciones de la sociedad civi l, con lo que ya son 100, a las marchas y manifestaciones en Jalisco para pedir a las autoridades electorales de la Federación reconocer de forma rápida y expedita el triunfo de Pablo Lemus en la gubernatura del Estado obtenido en las elecciones del pasado 2 de junio. "La idea es que todas aquellas que firmaron el desplegado publicado a nivel nacional hace unos días, que son 250 entre organismo empresariales, sindicales, pues quieran y puedan participar. La idea básicamente también es llegar a la sociedad en general, y hemos tenido buena respuesta en relación a lo que observamos, los mensajes que nos llegan vía redes", comentó. La marcha se llevará a cabo el domingo 22 de septiembre en Jardín Reforma, en el cruce de Paseo Alcalde y avenida Reforma, en la Zona Centro de Guadalajara, hasta la Plaza de Armas. Cosío Gaona adelantó que alrededor de 30 mil personas se congregarán para exigir que el Tribunal Electoral de la Federación resuelva las controversias derivadas de los comicios electorales y ratifique el triunfo de Lemus. Entre las organizaciones que acudirán a la movilización se encuentran Movimiento Ciudadano Estamos en Acción, Por la grandeza de Jalisco, Unión Social de Economistas, Confederación de militares, profesionistas y empresarios Marcelino García Barragán, Unión Social de Emprendedores, Moto Club Unidos...

title: El peso logra su mejor semana en más de tres años
content: El peso despidió el viernes en 19.21 unidades CIUDAD DE MÉXICO, septiembre 14 (EL UNIVERSAL).- Contra todos los pronósticos, la moneda mexicana se impuso ante el dólar después de la aprobación de la reforma judicial en el Senado. El peso despidió el viernes en 19.21 unidades y fue su cierre más fuerte desde el pasado 23 de agosto, al lograr una apreciación semanal de 3.8% o 76 centavos, indican las negociaciones al mayoreo que presenta Bloomberg. Se trata de la mayor ganancia semanal de la divisa nacional en más de tres años, concretamente desde junio de 2021, cuando registró una apreciación de 4.1%. Al menudeo, el dólar se terminó vendiendo en 19.72 pesos a la venta en las sucursales de CitiBanamex, el menor precio en tres semanas y 77 centavos menos que el viernes anterior. El peso puso fin a tres semanas de pérdidas frente al dólar , al ser impulsado por la expectativa de que la Reserva Federal (Fed) aplicará un recorte en su principal tasa de interés el próximo miércoles, ante los resultados a la baja de la inflación en Estados Unidos. El codirector de inversiones en Franklin Templeton, Luis Gonzali, explicó que la apreciación cambiaria se debe, en parte, a que la aprobación de la reforma judicial ya estaba descontada por el mercado y todavía falta camino por recorrer para ver qué tanto afectará a la economía, es decir, los operadores compraron dólares con el rumor y los vendieron con la noticia. Para especialistas de Banorte, las...

title: 합참 “북한이 어제오늘 띄운 쓰레기 풍선 약 50개”
creator: 조형국 기자 situation@kyunghyang.com
content: 북한이 지난 14일 밤부터 15일 새벽까지 띄운 쓰레기 풍선이 50여개에 달하는 것으로 나타났다. 합동참모본부는 15일 “북한이 어젯밤부터 오늘 새벽까지 약 50개의 쓰레기 풍선을 띄운 것으로 식별했다”고 밝혔다. 현재까지 경기 북부 및 서울 일부 지역에서 10여개의 낙화물이 확인됐다. 파악된 쓰레기는 종이류·비닐·플라스틱병 등 생활 쓰레기로, 군 당국 분석 결과 안전에 위해 되는 물질은 없었던 것으로 파악됐다. 북한은 대북전단 살포에 반발하며 지난 5월 말부터 총 19차례에 걸쳐 남쪽으로 쓰레기 풍선을 띄웠다. 이번 쓰레기 풍선 살포는 지난 11일 이후 사흘만이다.

title: Transfer Talk: Real Madrid waiting for Davies' deal to expire
content: The transfer deadline might have passed across Europe's top five leagues, but there is still business to be done this summer -- and, with only four months until the January window opens, the rumour mill keeps on turning! Transfer Talk brings you all the latest buzz, comings, goings and, of course, done deals ! TOP STORY: Madrid prepared to wait for Davies Real Madrid are confident of landing Bayern Munich left-back Alphonso Davies on a free transfer, according to AS . Editor's Picks EA Sports FC 25 player ratings: What scores do Mbappé, Messi, Ronaldo get in new game? 14h Chris Wright WSL transfer window winners and losers: Who had the best summer? 15h Emily Keogh Fans vs. VAR: Norway's fight for football's future 2d Mark Ogden Davies has so far rejected any advances from Bayern to extend his contract, which is now in its final year. Moreover, from Jan. 1, he'll be able to talk to other clubs and sign a pre-contract agreement, with Madrid already confident of landing the Canada international. Los Blancos had made moves to bring Davies to the Bernabeu last summer but Bayern weren't prepared to allow the defender to leave, a decision which means that they many now lose the player for nothing. Now, having had direct conversations with Davies, Madrid are prepared to continue with the players they have this season in the hope that Davies will follow through on his word and sign in January ahead of a move in July 2025. title: СМИ: Зеленский готов прекратить огонь «на определенных участках»
content: Киевский режим в лице Владимира Зеленского готов к прекращению огня в конфликте с Россией «на определенных участках», пишет немецкое издание Bild. В статье отмечается, что такое положение предусмотрено «планом победы» Зеленского, который он планирует продемонстрировать в США. Bild также пишет, что Зеленский снова потребует выделить Украине новые партии оружия и разрешить ей атаковать с их помощью тыловые районы РФ. Ранее заместитель главы офиса президента Украины Игорь Жовква заявил, что Киев намерен доставить свой «мирный план» Москве через другие государства. По его словам, план по мирному урегулированию конфликта могут передать в Москву государства, которые имеют с ней «соответствующий диалог». Жовква отметил, что сейчас план на стадии разработки. Он также заявил, что киевский режим готов к встрече с российской стороной, и это может произойти на втором саммите по Украине. При этом чиновник отметил, что для этого «Москве нужно «перестать говорить на языке ультиматума» и быть в готовности обсуждать такой план. Ранее президент Украины Владимир Зеленский заявил, что успех его мирного плана будет зависеть от президента США Джо Байдена. По его словам, он не может огласить подробности своего плана, поскольку «дал слово» главе Белого дома.

title: Canelo Alvarez vs. Edgar Berlanga live results and analysis
content: Canelo Alvarez will put his WBC, WBO and WBA super middleweight world titles on the line against Edgar Berlanga on Saturday at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. Alvarez (61-2-2, 39 KOs) was the undisputed champion at 168 pounds before the IBF stripped him of the belt in July after Alvarez decided to face Berlanga instead of the organization's No. 1 mandatory challenger, William Scull. Alvarez, 34, has won titles in four divisions, and he's coming off a unanimous decision victory over Jaime Munguia in May. Since his loss to Dmitry Bivol in May 2022 challenging for a light heavyweight title, Alvarez has won four consecutive fights, all by unanimous decisions. Editor's Picks Ranking the top titans of the fight game: Where do Dana White, Canelo and The Rock land? 3d Mike Coppinger Canelo vs. Berlanga: How to watch, date, time and more 56m Boxing divisional rankings: Inoue solidifies spot at 122 pounds, Takei moves up at 118 3d Mike Coppinger "This is a good fight for the fans," Alvarez said during an August news conference in New York to officially announce the fight. "I know he's going to come to bring everything, and I will too. It's the kind of fight I enjoy a lot. I can't wait." Berlanga (22-0, 17 KOs), ranked at No. 5 at super middleweight by ESPN, scored first-round KO wins in his first 16 professional fights. Since then, he has scored only one KO in his past six fights, a sixth-round TKO of Padraig McCrory in February. This is the first title fight for the 27-year-old...

title: AP Sports SummaryBrief at 8:35 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Dillon Gabriel leads No. 9 Oregon to 49-14 win over rival Oregon State CORVALLIS, Ore. (AP) — Dillon Gabriel threw for 291 yards and two touchdowns, and ran for 64 yards with another score, to lead No. 9 Oregon to a 49-14 victory over Oregon State on Saturday. Jordan James had 12 carries for 86 yards and two touchdowns, and the Ducks improved to 3-0 in their first Big Ten season after the demise of the Pac-12. It was the 128th meeting in the rivalry between the two former conference foes. Oregon State fell to 2-1 with the loss. Washington State reclaims Apple Cup with late stand to top Washington 24-19 SEATTLE (AP) — John Mateer ran for two touchdowns and threw for one more, Washington State made a goal line stand with 1:07 remaining, and the Cougars reclaimed the Apple Cup with a 24-19 win over Washington. Playing in September rather than November or December, and meeting in a non-conference matchup for the first time since 1961, the Cougars relied on their dual-threat quarterback and some key defensive plays in the final moments to claim the Apple Cup for just the third time since 2008. Mateer ran for touchdowns of 23 and 25 yards and threw a 16-yard touchdown to Josh Meredith in the third quarter that gave the Cougars a 24-16 lead.
